@roblox/globaltype/AlignOrientation.documentation: A constraint that applies a torque to make its attachments align

@roblox/globaltype/AlignOrientation.Alig.documentation: 约束的轴对齐类型（平行或垂直）

@roblox/globaltype/AlignOrientation.MaxA.documentation: 约束为完成目标所能达到的最大角速度。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignOrientation.MaxT.documentation: 约束为完成目标所能使用的最大扭矩。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignOrientation.Prim.documentation: 如果设置为 true ，那么 AlignOrientation 将只会在其附件 Attachment0 与 Attachment1 不对齐时应用扭矩。这就意味着，围绕 Attachment0 主轴的任何旋转都不会产生扭矩。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignOrientation.Reac.documentation: 在为 true 时，约束将会对两个 Attachment 附件同时应用扭矩以达成目标。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignOrientation.Resp.documentation: 用于控制约束实现其目标的速度。值越大，附件进行对齐的速度也就会越快。取值范围在 5 到 200 之间。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignOrientation.Rigi.documentation: 当设置为 true 时，解算器会尽可能快地做出反应以对齐附件。当设置为 false 时，扭矩取决于 AlignOrientation.MaxTorque， AlignOrientation.MaxAngularVelocity，以及 AlignOrientation.Responsiveness 三者。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignPosition.documentation: A constraint used to apply a force towards a location

@roblox/globaltype/AlignPosition.ApplyAt.documentation: 当设置为 true 时，在 Attachment0 的父项 Part 的重心施加力，当设置为 false 时则将力施加在 Attachment0 的重心。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignPosition.MaxForc.documentation: 约束为了达成目的所能施加的最大力。只有当 RigidityEnabled 为 false 时才被使用。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignPosition.MaxVelo.documentation: Attachment 在聚合时的最大移动速度。只有当 RigidityEnabled 为 false 时才被使用 。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignPosition.Reactio.documentation: 在为 true 时，约束将会对两个 Attachment 附件同时施加力以达成目标。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignPosition.Respons.documentation: 用于控制约束实现其目标的速度。值越大，附件进行聚合的速度越快。取值范围在 5 到 200 之间。

@roblox/globaltype/AlignPosition.Rigidit.documentation: 当设置为 true 时，解算器会尽可能快地做出反应以聚合附件。当设置为 false 时，扭矩取决于 AlignPosition.MaxForce、AlignPosition.MaxVelocity、以及 AlignPosition.Responsiveness 。

@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.documentation: Roblox 用于从 CoreScripts 收集数据的一项内部服务。

@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.ApiK.documentation: PlayFab API 键。设置后才可使用 AnalyticsService:FireEvent。

@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.Fire.documentation: Roblox 用于从 CoreScripts 收集数据的一项内部服务。
触发了该自定义事件的玩家。如与玩家无关，则为 nil。
用户定义的类别。这里应为事件的名称
可选。用户定义的数据，可以是一个字符串，一个数字或一个表
触发一个自定义事件，使用自定义事件名称和数据。
Roblox 用于从 CoreScripts 收集数据的一项内部服务。
触发了该经济事件的玩家
物品的名称
表示游戏内资源的获取或支出
一个用户定义的物品类别。例如 “Vehicle”（载具）或 “Weapon”（武器）
货币的数量
使用的货币。例如：'gold'，'gems'，'life' 之类。
可选。用户定义的数据，可以是一个字符串，一个数字或一个表
触发一个事件，用于跟踪玩家游戏内的经济行为
@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.Fire.code_sample:
local gold = script.Parent
local AnalyticsService = game:GetService(“AnalyticsService”)

gold.Touched:Connect(function (otherPart)
	local player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(otherPart.Parent)
	if player == nil then return end

	local location = {
		["Map"] = "someMap",
		["Position"] = tostring(gold.Position)
	}

	AnalyticsService:FireInGameEconomyEvent(
		player,
		"Sword", -- 物品名称
		Enum.AnalyticsEconomyAction.Spend,
		"Weapon", -- itemCategory
		2020, -- 金钱数量		
		"Gold", -- 货币
		location, 
		{ SomeCustomKey = "SomeCustomValue"}) -- 可选 customData
end)

@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.Fire.documentation: Roblox 用于从 CoreScripts 收集数据的一项内部服务。
触发了该错误事件的玩家。如与玩家无关，则为 nil。
指定的记录等级（如：Debug、Error）
用户定义的信息
可选。用户定义的数据，可以是一个字符串，一个数字或一个表
触发一个事件，用于跟踪玩家遇到的错误和警告
@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.Fire.code_sample:
local player = game.Players:GetPlayerByUserId(123)
local placeId = greatPlaceId
local TeleportService = game:GetService(“TeleportService”)
local AnalyticsService = game:GetService(“AnalyticsService”)

xpcall(function()
	TeleportService:Teleport(placeId, player)
end, function(errorMsg)
	local debugInfo = {
		errorCode = 'TeleportFailed',
		stackTrace = debug.traceback() -- 函数调用栈
	}
	AnalyticsService:FireLogEvent(
		player,
		Enum.AnalyticsLogLevel.Error, -- 记录等级
		errorMsg, -- 消息
		debugInfo, -- 可选
		{ PlayerId = player.UserId, PlaceId = placeId}) -- customData 可选
end)

@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.Fire.documentation: Roblox 用于从 CoreScripts 收集数据的一项内部服务。
触发了该事件的玩家
一个用户定义的进度类别
表示进度的状态

可选。一个字典，其中的每个键值对代表一个统计数据的条目，使开发者能够在玩家游戏过程中跟踪任何他们想要的特定数据。键值对由一个字符串和一个数字组成。 
local statistics = {
    ["numberOfKills"] = 111, 
    ["numberOfExp"] = 222,
    ["userDefindKey3"] = number,
    ["userDefindKey4"] = number,
    ["userDefindKey5"] = number
}
可选。用户定义的数据，可以是一个字符串，一个数字或一个表。
触发一个事件，用于跟踪玩家的游戏进度
@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.Fire.code_sample:
local wisdomStone = script.Parent
local AnalyticsService = game:GetService(“AnalyticsService”)

wisdomStone.Touched:Connect(function (otherPart)
	local player = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(otherPart.Parent)
	if player == nil then return end
	
	local location = {
		["placeDesc"] = "Dungeon1",
		["mapDesc"] = "LeftChamberMap"
	}
	
	local statistics = {
		["amountOfExp"] = 2020,
		["amountOfGold"] = 2020,
		["kills"] = 2020
	}
	
	AnalyticsService:FirePlayerProgressionEvent(
		player,
		Enum.AnalyticsProgressionStatus.Complete, -- progressionStatus
		"LevelUp",-- 分类 
		location,
		statistics, -- 可选
		{ AcquireType = "PickUp"}) -- customData 可选
end)

@roblox/globaltype/AnalyticsService.Fire.documentation: Roblox 用于从 CoreScripts 收集数据的一项内部服务。

@roblox/globaltype/AngularVelocity.documentation: Applies a constant torque to a Part, relative to an Attachment space or world space

@roblox/globaltype/AngularVelocity.Angul.documentation: 一个 DataType.Vector3 力，用来为个体到达并保持特定角速度

@roblox/globaltype/AngularVelocity.MaxTo.documentation: 约束可以应用的最大扭矩的量级

@roblox/globaltype/AngularVelocity.React.documentation: 使该约束施加相等且相反的反作用力

@roblox/globaltype/Animation.documentation: An object that references an animation asset (AnimationId) which can be loaded by a Humanoid or AnimationController

@roblox/globaltype/Animation.AnimationId.documentation: 此属性是 Animation 对象引用的动画内容 ID。创建动画并上传到 Roblox 后，可以在上传动画的 URL 中找到内容 ID。

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationController.documentation: An object which allows animations to be loaded and applied to a character or model in place of a Humanoid when a Humanoid is not needed

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationController.G.documentation: An object which allows animations to be loaded and applied to a character or model in place of a Humanoid when a Humanoid is not needed
一个包含所有当前正在播放的 AnimationTrack 的数组。
返回一个包含当前所有在该 AnimationController 上播放的 AnimationTrack 的数组。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationController.G.code_sample:
local function stopAllTracks(animationController)
	for _, track in pairs(animationController:GetPlayingAnimationTracks()) do
		track:Stop()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationController.L.documentation: An object which allows animations to be loaded and applied to a character or model in place of a Humanoid when a Humanoid is not needed
此函数用于将 Animation 加载到 AnimationController 上，并返回可用于播放的 AnimationTrack 。

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationController.A.documentation: 每当 AnimationController 开始播放动画时，此事件都会触发。它会返回正在播放的 AnimationTrack 。

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.documentation: Controls the playback of an animation on a Humanoid or AnimationController. This object cannot be created, instead it is returned by the Humanoid:LoadAnimation method.

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Animat.documentation: 用于创建此 AnimationTrack 的 Animation 对象。

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.IsPlay.documentation: 播放 AnimationTrack 时返回 true 的只读属性。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.IsPlay.code_sample:
local function playOrAdjust(animationTrack, fadeTime, weight, speed)
	if not animationTrack.IsPlaying then
		animationTrack:Play(fadeTime, weight, speed)
	else
		animationTrack:AdjustSpeed(speed)
		animationTrack:AdjustWeight(weight, fadeTime)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Length.documentation: 返回 AnimationTrack 长度（以秒为单位）的只读属性。直到动画全部加载前此属性都将返回 0，因此可能无法立即使用。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Length.code_sample:
function playAnimationForDuration(animationTrack, duration)
	local speed = animationTrack.Length / duration
	animationTrack:AdjustSpeed(speed)
	animationTrack:Play()
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Looped.documentation: 此属性设置动画在完成后是否重复。如果在播放时更改，则结果将在动画完成后生效。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Looped.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
 
local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer
 
while not localPlayer.Character do wait() end
 
local character = localPlayer.Character
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
 
local animation = Instance.new("Animation")
animation.AnimationId = "rbxassetid://507770453"
 
local animationTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(animation)
animationTrack.Looped = false
wait(3) 
animationTrack:Play()
wait(4)
animationTrack.Looped = true
animationTrack:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Priori.documentation: 此属性设置 AnimationTrack 的优先级。根据设置的等级，一次播放多个动画时将查看此属性以确定应优先播放哪个 Keyframe 的 Pose。

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Speed.documentation: AnimationTrack 的 Speed 是一个只读属性，它提供 AnimationTrack 的当前播放速度。默认值为 1。当速度等于 1 时，动画完成所需的时间等于 AnimationTrack.Length（以秒为单位）。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Speed.code_sample:
local ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
 
local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer
while not localPlayer.Character do wait() end
local character = localPlayer.Character
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
local animation = Instance.new("Animation")
animation.AnimationId = "rbxassetid://507770453"
 
ContentProvider:PreloadAsync({animation})
 
local animationTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(animation)
 
local normalSpeedTime = animationTrack.Length / animationTrack.Speed
animationTrack:AdjustSpeed(3)
local fastSpeedTime = animationTrack.Length / animationTrack.Speed
 
print("At normal speed the animation will play for", normalSpeedTime, "seconds")
print("At 3x speed the animation will play for", fastSpeedTime, "seconds")

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.TimePo.documentation: 返回 AnimationTrack 当前播放源动画的时间位置，单位为秒。调整该值可跳至指定的动画时间位置。

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Weight.documentation: WeightCurrent 是一个只读属性，表示 AnimationTrack 的当前权重。默认值为 1。
WeightCurrent 是一个只读属性，表示 AnimationTrack 的当前权重。其默认值为 1，且在调用 AnimationTrack:Play、AnimationTrack:Stop 或 AnimationTrack:AdjustWeight 时被设置。

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Adjust.documentation: Controls the playback of an animation on a Humanoid or AnimationController. This object cannot be created, instead it is returned by the Humanoid:LoadAnimation method.
动画要更改为的播放速度。
此函数用于更改动画的 AnimationTrack.Speed。速度的正值向前播放动画，负值向后播放动画，0 会暂停动画。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Adjust.code_sample:
function playAnimationForDuration(animationTrack, duration)
	local speed = animationTrack.Length / duration
	animationTrack:AdjustSpeed(speed)
	animationTrack:Play()
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Adjust.documentation: Controls the playback of an animation on a Humanoid or AnimationController. This object cannot be created, instead it is returned by the Humanoid:LoadAnimation method.
动画在旧权重和新权重之间淡入淡出的持续时间。
使用可选的 fadeTime 参数更改动画的权重，该参数可确定 AnimationTrack.WeightCurrent 到达 AnimationTrack.WeightTarget 所需的时间。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Adjust.code_sample:
local function changeWeight(animationTrack, weight, fadeTime)
	animationTrack:AdjustWeight(weight, fadeTime)
	local startTime = tick()
	while math.abs(animationTrack.WeightCurrent - weight) > 0.001 do
		wait()
	end
	print("Time taken to change weight "..tostring(tick() - startTime))
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.GetMar.documentation: Controls the playback of an animation on a Humanoid or AnimationController. This object cannot be created, instead it is returned by the Humanoid:LoadAnimation method.
要为其创建信号的 KeyFrameMarker 的名称
动画到达已创建的 KeyFrameMarker 时创建并触发的信号
此函数将会返回DataType.RBXScriptSignal：该事件将会在到达Animation中指定 KeyframeMarker 时触发
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.GetMar.code_sample:
local player = game.Players:GetChildren()[1]
local character = game.Workspace:WaitForChild(player.Name)
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
 
local anim = Instance.new("Animation")
anim.AnimationId = "rbxassetid://437855404"
local animTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(anim)
 
animTrack:GetKeyframeReachedSignal("FootStep"):Connect(function(value)
    print(value)
end)
animTrack:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.GetTim.documentation: Controls the playback of an animation on a Humanoid or AnimationController. This object cannot be created, instead it is returned by the Humanoid:LoadAnimation method.
指定 Keyframe 在正常播放速度下出现的时间，单位为秒。
返回 AnimationTrack 中指定名称的第一个 Keyframe（关键帧）的时间位置。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.GetTim.code_sample:
local function jumpToKeyframe(animationTrack, keyframeName)
	local timePosition = animationTrack:GetTimeOfKeyframe(keyframeName)
	if not animationTrack.IsPlaying then
		animationTrack:Play()	
	end
	animationTrack.TimePosition = timePosition
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Play/p.documentation: Controls the playback of an animation on a Humanoid or AnimationController. This object cannot be created, instead it is returned by the Humanoid:LoadAnimation method.

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Play.documentation: 播放 AnimationTrack。调用的 AnimationTrack 会按照指定的 fadeTime、权重和速度播放。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Play.code_sample:
function playAnimationForDuration(animationTrack, duration)
	local speed = animationTrack.Length / duration
	animationTrack:AdjustSpeed(speed)
	animationTrack:Play()
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Stop/p.documentation: Controls the playback of an animation on a Humanoid or AnimationController. This object cannot be created, instead it is returned by the Humanoid:LoadAnimation method.
动画权重淡出的时间（以秒为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Stop.documentation: 停止 AnimationTrack。对其进行调用后， AnimationTrack 的播放将会停止，且动画的权重将在 fadeTime 参数（非必须）指定的一段时间内移向零。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Stop.code_sample:
local function fadeOut(animationTrack, fadeTime)
	animationTrack:Stop(fadeTime)
	local startTime = tick()
	while animationTrack.WeightCurrent > 0 do
		wait()
	end
	local timeTaken = tick() - startTime
	print("Time taken for weight to reset: "..tostring(timeTaken))
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.DidLoo.documentation: 当 AnimationTrack 前一动画循环结束后，在循环之后的下一次更新中，此事件会触发。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.DidLoo.code_sample:
local function playForNumberLoops(animationTrack, number)
	animationTrack.Looped = true
	animationTrack:Play()
	local numberOfLoops = 0
	local connection = nil
	connection = animationTrack.DidLoop:Connect(function()
		numberOfLoops = numberOfLoops + 1
		print("loop: ", numberOfLoops)
		if numberOfLoops >= number then
			animationTrack:Stop()
			connection:Disconnect() -- 当不再需要连接时请务必将其进行断连
		end
	end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Keyfra.documentation: 每当 AnimationTrack 播放到名称不为默认值 “Keyframe” 的 Keyframe（关键帧）时触发
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Keyfra.code_sample:
local player = game.Players:GetChildren()[1]
local character = game.Workspace:WaitForChild(player.Name)
local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")
 
local anim = Instance.new("Animation")
anim.AnimationId = "rbxassetid://437855404"
local animTrack = humanoid:LoadAnimation(anim)
 
animTrack.KeyframeReached:Connect(function(keyframeName)
	print("Keyframe reached:"..keyframeName)
end)
animTrack:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Stoppe.documentation: 当 AnimationTrack 完成播放时触发。
@roblox/globaltype/AnimationTrack.Stoppe.code_sample:
local function yieldPlayAnimation(animationTrack, fadeTime, weight, speed)
	animationTrack:Play(fadeTime, weight, speed)
	animationTrack.Stopped:wait()
	print("Animation has stopped")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Animator.documentation: The main class responsible for the playback and replication of Animation
@roblox/globaltype/Animator.code_sample:
local function playAnimationFromServer(character, animation)
	local humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
	if humanoid then
		-- 需要使用动画对象访问服务器
		local animator = humanoid:FindFirstChildOfClass("Animator")
		if animator then
			local animationTrack = animator:LoadAnimation(animation)
			animationTrack:Play()
			return animationTrack
		end
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Animator.ApplyJointVe.documentation: The main class responsible for the playback and replication of Animation

@roblox/globaltype/Animator.GetPlayingAn.documentation: The main class responsible for the playback and replication of Animation

@roblox/globaltype/Animator.LoadAnimatio.documentation: The main class responsible for the playback and replication of Animation
将 Animation 加载到 Animator 上，并返回 AnimationTrack。用于从服务器加载本地控制模型（如玩家角色）上的动画效果。
@roblox/globaltype/Animator.LoadAnimatio.code_sample:
local function playAnimationFromServer(character, animation)
	local humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
	if humanoid then
		-- 需要使用动画对象访问服务器
		local animator = humanoid:FindFirstChildOfClass("Animator")
		if animator then
			local animationTrack = animator:LoadAnimation(animation)
			animationTrack:Play()
			return animationTrack
		end
	end
end

          print("PlaceId: " .. tostring(place.PlaceId))

     end

end

@roblox/globaltype/Atmosphere.documentation: The Atmosphere object pushes Roblox closer toward realistic environments where sunlight scatters in different ways depending on density and other air particle properties

@roblox/globaltype/Atmosphere.Color.documentation: 改变 Atmosphere （氛围）色调，潜移默化地影响环境氛围。

@roblox/globaltype/Atmosphere.Decay.documentation:
当与增加的 Atmosphere.Haze（雾气）和 Atmosphere.Glare（眩光）同时使用时，定义从太阳向外的 Atmosphere（大气），从 Atmosphere.Color（颜色）逐渐降低向此值过渡。 关于属性比较及示例环境，请参见 articles.Atmosphere。

另请参见

  • articles/Custom Skyboxes|Custom Skyboxes（自定义天空盒），概述如何更改游戏的默认天空盒和自定义照明
  • articles/Post Processing Effects|Post-Processing Effects（后期处理效果），概述后期处理效果如何通过各种可定制的滤镜来快速改善游戏的视觉效果

@roblox/globaltype/Atmosphere.Density.documentation: 定义 Atmosphere（氛围）中的粒子数量，并在实际上控制游戏内对象和地形被粒子遮蔽的程度。

@roblox/globaltype/Atmosphere.Glare.documentation: 与增加 Atmosphere.Haze（雾气）同时使用，指定了太阳光源周围的 Atmosphere（氛围）光或眩光。眩光值增加时，体现在天空与世界中的阳光照射强度也会随之增加。

@roblox/globaltype/Atmosphere.Haze.documentation: 定义了 Atmosphere（大气）的雾气浓度，对地平线以上及远处的环境氛围都有影响。

@roblox/globaltype/Atmosphere.Offset.documentation: 控制了光照在镜头与天空背景间的照射方式。

@roblox/globaltype/BadgeService.documentation: 提供有关徽章的信息和授予徽章
@roblox/globaltype/BadgeService.code_sample:
local BadgeService = game:GetService("BadgeService")

local function awardBadge(player, badgeId)
	-- 获取徽章信息
	local success, badgeInfo = pcall(function()
		return BadgeService:GetBadgeInfoAsync(badgeId)
	end)
	if success then
		-- 确认徽章可以授予
		if badgeInfo.IsEnabled then
			-- 授予徽章
			local awarded, errorMessage = pcall(function()
				BadgeService:AwardBadge(player.UserId, badgeId)
			end)
			if not awarded then
				warn("授予徽章时出错：", errorMessage)
			end
		end
	else
		warn("获取徽章信息时出错！")
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/BadgeService.AwardBad.documentation: 提供有关徽章的信息和授予徽章
如果徽章授予成功，则布尔值为 true。
向某玩家 ID 授予指定 ID 的徽章。
@roblox/globaltype/BadgeService.AwardBad.code_sample:
local BadgeService = game:GetService("BadgeService")

local function awardBadge(player, badgeId)
	-- 获取徽章信息
	local success, badgeInfo = pcall(function()
		return BadgeService:GetBadgeInfoAsync(badgeId)
	end)
	if success then
		-- 确认徽章可以授予
		if badgeInfo.IsEnabled then
			-- 授予徽章
			local awarded, errorMessage = pcall(function()
				BadgeService:AwardBadge(player.UserId, badgeId)
			end)
			if not awarded then
				warn("授予徽章时出错：", errorMessage)
			end
		end
	else
		warn("获取徽章信息时出错！")
	end
end

local BadgeService = game:GetService("BadgeService")

-- 获取徽章信息
local success, result = pcall(function()
	return BadgeService:GetBadgeInfoAsync(00000000)  -- 更改该项以获取徽章 ID
end)
print(success, result)
-- 输出信息
if success then
	print("徽章：", result.Name)
	print("已启用：", result.IsEnabled)
	print("详情：", result.Description)
	print("图标：", "rbxassetid://" .. result.IconImageId)	
else
	warn("获取徽章信息时发生错误：", result)
end

@roblox/globaltype/BadgeService.UserHasB.documentation: 提供有关徽章的信息和授予徽章
将接受指定徽章所有权检查的玩家 Player.UserId 。
将接受所有权检查徽章的徽章 ID。
用于指示指定用户是否具有指定徽章的布尔值。
根据 Player.UserId 和徽章 ID 检查玩家是否拥有徽章。
@roblox/globaltype/BadgeService.UserHasB.code_sample:
local BadgeService = game:GetService("BadgeService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local badgeID = 00000000  -- Change this to your badge ID

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 检查玩家是否有该徽章
	local success, hasBadge = pcall(function()
		return BadgeService:UserHasBadgeAsync(player.UserId, badgeID)
	end)

	-- 如果发生错误，则发出警告并退出该函数
	if not success then
		warn("Error while checking if player has badge!")
		return
	end

	if hasBadge then
		-- 给玩家分配此徽章的持有权
	end
end

-- 将 "PlayerAdded" 事件和 "onPlayerAdded()" 函数连接
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.documentation: 游戏世界中进行物理交互的对象所属的抽象基类。

@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.Anchored.documentation: 确定部件是否会受物理效果影响而移动
@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.Anchored.code_sample:
local part = script.Parent

-- 创建 ClickDetector，以便检查部件何时会被单击 
local cd = Instance.new("ClickDetector", part)

-- 此函数将会根据部件的 Anchored 状态对其外观进行更新
local function updateVisuals()
	if part.Anchored then
		-- 当部件被锚固……
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
		part.Material = Enum.Material.DiamondPlate
	else
		-- 当部件解除锚固……
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright yellow")
		part.Material = Enum.Material.Wood
	end
end

local function onToggle()
	-- 切换 Anchored 属性开关
	part.Anchored = not part.Anchored
	
	-- 更新砖块的视觉效果
	updateVisuals()
end

-- 进行更新后，开始对单击进行监听
updateVisuals()
cd.MouseClick:Connect(onToggle)

local part = script.Parent

-- 此函数将会根据部件的 Anchored 状态对其外观进行更新

	if part.Anchored then
		-- 当部件被锚固……
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")

	else
		-- 当部件解除锚固……
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright yellow")
		part.Material = Enum.Material.Wood
	end
end

local function onToggle()
	-- 切换 Anchored 属性开关
	part.Anchored = not part.Anchored
	
	-- 更新砖块的视觉效果
	updateVisuals()
end

-- 进行更新后，开始对单击进行监听
updateVisuals()
cd.MouseClick:Connect(onToggle)

@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.LocalTranspa.code_sample:
-- 透视功能：看透一切！

local function makeXRayPart(part)
	-- LocalTransparencyModifier 能透视一切，但只能在本地客户端上实现此功能，
	-- 服务器端不具备此功能
	part.LocalTransparencyModifier = .5 
end

-- 此函数使用递归的方式来搜索游戏中的部件
local function recurseForParts(object)
	-- 是否找到非游戏中的部件 
	if object:IsA("BasePart") then
		makeXRayPart(object)
	end
	
	-- 只要此对象中拥有 Humanoid（人形对象）就立刻停止（我们可不想透视所有玩家）！ 
	if object:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid") then return end
	
	-- 检查对象子项，寻找更多部件
	for _, child in pairs(object:GetChildren()) do
		recurseForParts(child)
	end
end

recurseForParts(workspace)

@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.Locked.documentation: 确定部件在 Studio 中是否可被选中。
@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.Locked.code_sample:
-- 粘贴至需要解锁的 Model 中的 Script 内
local model = script.Parent

-- 此函数按照模型的层次结构进行递归
-- 并将解锁每个发现的部件。 
local function recursiveUnlock(object)
	if object:IsA("BasePart") then
		object.Locked = false
	end
	
	-- 在对象的子项上调用同一个函数
	-- 注意：若对象没有任何子项，则递归进程将会结束
	for _, child in pairs(object:GetChildren()) do
		recursiveUnlock(child)
	end
end

recursiveUnlock(model)
-- 在 Workspace 中调用函数时
-- 应当可以解锁 workspace 中的所有部件，如下：
--recursiveUnlock(workspace)

@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.Reflectance.documentation: 决定部件对天空盒的反射程度。
@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.Reflectance.code_sample:
local part = script.Parent

-- 添加光源
local pointLight = Instance.new("PointLight", part)
pointLight.Brightness = 0
pointLight.Range = 12

local touchNo = 0
local function blink()
	-- 增加 touchNo 以通知其他 blink() 的调用提前停止
	touchNo = touchNo + 1
	-- 在本地保存 touchNo，以便了解其何时会进行全局变化
	local myTouchNo = touchNo
	for i = 1, 0, -.1 do
		-- 如果发生另一次闪烁，就提前停止
		if touchNo ~= myTouchNo then break end
		-- 更新闪烁动画
		part.Reflectance = i
		pointLight.Brightness = i * 2
		wait(0.05)
	end
end

part.Touched:Connect(blink)

@roblox/globaltype/BasePart.Size.code_sample:
-- 对金字塔进行配置
local pos = Vector3.new(50, 50, 50)
local towerBaseSize = 30

-- 决定色调不同的两个颜色
local hue = math.random()
local color0 = Color3.fromHSV(hue, 1, 1)
local color1 = Color3.fromHSV((hue + .35) % 1, 1, 1)

-- 创建用来放置金字塔部件的模型
local model = Instance.new("Model")
model.Name = "Tower"
for i = towerBaseSize, 1, -2 do
	-- 创建部件
	local part = Instance.new("Part")
	part.Parent = model
	part.Size = Vector3.new(i, 2, i)
	part.Position = pos
	part.Anchored = true
	-- 在 color0 和 color1 之间进行渐变
	local perc = i / towerBaseSize 
	part.Color = Color3.new(
		color0.r * perc + color1.r * (1 - perc),
		color0.g * perc + color1.g * (1 - perc),
		color0.b * perc + color1.b * (1 - perc)
	)
	-- 向上移动
	pos = pos + Vector3.new(0, part.Size.Y, 0)
end
model.Parent = workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.documentation: A Beam object connects two Attachments by drawing a texture between them.
@roblox/globaltype/Beam.code_sample:
local function connectParts(...)
	-- 为所有部件建立一个数组
	local parts = {...}
	-- 确保部件的数量大于 1
	if #parts > 1 then
		-- 创建一个模板光束
		local beam = Instance.new("Beam")
		-- 可以在这里改变光束的参数	
		-- 在第一个部件里创建一个初始附件
		local lastAttachment = Instance.new("Attachment", parts[1])
		-- 从第二个部件开始重复到最后
		for i = 2, #parts do
			local part = parts[i]
			-- 在这个部件里创建一个附件
			local nextAttachment = Instance.new("Attachment", part)
			-- 连接光束
			local newBeam = beam:Clone()
			newBeam.Attachment0 = lastAttachment
			newBeam.Attachment1 = nextAttachment
			newBeam.Parent = lastAttachment
			-- 设置最后一个附件
			lastAttachment = nextAttachment
		end
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.CurveSize0.documentation: 和 Beam.Attachment0 一起，确定 Beam（光束）贝塞尔曲线的第一个控制点的位置。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.Segments.documentation: 设置光束由多少个直线分段组成。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.Texture.documentation: 显示在 Beam（光束） 上纹理的内容 ID。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.TextureLength.documentation: 如果 Beam.TextureMode 为 'Wrap' 或是 'Static'，则设置 Beam 的长度。如果 Beam.TextureMode 为 'Stretch' ，则将由它决定相对于 Beam 长度的纹理大小。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.TextureMode.documentation: 决定 Beam.Texture 缩放及重复的方式。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.TextureSpeed.documentation: 决定 Beam.Texture 图像沿 Beam 移动的速度。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.Transparency.documentation: 决定 Beam（光束）所有分段的透明度。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.Width0.documentation: The width in studs of the Beam at its base.

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.Width1.documentation: Beam 在其末端以格计的宽度。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.ZOffset.documentation: 显示的 Beam （光束）相对于 Workspace.CurrentCamera 以格为单位的偏移距离。

@roblox/globaltype/Beam.SetTextureOffset.documentation: A Beam object connects two Attachments by drawing a texture between them.
要为纹理周期设置的偏移量
设置光束纹理周期的当前偏移量。

@roblox/globaltype/BevelMesh.documentation: 抽象类别，为 BlockMesh 和 CylinderMesh 的超类

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.documentation: Containers for GUI objects that appear in the 3D space

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.Active.documentation: 鼠标事件是否会被传递至分层在较下方的对象。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.Adornee.documentation: 设置采用 BillboardGui 装饰的部件或附件。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.AlwaysOn.documentation: 决定 BillboardGui 是否总是被渲染在其他对象之上。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.Brightne.documentation: Determines the factor by which the GUI's light is scaled when BillboardGui.LightInfluence is 0.

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.ClipsDes.documentation: 设为 true 时，在 BillboardGui 画布边框之外的 GuiObject 部分将不会被绘制。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.CurrentD.documentation: 当前 BillboardGui 与玩家镜头之间的距离，以格为单位

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.Distance.documentation: 决定 BillboardGui 停止放大时的距离
距离的增量取整到此值
决定 BillboardGui 停止缩小时的距离

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.ExtentsO.documentation: 决定 BillboardGui 从其所渲染的 BillboardGui.Adornee 偏移量，该参数与 Camera （镜头）的方向相对，并且单位尺寸是模型的 Camera （镜头）边框的一半。
决定 BillboardGui 相对于其 BillboardGui.Adornee 的偏移量，与全局轴相对，并且单位尺寸是模型的对齐边框尺寸的一半。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.LightInf.documentation: 控制 BillboardGui 受游戏世界内光源影响的程度。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.MaxDista.documentation: 设置广告牌可以显示在镜头中的最大距离。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.PlayerTo.documentation: 允许你定义无法看到 BillboardGui 的玩家。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.Size.documentation: 设置 BillboardGui 在 Roblox “世界”中显示的大小。

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.SizeOffs.documentation: 决定 BillboardGui 在 2D 空间中的偏移量；其单位相对于 BillboardGui.AbsoluteSize

@roblox/globaltype/BillboardGui.StudsOff.documentation: 决定 BillboardGui 相对于 BillboardGui.Adornee 方向的偏移量，与 Camera 相对，以格为单位。
决定 BillboardGui 相对于其 BillboardGui.Adornee 的偏移量，与全局轴相对，以格为单位。

@roblox/globaltype/BinaryStringValue.documentation: StringValue 对象的一个内部类型，其中存储着一个 BinaryString 值。

@roblox/globaltype/BinaryStringValue.Cha.documentation: 当 BinaryStringValue 变更时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/BindableEvent.documentation: An object used to create custom Events that Scripts can fire and connect to.
@roblox/globaltype/BindableEvent.code_sample:
local be = script.Parent

-- 定义一个简单的函数
-- 用于连接至自定义事件
local function onEvent(...)
	print(...)
end
be.Event:Connect(onEvent)

-- 触发事件
be:Fire("Hello, world")

@roblox/globaltype/BindableEvent.Fire/pa.documentation: An object used to create custom Events that Scripts can fire and connect to.

@roblox/globaltype/BindableEvent.Fire.documentation: 触发 BindableEvent 时也将触发 BindableEvent.Event 事件。

@roblox/globaltype/BindableEvent.Event.documentation: 此事件在调用 BindableEvent:Fire 时触发。
@roblox/globaltype/BindableEvent.Event.code_sample:
local be = script.Parent

-- 定义一个简单的函数
-- 用于连接至自定义事件
local function onEvent(...)
	print(...)
end
be.Event:Connect(onEvent)

-- 触发事件
be:Fire("Hello, world")

@roblox/globaltype/BindableFunction.documentation: An object used to expose one function to other scripts
@roblox/globaltype/BindableFunction.code_sample:
local bf = script.Parent

-- 定义一个用于 BindableFunction 的函数
local function AddTwoNumbers(a, b)
	return a + b
end

-- 将 OnInvoke 回调设为我们的函数
bf.OnInvoke = AddTwoNumbers

-- 调用 BindableFunction
print(bf:Invoke(25, 44))

@roblox/globaltype/BindableFunction.Invo.documentation: An object used to expose one function to other scripts
调用 BindableFunction 的 BindableFunction.OnInvoke 回调，将返回任何值（如果存在值的话）

@roblox/globaltype/BindableFunction.OnIn.documentation: 这些是调用 BindableFunction 时发送的参数。

@roblox/globaltype/BindableFunction.OnIn.code_sample:
local bf = script.Parent

-- 定义一个用于 BindableFunction 的函数
local function AddTwoNumbers(a, b)
	return a + b
end

-- 将 OnInvoke 回调设为我们的函数
bf.OnInvoke = AddTwoNumbers

-- 调用 BindableFunction
print(bf:Invoke(25, 44))

@roblox/globaltype/BlockMesh.documentation: BlockMesh 对象将“块”网格应用于作为其父项的 BasePart。它的行为与 SpecialMesh.MeshType 设置为 'Brick’ 的 SpecialMesh 相同。
@roblox/globaltype/BlockMesh.code_sample:
-- 用块状网格将零件实例化
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)
    part.Size = Vector3.new(5, 2, 5)
    part.Anchored = true 
    local mesh = Instance.new("BlockMesh", part)
    
    -- 设置网格的比例和偏移
    mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(0.5, 0.5, 0.5)
    mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)
    
    -- 添加选择框以高亮零件
    local adornment = Instance.new("SelectionBox", part)
    adornment.Adornee = part
    
    -- workspace的父项
    part.Parent = workspace

@roblox/globaltype/BodyForce.documentation: Applies a constant force to an object

@roblox/globaltype/Bone.TransformedWorld.documentation: Describes the combined Attachment.CFrame offset of the bone and the current animation offset in world space.

@roblox/globaltype/Button.documentation: Represents a Plugin button inside of a Toolbar. Can only be created by using Toolbar:CreateButton. Once created, a button cannot be removed.

@roblox/globaltype/Button.Enabled.documentation:
Indicates whether or not this plugin button is available to be used.
When set to false, the button's image will become gray-scaled and the `Button.Click` event will not fire when clicking on the button.

@roblox/globaltype/Button.Icon.documentation: The icon that is being displayed on this plugin button.

@roblox/globaltype/Button.SetActive/para.documentation: Represents a Plugin button inside of a Toolbar. Can only be created by using Toolbar:CreateButton. Once created, a button cannot be removed.

@roblox/globaltype/Button.SetActive.documentation: Activates the button making a blue box appear around it if the argument is true. Otherwise it hides the blue box.

@roblox/globaltype/Button.Click.documentation: Fired when the plugin button is clicked.

@roblox/globaltype/CacheableContentProvi.documentation: 缓存已接收资产的 ContentProvider 的变体。此服务并非直接使用，而是由从其继承的服务来使用。

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.CFrame.documentation: Camera 的 DataType.CFrame，决定了它在 3D 世界中的位置和朝向

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.CameraSubject.documentation: 为 Camera 主体的 Humanoid 或者 BasePart

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.CameraType.documentation: 指定将要被镜头脚本读取的 Enum.CameraType

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.Focus.documentation: Sets the area in 3D space that is prioritized by Roblox's graphical systems

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.HeadLocked.documentation: 负责切换 Camera 是否会自动追踪使用 VR 设备的玩家的头部运动

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.HeadScale.documentation: 设置使用 VR 时用户头部的相对比例

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.NearPlaneZ.documentation: 描述近截面 Camera 的负 z-offset（Z 偏移），以格为单位

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.ViewportSize.documentation: 描述客户端视口的尺寸（以像素为单位）

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.CoordinateFram.documentation: 旧版本的 Camera.CFrame 属性，其功能与之相同。 此项目应在 LocalScript 中使用，以便按预期在线工作。

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetPanSpeed/pa.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetPanSpeed.documentation: 返回 Camera 当前的 ‘pan’ 速度

投射点的 DataType.Vector3 位置数组
将被忽略的Instance的数组及其子代
一个 BasePart 数组，该数组遮蔽Camera的 Camera.CFrame 和 castPoints 之间的视线
返回一个 BasePart 数组，该数组遮蔽Camera的 Camera.CFrame 和 castPoints 之间的视线

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetRenderCFram.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
Camera 正在以何种 DataType.CFrame 被渲染
返回 Camera 被渲染的实际 DataType.CFrame（包括应用的任意滚动以及 VR 设备的影响）

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetRoll/param/.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetRoll/return.documentation: 通过 Camera:SetRoll 应用的当前滚动角度，单位为弧度

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetRoll.documentation: 返回通过 Camera:SetRoll 应用至 Camera 的当前滚动、或是绕 Camera 的 Z 轴的旋转之角度（单位为弧度）

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetTiltSpeed/p.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetTiltSpeed.documentation: 返回 Camera 当前的 ‘tilt’ （倾斜）速度

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.ScreenPointToR.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
发射 DataType.Ray 的屏幕点的 X 轴上的位置（以像素为单位）。此位置考虑 GUI 嵌入
发射 DataType.Ray 的屏幕点的 Y 轴上的位置（以像素为单位）。此位置考虑 GUI 嵌入
距 DataType.Ray 原点与之偏移的 Camera 的深度（以格为单位）
一种单元 DataType.Ray，发射自距 Camera 一定深度处给定屏幕坐标的等效 DataType.Vector3 世界位置。射线的方向与 Camera 的方向一致
以朝向Camera的方向，通过设置的距 Camera 的深度，在屏幕上的某个位置创建单位 DataType.Ray（以像素为单位）。考虑 GUI 嵌入
@roblox/globaltype/Camera.ScreenPointToR.code_sample:
local Camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
local Player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer
local Mouse = Player:GetMouse()
 
--这将创建一个以返回 [[Ray]] 的原点为中心并面向相同方向的立方体。 立方体的中心将于镜头前面一格单位的距离。
Mouse.Button1Down:Connect(function()
	local ray = Camera:ScreenPointToRay(Mouse.X, Mouse.Y, 1)
    local cube = Instance.new("Part", workspace)
    cube.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
    cube.CFrame = CFrame.new(ray.Origin, ray.Origin + ray.Direction)
    cube.Anchored = true
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.SetCameraPanMo.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
设置在移动设备上将被 Camera 使用的 Enum.CameraPanMode

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.SetRoll/param/.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
应用于 Camera 的滚动角度（以弧度为单位）

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.SetRoll.documentation: 设置围绕Camera的 Z 轴应用的当前旋转

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.ViewportPointT.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
发射 DataType.Ray 的视口点的 X 轴上的位置（以像素为单位）。此位置不考虑 GUI 嵌入
发射 DataType.Ray 的视口点的 Y 轴上的位置（以像素为单位）。此位置不考虑 GUI 嵌入
距 DataType.Ray 原点与之偏移的 Camera 的深度（以格为单位）
一种单元 DataType.Ray，发射自距 Camera 一定深度处给定视口坐标的等效 DataType.Vector3 世界位置。射线方向与 Camera 的方向一致
以朝向Camera的方向，通过给定的距 Camera 的深度，在视口上的某个位置创建单位 DataType.Ray（以像素为单位）。不考虑 GUI 嵌入

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.WorldToScreenP.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
一个元组，按顺序包括： 一个 DataType.Vector3，其 X 和 Y 分量表示 worldPoint 距屏幕左上角的偏移（以像素为单位）。DataType.Vector3 的 Z 分量表示 worldPoint 距屏幕的深度（以格为单位）。 一个布尔值，指示 worldPoint 是否在屏幕的边界内
返回世界中 DataType.Vector3 位置的 2D 屏幕位置、距离屏幕的深度以及是否可见。负责 GUI 嵌入

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.WorldToViewpor.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
一个元组，按顺序包括： 一个 DataType.Vector3，其 X 和 Y 分量表示 worldPoint 距视口左上角的偏移（以像素为单位）。DataType.Vector3 的 Z 分量表示 worldPoint 距屏幕的深度（以格为单位）。 一个布尔值，指示 worldPoint 是否在视口的边界内。
返回世界中 DataType.Vector3 位置的 2D 屏幕位置，但不考虑 GUI 嵌入
@roblox/globaltype/Camera.WorldToViewpor.code_sample:
local function isPointVisible(worldPoint)
    local camera = workspace.CurrentCamera
    local vector, onScreen = camera:WorldToViewportPoint(worldPoint)
    
    if onScreen then
        local origin = camera.CFrame.p
        local ray = Ray.new(origin, worldPoint - origin)
        local hit = workspace:FindPartOnRay(ray)
        if hit then
            return false
        end
    else
        return false
    end
    return true
end

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.GetLargestCuto.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
将忽略掉的一组 Instance。这些实例的子代也将被忽略
要想确保 Camera 的 Camera.Focus 和 Camera.CFrame 二者之间没有障碍物，Camera 所需要朝其 Camera.Focus 推进的距离（以格计）。
返回如想确保 Camera.Focus 和 Camera.CFrame 二者之间没有障碍物，Camera 需朝其 Camera.Focus 推进的距离（以格计）。

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.Interpolate/pa.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
渐变的持续时间（以秒计）

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.Interpolate.documentation: 在给定的时间内，以线性方式将 Camera 向新的 Camera.CFrame 和 Camera.Focus 进行渐变。

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.PanUnits/param.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
Camera 进行平移的数值为 45 度的倍数

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.PanUnits.documentation: 将 Camera 置于 Y 轴上，绕其 Camera.Focus 平移，单位为 45 度

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.TiltUnits/para.documentation: 用于定义 3D 游戏世界的视角。
旋转 Camera 的数值，基本单位为 10 度

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.TiltUnits/retu.documentation: Camera 应用的旋转是否被约束

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.TiltUnits.documentation: 使 Camera 在 Camera X 轴上倾斜，绕其 Camera.Focus 旋转，单位为 10 度

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.FirstPersonTra.documentation: 当本地用户的 Camera 切换到或退出第一人称模式时触发

@roblox/globaltype/Camera.InterpolationF.documentation: 当 Camera 使用 Camera:Interpolate 完成插值时触发

@roblox/globaltype/CFrameValue.documentation: A container object for a single CFrame value.
@roblox/globaltype/CFrameValue.code_sample:
-- 创建一个 CFrame 来存储镜头当前的位置或者方向
local vSnapshot = Instance.new("CFrameValue")
vSnapshot.Value = workspace.CurrentCamera.CFrame
vSnapshot.Name = "Snapshot"
vSnapshot.Parent = workspace

-- 稍后我们可以将 CFrame 加载回镜头之中
workspace.CurrentCamera.CFrame = vSnapshot.Value

@roblox/globaltype/CFrameValue.Value.documentation: 用来存储一个CFrame 值。

@roblox/globaltype/CFrameValue.Changed.documentation: Fired whenever the CFrameValue.Value of the CFrameValue is changed.

@roblox/globaltype/ChangeHistoryService..documentation: 返回是否有可以重做的操作，如果有，则返回最后一个操作。
返回是否有可以撤消的操作，如果有，则返回最后一个操作。
清除历史记录，导致删除所有撤消/重做路径点。
设置一个新路径点，可用作撤消或重做的节点。
@roblox/globaltype/ChangeHistoryService..code_sample:
local ChangeHistoryService = game:GetService("ChangeHistoryService")
local Selection = game:GetService("Selection")

local toolbar = plugin:CreateToolbar("Example Plugin")
local button = toolbar:CreateButton("Neon it up", "", "")

button.Click:Connect(function()
    local parts = {}
    for _,part in pairs(Selection:Get()) do
        if part:IsA("BasePart") then
            parts[#parts+1] = part
        end
    end

    if #parts > 0 then
        ChangeHistoryService:SetWaypoint("Setting selection to neon")
        for _,part in pairs(parts) do
            part.Material = Enum.Material.Neon
        end
        ChangeHistoryService:SetWaypoint("Set selection to neon")
    end
end

@roblox/globaltype/ChangeHistoryService..documentation: 撤消上一次执行的、且存有路径点的操作。
在用户撤消掉撤消命令时触发。Waypoint 描述已经重做的输入操作。
用户在 studio 中撤消掉一个操作时触发。Waypoint 描述已经撤消的输入操作。

@roblox/globaltype/ClickDetector.documentation: An object that provides user input on in-world BasePart and Model
@roblox/globaltype/ClickDetector.code_sample:
local clickDetector = script.Parent

local function onClicked(player)
	-- 给玩家展示一条信息
	local msg = Instance.new("Message")
	msg.Parent = player:FindFirstChild("PlayerGui")
	msg.Text = "Hello, " .. player.Name
	wait(2.5)
	msg:Destroy()
end
-- 将函数与 MouseClick 事件连接
clickDetector.MouseClick:Connect(onClicked)

@roblox/globaltype/ContentProvider.code_sample:
local ContentProvider = game:GetService("ContentProvider")
 
local logoId = "rbxassetid://658743164"
local pageTurnId = "rbxassetid://12222076"
 
local decal = Instance.new("Decal")
decal.Texture = logoId
 
local sound = Instance.new("Sound")
sound.SoundId = pageTurnId
 
local assets = { decal, sound }
 
ContentProvider:PreloadAsync(assets)
 
print("All assets loaded.")

@roblox/globaltype/CoreGui.documentation: CoreGui 是一项 Roblox 所提供的服务项，用于储存各种 GUI ，主要为那些所有游戏中都会用到的核心用户界面（如游戏菜单、玩家列表、背包等等）。它也可以被 Roblox Studio 中的 Plugin 使用。

@roblox/globaltype/CSGDictionaryService.documentation: CSGDictionaryService 是一个内部服务，它存储 BinaryStringValue 对象的缓存，各个值代表实体建模数据的唯一数据集。

@roblox/globaltype/CustomEventReceiver.S.documentation: 在 CustomEvent 源的值被更改时触发，传递 CustomEvent 的新值。

@roblox/globaltype/CylinderMesh.documentation: CylinderMesh 对象给自己的父项BasePart施加一个‘cylinder’网格
@roblox/globaltype/CylinderMesh.code_sample:
-- 实例化一个带有 cylindermesh 的部件
    local part = Instance.new("Part")
    part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 2, 0)
    part.Size = Vector3.new(10, 2, 5) -- 10 x 5 to demonstrate resizing
    part.Anchored = true 
    local mesh = Instance.new("CylinderMesh", part)
    
    -- 设置好网格的缩放和偏移
    mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)
    mesh.Offset = Vector3.new(0, 0, 0)
    
    -- 给高亮的部件添加一个 selectionbox
    local adornment = Instance.new("SelectionBox", part)
    adornment.Adornee = part
    
    -- 设置为 workspace 的子项
    part.Parent = workspace

@roblox/globaltype/CylindricalConstraint.documentation: 角驱动器类型：None、Motor 或者 Servo。
启用旋转轴周围的角限制。
两个极限的恢复系数，或者说是它们的弹性程度，在 [0, 1] 区间内。
目标角速度。这个值没有符号，因为伺服系统总会朝向它的目标移动，单位是弧度每秒，值的区间是 [0, inf) 。
环绕旋转轴的电机的目标角速度，单位是弧度每秒，值的区间是 [0, inf) 。
在旋转轴周围的Attachment1 的基准轴和副轴之间带符号的夹角（单位是度），值的区间在 [-180, 180]。
以Attachment0 的 xy 平面中的x轴与旋转轴的夹角作为旋转轴的方向，值的区间是 [-180, 180] 。
位于旋转轴周围 Attachment1 的基准轴和副轴之间的夹角（单位是度）的下限，值区间是 [-180, 180] 。
电机的最大角加速度值 ，单位是弧度每秒，值区间是 [0, inf) 。
为达到目标角速度，电机可以施加的最大扭矩。单元是 mass * studs^2 / second^2 ，值区间是 [0, inf) 。
伺服系统的电机能施加的最大扭矩，单元是 mass * studs^2 / second^2 ，值区间是 [0, inf) 。
位于旋转轴周围的 Attachment1 副轴和基准轴之间的目标夹角（单位是度），值区间为 [-180, 180] 。

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PlaceVersio.code_sample:
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")

-- 创建 screenGui
local versionGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")

-- 创建 textLabel
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")

-- 将其放在屏幕右下角
textLabel.Position = UDim2.new(1, -10, 1, 0)
textLabel.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(1, 1)
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 150, 0, 40)

-- 对文本设定进行配置
textLabel.BackgroundTransparency = 1
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 1)
textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = 0
textLabel.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Right
textLabel.TextScaled = true

-- 显示版本号
local placeVersion = game.PlaceVersion
textLabel.Text = string.format("Server version: %s", placeVersion)
textLabel.Parent = versionGui

-- 将其父项设为 StarterGui
versionGui.Parent = StarterGui

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PrivateServ.documentation: 用于描述该服务器的私人服务器 ID，前提是该服务器是 Articles/Creating a VIP Server on Roblox|VIP 服务器或TeleportService/ReserveServer|预留服务器。
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PrivateServ.code_sample:
local function getServerType()
	if game.PrivateServerId ~= "" then
		if game.PrivateServerOwnerId ~= 0 then
			return "VIPServer"
		else
			return "ReservedServer"
		end
	else
		return "StandardServer"
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PrivateServ.documentation: 在当前服务器为 VIP 服务器的前提下，描述拥有该 Articles/Creating a VIP Server on Roblox|VIP 服务器的 Player 的 Player.UserId
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.PrivateServ.code_sample:
local function getServerType()
	if game.PrivateServerId ~= "" then
		if game.PrivateServerOwnerId ~= 0 then
			return "VIPServer"
		else
			return "ReservedServer"
		end
	else
		return "StandardServer"
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GetJobsInfo.code_sample:
local jobInfo = game:GetJobsInfo()
local jobTitles = jobInfo[1]

table.remove(jobInfo,1)

local divider = string.rep("-",120)
print(divider)
warn("JOB INFO:")
print(divider)

for _,job in pairs(jobInfo) do
	for jobIndex,jobValue in pairs(job) do
		local jobTitle = jobTitles[jobIndex]
		warn(jobTitle,"=",jobValue)
	end
	print(divider)
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GetObjects/.documentation: The DataModel (commonly known as game after the global variable used to access it) is the root of Roblox's parent-child hierarchy. Its direct children are services (such as the Workspace and Lighting) that act as the fundamental components of a Roblox game.
一组与Articles.Content URL 关联的Instance

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GetObjects.documentation: 返回与给定Articles.Content URL 关联的一组Instance
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.GetObjects.code_sample:
local Selection = game:GetService("Selection")

local function downloadPlugin(webURL)
    -- 获取内容 URL
    local contentID = string.match(webURL, "%d+")
    local contentURL = "rbxassetid://"..contentID

    -- 下载对象
    local objects = game:GetObjects(contentURL)

    -- 决定其父项
    local selection = Selection:Get()
    local parent = #selection == 1 and selection[1] or workspace

    -- 为对象设置父项
    for _, object in pairs(objects) do
        object.Parent = parent
    end
end

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.IsLoaded/pa.documentation: The DataModel (commonly known as game after the global variable used to access it) is the root of Roblox's parent-child hierarchy. Its direct children are services (such as the Workspace and Lighting) that act as the fundamental components of a Roblox game.

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.IsLoaded/re.documentation: 客户端是否已完成第一次游戏加载

@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.IsLoaded.documentation: 如果客户端已完成第一次游戏加载，则返回 true
@roblox/globaltype/DataModel.IsLoaded.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local player = Players.LocalPlayer 
local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

-- 创建一个基本加载屏幕
local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
screenGui.IgnoreGuiInset = true
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
textLabel.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0, 20, 40)
textLabel.Font = Enum.Font.GothamSemibold
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
textLabel.Text = "Loading"
textLabel.TextSize = 28
textLabel.Parent = screenGui
-- 将整个屏幕 GUI 设为玩家 GUI 的子项
screenGui.Parent = playerGui

-- 移除默认的加载屏幕
ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()

--wait(3)  -- 可选择强制此屏幕最少显示几秒
if not game:IsLoaded() then
	game.Loaded:Wait()
end
screenGui:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/Debris.documentation: The Debris service allows the developer to schedule the removal of the object without yielding any code, through the usage of the Debris:AddItem method.
@roblox/globaltype/Debris.code_sample:
local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")

local ball = Instance.new("Part")
ball.Anchored = false
ball.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball
ball.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
ball.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
ball.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)

while true do
	newBall = ball:Clone()
	newBall.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
	newBall.CFrame = CFrame.new(0, 30, 0)
	newBall.Velocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-10, 10), 0, math.random(-10, 10))
	newBall.Parent = game.Workspace
	Debris:AddItem(newBall, 2)
	wait(0.1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Debris.MaxItems.documentation: 旧版本中每次能够分配给 Debris 服务的最大对象数量。

@roblox/globaltype/Debris.AddItem/param/.documentation: The Debris service allows the developer to schedule the removal of the object without yielding any code, through the usage of the Debris:AddItem method.

@roblox/globaltype/Debris.AddItem.documentation: AddItem 方法允许开发者对对象的移除进行提前安排，以避免代码暂停问题。
@roblox/globaltype/Debris.AddItem.code_sample:
local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")

local ball = Instance.new("Part")
ball.Anchored = false
ball.Shape = Enum.PartType.Ball
ball.TopSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
ball.BottomSurface = Enum.SurfaceType.Smooth
ball.Size = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1)

while true do
	newBall = ball:Clone()
	newBall.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
	newBall.CFrame = CFrame.new(0, 30, 0)
	newBall.Velocity = Vector3.new(math.random(-10, 10), 0, math.random(-10, 10))
	newBall.Parent = game.Workspace
	Debris:AddItem(newBall, 2)
	wait(0.1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/DebugSettings.DataMod.documentation: 描述 DataModel 是否在内存中处于活动状态并以整数形式存在（1 = true， 0 = false）。

@roblox/globaltype/DebugSettings.Instanc.documentation: 在模拟中启动的实例数量。

@roblox/globaltype/DebugSettings.IsScrip.documentation: 对于错误信息，是否在输出中显示堆栈跟踪。

@roblox/globaltype/DebugSettings.JobCoun.documentation: 返回目前正在被处理的内部 DataModel 任务数量。

@roblox/globaltype/DebugSettings.ReportS.documentation: 是否应该报告声音警告。

@roblox/globaltype/DebugSettings.RobloxV.documentation: Roblox 当前客户端版本，也可以使用 version() 函数来进行检索。

@roblox/globaltype/DebugSettings.TickCou.documentation: 设置内部抽样方法来衡量各平台的时间流逝是否一致。

@roblox/globaltype/Decal.documentation: The Decal object is an object which applies an image to a face of a BasePart.

@roblox/globaltype/Decal.LocalTransparen.documentation: 作为 Decal 的 Decal.Transparency 属性的倍数因子。效果只对本地玩家可见。

@roblox/globaltype/Decal.Texture.documentation: Decal 将要应用的图像的 ContentId。

@roblox/globaltype/Decal.Transparency.documentation: 决定 Decal 的透明度，0 代表完全不透明，1 代表完全透明。
@roblox/globaltype/Decal.Transparency.code_sample:
local TweenService = game:GetService("TweenService")

-- 创建部件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Size = Vector3.new(10, 10, 1)
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)
part.Anchored = true
part.Transparency = 1

-- 创建贴花
local decal = Instance.new("Decal", part)
decal.Face = Enum.NormalId.Front
decal.Texture = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=699259085" -- Roblox 标志

-- 添加至工作区
part.Parent = workspace

-- 创建渐变
local tween = TweenService:Create(decal,
	TweenInfo.new(1, Enum.EasingStyle.Linear, Enum.EasingDirection.Out, -1, true),
	{Transparency = 1}
)

-- 播放渐变
tween:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/Decal.ZIndex.documentation: Determines the rendering order when multiple Decals are assigned the same face

@roblox/globaltype/DepthOfFieldEffect.documentation: Simulates a camera lens by blurring parts of a scene not in focus

@roblox/globaltype/DepthOfFieldEffect.In.documentation: 控制从 DepthOfFieldEffect.FocusDistance 向外的距离，在这段距离上不应用模糊。

@roblox/globaltype/Dialog.GetCurrentPlay.code_sample:
local dialog = script.Parent

local function onChoiceSelected(player, choice)
	local currentPlayers = dialog:GetCurrentPlayers()
	print("The current players in the dialog:")
	for _, player in ipairs(currentPlayers) do
		print(player)
	end
end

dialog.DialogChoiceSelected:Connect(onChoiceSelected)

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.documentation: Represents a 3D rotation curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve child instances.

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.Ge.documentation: Represents a 3D rotation curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve child instances.

Samples the 3 FloatCurves (X, Y, Z) at the time passed as argument. Returns the result as 3 Euler angles. If a channel curve is missing or no key is found in the curve the channel is evaluated as nil.
Represents a 3D rotation curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve child instances.
Samples the EulerRotationCurve at a given time and returns the corresponding rotation. Empty Euler angles channels are interpreted as zero.

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.X/.documentation: Represents a 3D rotation curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve child instances.

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.X.documentation: Returns the FloatCurve controlling the X Euler angle channel. It is the first child instance of type FloatCurve named X. If none is found an empty FloatCurve is created.

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.Y/.documentation: Represents a 3D rotation curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve child instances.

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.Y.documentation: Returns the FloatCurve controlling the Y channel. It is the first child instance of type FloatCurve named 'Y'. If none is found an empty FloatCurve is created.

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.Z/.documentation: Represents a 3D rotation curve, it groups 3 FloatCurve, stored as 3 FloatCurve child instances.

@roblox/globaltype/EulerRotationCurve.Z.documentation: Returns the FloatCurve controlling the Z channel. It is the first child instance of type FloatCurve named Z. If none is found an empty FloatCurve is created.

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.documentation: An Explosion applies force to BaseParts within the explosion's Explosion.BlastRadius. This force breaks joints between parts and kills Humanoid characters not protected by a ForceField.
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.code_sample:
local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
explosion.BlastRadius = 60
explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.Craters -- 破坏地形
explosion.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
explosion.Parent = game.Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.BlastPressu.documentation: 用来确定当BasePart被卷入Explosion.BlastRadius时所受到的力的大小。

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.BlastRadius.documentation: 此属性将确定 Explosion 的半径（以格为单位）。此半径确定爆炸效果面积，而不是爆炸视觉效果大小。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.BlastRadius.code_sample:
local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
explosion.BlastRadius = 60
explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.Craters -- 破坏地形
explosion.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
explosion.Parent = game.Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.DestroyJoin.documentation: 用于Explosion.BlastRadius的比例设置，值在 0 和 1 之间，在其范围内所有的关节都会被毁，在其范围外的东西只会受到Explosion力的影响。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.DestroyJoin.code_sample:
-- 添加到 workspace 的新 Explosion 的列表
workspace.DescendantAdded:Connect(function(instance)
	if instance:IsA("Explosion") then
		local explosion = instance
		-- 将 DestroyJointRadiusPercent 设置为 0
		explosion.DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0
		-- 实现我们自己的 DestroyJointRadiusPercent
		local destroyJointRadiusPercent = 1
		explosion.Hit:Connect(function(part, distance)
			-- 检查下部件是否在可以破坏关节的范围内
			if distance <= destroyJointRadiusPercent * explosion.BlastRadius then
				-- 确认部件不属于角色
				if not game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(part.Parent) then
					-- 破坏部件
					part:BreakJoints()
				end
			end
		end)
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.ExplosionTy.documentation: 此属性决定 Explosion 与 Terrain 的交互方式。用于设置爆炸是否会破坏地形。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.ExplosionTy.code_sample:
game.Workspace.DescendantAdded:Connect(function(descendant)
	if descendant:IsA("Explosion") then
		descendant.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters
		descendant:GetPropertyChangedSignal("ExplosionType"):Connect(function()
			descendant.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.NoCraters
		end)
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Position.documentation: 此属性是 Explosion 的中心位置。它是定义在世界空间中的，不受 Explosion 的父级的影响。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Position.code_sample:
local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
explosion.BlastRadius = 60
explosion.ExplosionType = Enum.ExplosionType.Craters -- 破坏地形
explosion.Position = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
explosion.Parent = game.Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Visible.documentation: 此属性决定是否显示Explosion的视觉效果。
@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Visible.code_sample:
local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")

local function customExplosion(position)
	local explosion = Instance.new("Explosion")
	explosion.Position = position
	explosion.Visible = false 
	
	local attachment = Instance.new("Attachment", workspace.Terrain)
	attachment.Position = position
	
	local particleEmitter = Instance.new("ParticleEmitter")
	particleEmitter.Enabled = false 
	particleEmitter.Parent = attachment 
	particleEmitter.Speed = NumberRange.new(5, 30)
	particleEmitter.SpreadAngle = Vector2.new(-90, 90)

	explosion.Parent = workspace 
	particleEmitter:Emit(20)

	Debris:AddItem(attachment, 5) -- 清除附件
end

@roblox/globaltype/Explosion.Hit.documentation: 当 Explosion 在其 Explosion.BlastRadius 内命中 BasePart 时触发。将返回命中的部件及其与 Explosion.Position 的距离。

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.Funneler.documentation: Makes a 'O' shape with the mouth

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.JawDrop.documentation: Lowers the jaw downward opening the mouth

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.JawRight.documentation: Moves mouth and jaw to the right (character right)

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.LeftDimp.documentation: Moves the corners of the mouth back in Z

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.LeftInne.documentation: Raises the interior half of the left brow upwards

Raises the corners of the mouth upwards in a smile

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.LeftLipS.documentation: Stretches the corners of the mouth apart

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.LeftLowe.documentation: Lowers the lower lip down away from the upper lip revealing the lower teeth

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.LipsToge.documentation: Brings the lips together relative to JawDrop

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.LowerLip.documentation: Rolls the lower lip up over the teeth

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.Pucker.documentation: Makes a kiss-like shape with the mouth

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.RightDim.documentation: Moves the corners of the mouth back in Z

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.RightEye.documentation: Raises the right eyelid upwards to reveal more of the eye white above the iris

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.RightInn.documentation: Raises the interior half of the right brow upwards

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.RightLip.documentation: Lowers the corners of the mouth downwards in a frown
Raises the corners of the mouth upwards in a smile
Stretches the corners of the mouth apart

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.RightLow.documentation: Lowers the lower lip down away from the upper lip revealing the lower teeth

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.RightNos.documentation: Raises the right nostril, pulls the brow down slightly, and wrinkles on the side of the nose

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.RightOut.documentation: Raises the outer part of the right brow upwards

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.RightUpp.documentation: Raises the right upper lip away from the lower lip revealing the upper teeth

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.TongueOu.documentation: Extends the tip of the tongue out of the mouth

@roblox/globaltype/FaceControls.UpperLip.documentation: Rolls the upper lip around the teeth

@roblox/globaltype/Fire.documentation: A particle emitter with the visual aesthetic of fire
@roblox/globaltype/Fire.code_sample:
for _, child in pairs(workspace:GetChildren()) do
	if child.Name == "Torch" and child:IsA("BasePart") then
		local fire = Instance.new("Fire")
		fire.Heat = 10
		fire.Color = child.Color
		fire.SecondaryColor = Color3.new(1, 1, 1) -- 白色
		fire.Size = math.max(child.Size.X, child.Size.Z) -- 在两个尺寸中选择较大的那个
		fire.Parent = child
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Fire.Enabled.documentation: 决定是否发射火焰粒子
@roblox/globaltype/Fire.Enabled.code_sample:
local part = script.Parent

local clickDetector = Instance.new("ClickDetector", part)
local fire = Instance.new("Fire", part)
local light = Instance.new("PointLight", part)

local function onClick()
	-- 切换火焰
	fire.Enabled = not fire.Enabled
	-- 如果火焰在发射的话，打开灯
	light.Enabled = fire.Enabled
end

clickDetector.MouseClick:Connect(onClick)

@roblox/globaltype/Flag.documentation: Flag 对象已经弃用，先前用于制作夺旗赛类游戏

@roblox/globaltype/Flag.TeamColor.documentation: 此旗帜代表哪一只 Team 队伍，与 Teams 服务中的 TeamColors 相对应。

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.documentation: A sorted list of time-value pairs (DataType.FloatCurveKey) that define a curve. Used to animate a single numerical value.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.Length.documentation: Number of keys in the float curve.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.GetKeyAtIn.documentation: A sorted list of time-value pairs (DataType.FloatCurveKey) that define a curve. Used to animate a single numerical value.
Returns a copy of a key at a given index.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.GetKeyIndi.documentation: A sorted list of time-value pairs (DataType.FloatCurveKey) that define a curve. Used to animate a single numerical value.
Returns key indices before and after time.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.GetKeys/pa.documentation: A sorted list of time-value pairs (DataType.FloatCurveKey) that define a curve. Used to animate a single numerical value.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.GetKeys.documentation: Returns a copy of all the keys in the FloatCurve as a Lua array of FloatCurveKey

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.GetValueAt.documentation: A sorted list of time-value pairs (DataType.FloatCurveKey) that define a curve. Used to animate a single numerical value.
Samples the float curve at a given time passed as argument.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.InsertKey/.documentation: A sorted list of time-value pairs (DataType.FloatCurveKey) that define a curve. Used to animate a single numerical value.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.InsertKey.documentation: Adds the key passed as argument to this curve.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.RemoveKeyA.documentation: A sorted list of time-value pairs (DataType.FloatCurveKey) that define a curve. Used to animate a single numerical value.
Removes a given number of Keys starting from a given index. Returns the number of keys that were removed.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.SetKeys/pa.documentation: A sorted list of time-value pairs (DataType.FloatCurveKey) that define a curve. Used to animate a single numerical value.

@roblox/globaltype/FloatCurve.SetKeys.documentation: Resets this curve’s keys using the FloatCurveKey array passed as argument.

@roblox/globaltype/FloorWire.documentation: FloorWire 会尝试基于它的两个属性 FloorWire.From 和 FloorWire.From 来创建一根线缆，二者都需要设置为 BasePart 。

@roblox/globaltype/FloorWire.CycleOffset.documentation: 一个 0 到 1 之间的小数，可通过其控制所有贴花距离线缆的距离。

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.documentation: An object that exposes methods to access a single data store
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	local scope = "Player_" .. player.UserId
	local playerStats = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Stats", scope)
	local playerResources = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Resources", scope)
	-- GetAsync()/UpdateAsync() 现在可以在‘Stats’和‘Resources’数据存储上调用了
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.GetAs.documentation: An object that exposes methods to access a single data store

The key name for which the value is requested. If DataStoreOptions.AllScopes was set to true when accessing the data store through DataStoreService:GetDataStore, this key name must be prepended with the original scope as in "scope/key".

The value of the entry in the data store with the given key and a DataStoreKeyInfo instance that includes the version number, date and time the version was created, and functions to retrieve Player.UserId and metadata.
返回具有指定键的数据存储和 DataStoreKeyInfo 实例的条目的值。

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Incre.documentation: An object that exposes methods to access a single data store
待删除的键名。如果 DataStoreOptions.AllScopes 在通过 DataStoreService:GetDataStore 访问数据存储时设置为 true，则该键名必须与“scope/key”中的原始作用域加在一起。
（可选） 用于与键关联的 Player.UserId （用户 ID ）表格。
（可选） DataStoreIncrementOptions （数据存储增量选项）实例，可将多个额外参数组合为自定义元数据并且具备未来可拓展性。
具有指定键的数据存储中的条目的值。
增加特定键的值并返回增量值（都必须是整数）。

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Remov.documentation: An object that exposes methods to access a single data store
待删除的键名。如果 DataStoreOptions.AllScopes 在通过 DataStoreService:GetDataStore 访问数据存储时设置为 true，则该键名必须与“scope/key”中的原始作用域加在一起。
删除之前的数据存储的值和一个 DataStoreKeyInfo 实例，该实例包括版本号、创建版本的日期和时间，以及检索 Player.UserId和metadata 的函数。
从数据存储中移除指定键并返回与该键相关联的值。
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Remov.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")

-- Enable experimental features (beta period only)
local options = Instance.new("DataStoreOptions")
options:SetExperimentalFeatures({["v2"] = true})

local nicknameStore = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Nicknames", nil, options)

local success, removedValue, keyInfo = pcall(function()
	return nicknameStore:RemoveAsync("User_1234")
end)
if success then
	print(removedName)
	print(keyInfo.Version)
	print(keyInfo.CreatedTime)
	print(keyInfo.UpdatedTime)
	print(keyInfo:GetUserIds())
	print(keyInfo:GetMetadata())
end

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.SetAs.documentation: An object that exposes methods to access a single data store

Key name for which the value should be set. If DataStoreOptions.AllScopes was set to true when accessing the data store through DataStoreService:GetDataStore, this key name must be prepended with the original scope as in "scope/key".
具有指定键的数据存储中的条目的值。
Player.UserId（用户 ID）表格，强烈建议配合 articles/managing personal information|GDPR 跟踪/移除使用。
(Optional) DataStoreSetOptions instance that allows for metadata specification on the key.
新创建版本的版本标识符。它可以使用 GlobalDataStore.GetVersionAsync 检索关键信息或使用 GlobalDataStore.RemoveVersionAsync 删除它。
设置键的值，覆盖存储在键中的现有数据。

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Updat.documentation: An object that exposes methods to access a single data store
待删除的键名。如果 DataStoreOptions.AllScopes 在通过 DataStoreService:GetDataStore 访问数据存储时设置为 true，则该键名必须与“scope/key”中的原始作用域加在一起。
Transform 函数，接受当前值和 DataStoreKeyInfo 作为参数，并返回新值以及可选的 Player.UserId 和元数据。
删除之前的数据存储的值和一个 DataStoreKeyInfo 实例，该实例包括版本号、创建版本的日期和时间，以及检索 Player.UserId 和 metadata 的函数。
从数据存储中检索一个指定键值并更新为一个新的值
@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.Updat.code_sample:
local DataStoreService = game:GetService("DataStoreService")

-- Enable experimental features (beta period only)
local options = Instance.new("DataStoreOptions")
options:SetExperimentalFeatures({["v2"] = true})

local nicknameStore = DataStoreService:GetDataStore("Nicknames", nil, options)

local function makeNameUpper(currentName, keyInfo)
	local nameUpper = string.upper(currentName)
	local userIDs = keyInfo:GetUserIds()
	local metadata = keyInfo:GetMetadata()
	return nameUpper, userIDs, metadata
end

local success, updatedName, keyInfo = pcall(function()
	return nicknameStore:UpdateAsync("User_1234", makeNameUpper)
end)
if success then
	print(updatedName)
	print(keyInfo.CreatedTime)
	print(keyInfo:GetMetadata())
end

@roblox/globaltype/GlobalDataStore.OnUpd.documentation: An object that exposes methods to access a single data store
识别从数据存储中检索的条目的键
在任何时候更改与键相关联的值时要执行的函数
指向被跟踪的键以进行更新的连接

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.documentation: GroupService is a service that allows developers to fetch information about a Roblox group from within a game.

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetAllie.documentation: GroupService is a service that allows developers to fetch information about a Roblox group from within a game.
返回一个 StandardPages 对象，其中包含给定群组所有盟友的信息。
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetAllie.code_sample:
local Players = Game:GetService("Players")

--创建包含给定群组所有盟友的表格
local allies = {}
local groupID = 57

local pages = game:GetService("GroupService"):GetAlliesAsync(groupID)
while true do
   for _,group in pairs(pages:GetCurrentPage()) do
      table.insert(allies, group)
   end
   if pages.IsFinished then
      break
   end
   pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
end

function OnPlayerAdded(player)
   for _,group in pairs(allies) do
      if player:IsInGroup(group.Id) then
         print("Player is an ally!")
      end
   end
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(OnPlayerAdded)
--处理在盟友列表加载时就进入游戏的玩家
for _,player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
   OnPlayerAdded(player)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetEnemi.documentation: GroupService is a service that allows developers to fetch information about a Roblox group from within a game.
返回一个 StandardPages 对象，其中包含给定群组所有敌人的信息。
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetEnemi.code_sample:
-- creates a list of all of the enemies of a given group
local enemies = {}
local groupId = 57

local pages = game:GetService("GroupService"):GetEnemiesAsync(groupId)
while true do
   for _, group in pairs(pages:GetCurrentPage()) do
      table.insert(enemies, group)
   end
   if pages.IsFinished then
      break
   end
   pages:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
end

function onPlayerAdded(player)
   for _, enemyGroup in pairs(enemies) do
      if player:IsInGroup(enemyGroup.Id) then
          print("Player is an enemy!")
          break
       end
    end
end

game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)
-- handle players who joined while the enemies list was still loading
for _,player in pairs(game.Players:GetPlayers()) do
   onPlayerAdded(player)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetGroup.documentation: GroupService is a service that allows developers to fetch information about a Roblox group from within a game.
一个包含群组信息的字典。
返回一个表，其中包含有给定群组的信息。
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetGroup.code_sample:
local groupId = 377251
local group = game:GetService("GroupService"):GetGroupInfoAsync(groupId)

print(group.Name .. " has the following roles:")
for _, role in ipairs(group.Roles) do
   print("Rank " .. role.Rank .. ": " .. role.Name)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetGroup.documentation: GroupService is a service that allows developers to fetch information about a Roblox group from within a game.
字典的数组，包含有关 Player 所属群组的信息
返回表列表，这些列表中包含有关指定玩家所有所属群组的信息
@roblox/globaltype/GroupService.GetGroup.code_sample:
local GroupService = game:GetService("GroupService")
    local Players = game:GetService("Players")
    
    local function playerAdded(player)
    	-- 加载玩家所有所属群组的信息列表
    	local groups = GroupService:GetGroupsAsync(player.UserId)
    	
    	-- 浏览该列表
    	for _, groupInfo in pairs(groups) do
    
    		-- 打印所有条目
    		for key, value in pairs(groupInfo) do 
    			print(key..": "..tostring(value))
    		end
    
    		-- 打印分隔线
    		print("--")
    	end
    end
    
    -- 监听新玩家
    Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(playerAdded)
    
    -- 浏览已有玩家
    for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
    	playerAdded(player)
    end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Active.code_sample:
-- 将该 LocalScript 放置于 TextButton 中 (或是 ImageButton 中)
local textButton = script.Parent

-- 初始化按钮的状态
textButton.Text = "Click me"
textButton.Active = true

local function onActivated()
	-- 防止将来发生的 Activations
	-- 这就像防抖动一样
	textButton.Active = false

	-- 从 5 开始倒数
	for i = 5, 1, -1 do
		textButton.Text = "Time: " .. i
		wait(1)
	end
	textButton.Text = "Click me"
	
	-- 重新允许发生 activations 
	textButton.Active = true
end

textButton.Activated:Connect(onActivated)

-- 将该编码放入处于 Frame 内的 LocalScript 中
local frame = script.Parent

while true do
	for hue = 0, 255, 4 do
		-- HSV = hue, saturation, value
		-- 如果我们一直循环 0 到 1，就能得到彩虹！ 
		frame.BorderColor3 = Color3.fromHSV(hue/256, 1, 1)
		frame.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromHSV(hue/256, .5, .8)
		wait()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.BackgroundT.documentation: 定义 GuiObject 的背景和边框的透明度
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.BackgroundT.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local MIN_TRANSPARENCY = 0
local MAX_TRANSPARENCY = 0.9
local delta = 0

local function fadeGui()
	local element = script.Parent
	
	if element.BackgroundTransparency <= MIN_TRANSPARENCY then 
		delta = 0.01
	elseif element.BackgroundTransparency >= MAX_TRANSPARENCY then
		delta = -0.01
	end
	
	element.BackgroundTransparency = element.BackgroundTransparency + delta
end

RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(fadeGui)

-- 将此代码放在 GuiObject 中，最好是一个 ImageButton/TextButton
local button = script.Parent

local function onEnter()
	button.BorderSizePixel = 2
	button.BorderColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0) -- 黄色
end

local function onLeave()
	button.BorderSizePixel = 1
	button.BorderColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
end

-- 连接事件
button.MouseEnter:Connect(onEnter)
button.MouseLeave:Connect(onLeave)
-- 我们默认的状态是“没有悬停”
onLeave()

local GuiObject = script.Parent
local GuiService = game:GetService("GuiService")

local function gainFocus(gui)
	GuiObject.Selectable = true
	GuiService.SelectedObject = GuiObject
end

local function loseFocus(gui)
	GuiService.SelectedObject = nil
	GuiObject.Selectable = false
end

-- FocusLost 和 FocusGained 事件会触发，因为 GuiObject
-- 是 TextBox 类型的
GuiObject.Focused:Connect(gainFocus)
GuiObject.FocusLost:Connect(loseFocus)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Visible.documentation: 确定是否渲染 GuiObject 及其子类
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.Visible.code_sample:
local guiObject = script.Parent

while true do
	guiObject.Visible = true
	wait(1)
	guiObject.Visible = false
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.ZIndex.documentation: 确定相对于其他 GUI 渲染 GuiObject 的顺序
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.ZIndex.code_sample:
-- 将此放置在 LocalScript 中
-- 该LocalScript是两个名为 “ FrameA” 和 “ FrameB” 的 GuiObject 同级对象
local gui = script.Parent
local frameA = gui:WaitForChild("FrameA")
local frameB = gui:WaitForChild("FrameB")

while true do
	-- 由于 A < B, 所以 A 优先渲染 (在底部) 
	frameA.ZIndex = 1
	frameB.ZIndex = 2
	wait(1)
	-- 由于 A > B, 所以 A 之后渲染 (在顶部)
	frameA.ZIndex = 2
	frameB.ZIndex = 1
	wait(1)
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TweenSize.documentation: 平滑地将一个 GUI 的尺寸变为一个新的 DataType.UDim2
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TweenSize.code_sample:
local guiObject = script.Parent

local function callback(didComplete)
	if didComplete then
		print("The tween completed successfully")
	else
		print("The tween was cancelled")
	end
end

local willTween = guiObject:TweenSize(
	UDim2.new(0.5, 0, 0.5, 0),  -- endSize （目标尺寸，必须）
	Enum.EasingDirection.In,    -- easingDirection （缓动方向，默认为 Out）
	Enum.EasingStyle.Sine,      -- easingStyle （缓动样式，默认为 Quad）
	2,                          -- 时间（默认为 1）
	true,                       -- 此渐变应该覆盖正在运行的渐变动画吗？（默认为 false）
	callback                    -- 渐变完成时调用的函数（默认为 nil）
)

if willTween then
	print("The GuiObject will tween") 
else
	print("The GuiObject will not tween")
end

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputBegan.documentation: 当用户通过人机接口设备（按下鼠标按钮、开始触摸、按下键盘按钮等）开始交互时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputBegan.code_sample:
-- 为了使用 InputBegan 事件，必须指定 GuiObject
local gui = script.Parent

-- 示例函数为各种类型的用户输入提供了多种使用案例
local function inputBegan(input)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		local keyPressed = input.KeyCode
		print("A key is being pushed down! Key:",input.KeyCode)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		print("The left mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2 then
		print("The right mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("A touchscreen input has started at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		print("A button is being pressed on a gamepad! Button:",input.KeyCode)
	end
end

gui.InputBegan:Connect(inputBegan)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.InputEnded.documentation: 当用户结束通过人机接口设备（按下鼠标按钮、开始触摸、按下键盘按钮等）的交互时触发

-- 要使用 InputEnded 事件，您必须指定一个 GuiObject
local gui = script.Parent
 
-- 一个示例多种用户输入的函数
local function inputEnded(input)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		local keyPressed = input.KeyCode
		print("A key has been released! Key:",input.KeyCode)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		print("The left mouse button has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2 then
		print("The right mouse button has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("A touchscreen input has been released at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		print("A button has been released on a gamepad! Button:",input.KeyCode)
	end
end

gui.InputEnded:Connect(inputEnded)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.MouseWheelB.documentation: 当用户的鼠标在 GUI 元素上方向后滚动滚轮时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.MouseWheelB.code_sample:
local CustomScrollingFrame = script.Parent
local SubFrame = CustomScrollingFrame:FindFirstChild("SubFrame")

function scrollUp(x, y)
	if SubFrame.Position.Y.Scale < 0  then
		SubFrame.Position = SubFrame.Position + UDim2.new(0, 0, .015, 0)
	elseif SubFrame.Position.Y.Scale > 0 then
		SubFrame.Position = UDim2.new(SubFrame.Position.X.Scale, 
			SubFrame.Position.X.Offset, 0, SubFrame.Position.Y.Offset)
	end
end

function scrollDown(x, y)
	if SubFrame.Position.Y.Scale > -1 then
		SubFrame.Position = SubFrame.Position - UDim2.new(0, 0, .015, 0)
	elseif SubFrame.Position.Y.Scale < -1 then
		SubFrame.Position = UDim2.new(SubFrame.Position.X.Scale, 
			SubFrame.Position.X.Offset, -1, SubFrame.Position.Y.Offset)
	end
end

CustomScrollingFrame.MouseWheelForward:Connect(scrollUp)
CustomScrollingFrame.MouseWheelBackward:Connect(scrollDown)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchPan.documentation: 当玩家移动手指到 UI 元素上时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchPan.code_sample:
local innerFrame = script.Parent
local outerFrame = innerFrame.Parent
outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
outerFrame.Active = true
outerFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
outerFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
outerFrame.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0)
outerFrame.ClipsDescendants = true

local dragging = false
local basePosition

local function onTouchPan(touchPositions, totalTranslation, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin and not dragging then
		dragging = true
		basePosition = innerFrame.Position
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.25
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.Change then
		innerFrame.Position = basePosition + UDim2.new(
			0, totalTranslation.X,
			0, totalTranslation.Y
		)
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.End and dragging then
		dragging = false
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
	end
end

outerFrame.TouchPan:Connect(onTouchPan)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchPinch.documentation: 当玩家在 UI 元素上使用两根手指执行聚拢或展开手势时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchPinch.code_sample:
local innerFrame = script.Parent
local outerFrame = innerFrame.Parent
outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
outerFrame.Active = true
outerFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
outerFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
outerFrame.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0)
outerFrame.ClipsDescendants = true

local dragging = false
local uiScale = Instance.new("UIScale")
uiScale.Parent = innerFrame
local baseScale

local function onTouchPinch(touchPositions, scale, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin and not dragging then
		dragging = true
		baseScale = uiScale.Scale
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.25
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.Change then
		uiScale.Scale = baseScale * scale -- 注意这里的乘法
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.End and dragging then
		dragging = false
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
	end
end

outerFrame.TouchPinch:Connect(onTouchPinch)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchRotate.documentation: 当玩家在 UI 元素上使用两根手指执行旋转手势时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchRotate.code_sample:
local innerFrame = script.Parent
local outerFrame = innerFrame.Parent
outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
outerFrame.Active = true
outerFrame.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
outerFrame.Position = UDim2.new(0, 0, 0, 0)
outerFrame.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0, 0)
outerFrame.ClipsDescendants = true

local dragging = false
local baseRotation = innerFrame.Rotation

local function onTouchRotate(touchPositions, rotation, velocity, state)
	if state == Enum.UserInputState.Begin and not dragging then
		dragging = true
		baseRotation = innerFrame.Rotation
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.25
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.Change then
		innerFrame.Rotation = baseRotation + rotation
	elseif state == Enum.UserInputState.End and dragging then
		dragging = false
		outerFrame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
	end
end

outerFrame.TouchRotate:Connect(onTouchRotate)

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchSwipe.documentation: 当玩家在 UI 元素上执行滑动手势时触发

@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchTap.documentation: 当玩家在 UI 元素上执行触摸手势时触发
@roblox/globaltype/GuiObject.TouchTap.code_sample:
local frame = script.Parent
frame.Active = true

local function onTouchTap()
	-- 切换背景透明度
	if frame.BackgroundTransparency > 0 then
		frame.BackgroundTransparency = 0
	else
		frame.BackgroundTransparency = 0.75
	end
end

frame.TouchTap:Connect(onTouchTap)
