@roblox/globaltype/GuiRoot.documentation:
GuiRoot is an internal service that is used to store Roblox's legacy native UI system.
It is still used for some of the stats panels, hence why it is still around today.

@roblox/globaltype/GuiService.documentation: GuiService 是一项服务，它使开发者们可以控制手柄当前选择的是哪一个 GuiObject 。另外，它还使用户可以检查 Roblox 的主页面当前是否已经打开。 该服务在后台大量使用，主要应用于 Roblox 的 CoreScript 的内部运行。

@roblox/globaltype/GuiService.AutoSelect.documentation: 在用户按下游戏手柄上 Select 选择按钮时，是否会自动将 GUI 设置为所选的对象。将此项关闭的话，如果 GuiNavigationEnabled 为启用状态，那么Gui 导航仍可工作，但您必须手动设置 SelectedObject 来开始 Gui 导航。

@roblox/globaltype/HapticService.GetMoto.documentation: 设为指定的 Enum.UserInputType 和 VibrationMotor 的当前振动值，如果 HapticService:SetMotor 此前未被调用则为 nil
返回当前设置给指定的 UserInputType 和 VibrationMotor 的振动值。 如果在此之前没有调用过 SetMotor，将不会返回任何值。

@roblox/globaltype/HapticService.IsMotor.documentation: 检查指定的 Enum.UserInputType 是否支持 Enum.VibrationMotor
被查看是否支持指定 Enum.UserInputType 的指定 Enum.VibrationMotor
如果指定的电机可以和指定的 Enum.UserInputType 一起使用，则返回 true，否则返回 false
如果指定的电机可以和指定的 Enum.UserInputType 一起使用，则返回 true 。

@roblox/globaltype/HapticService.IsVibra.documentation: 检查指定的 Enum.UserInputType 是否支持触觉反馈
如果指定的 Enum.UserInputType 支持触觉反馈，则为 True
如果指定的 Enum.UserInputType 支持触觉反馈，则返回 true

@roblox/globaltype/HapticService.SetMoto.documentation: 设置指定 UserInputType 和 VibrationMotor 的振动强度。
@roblox/globaltype/HapticService.SetMoto.code_sample:
local userInput = game:GetService("UserInputService")
local haptics = game:GetService("HapticService")

local cachedInputs = {} -- 注意我们用了一个缓存，这样我们就不需要多次连接一个 Changed 事件了。

local keyToVibration =
{
	[Enum.KeyCode.ButtonL2] = Enum.VibrationMotor.Small;
	[Enum.KeyCode.ButtonR2] = Enum.VibrationMotor.Large;
}

local function onInputBegan(input)
	if not cachedInputs[input] then
		local inputType = input.UserInputType
		if inputType.Name:find("Gamepad") then -- 如果这是游戏手柄输入。
			local vibrationMotor = keyToVibration[input.KeyCode]
			if vibrationMotor then
				-- 手动监测此 InputObject，以便准确对 vibrationMotor 进行更新。
				local function onChanged(property)
					if property == "Position" then
						haptics:SetMotor(inputType,vibrationMotor,input.Position.Z)
					end
				end
				cachedInputs[input] = input.Changed:Connect(onChanged)
			end
		end
	end
end

userInput.InputBegan:Connect(onInputBegan)

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Actua.documentation: 设置 HingeConstraint 的旋转是否为受驱动类，如是则同时设置驱动的类型。

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Angul.documentation: HingeConstraint 的 HingeConstraint.ActuatorType 被设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，其向目标 HingeConstraint.TargetAngle 旋转时所尝试保持的速度。单位为 radians/second（弧度/秒）。
HingeConstraint 的 HingeConstraint.ActuatorType 被设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它所尝试达到的角速度。单位为 radians/second（弧度/秒）。

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Limit.documentation: 设置 HingeConstraint 是否会约束旋转的范围。

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Lower.documentation: 如果 HingeConstraint.LimitsEnabled 为 true，HingeConstraint 将会允许的最小旋转角度。

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Motor.documentation: HingeConstraint 的 HingeConstraint.ActuatorType 设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它为了达到 HingeConstraint.AngularVelocity 所能应用的最大角加速度。单位为 radians/(second squared) ，即弧度/秒的二次方。
HingeConstraint 的 HingeConstraint.ActuatorType 设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它为了达到所需 HingeConstraint.AngularVelocity 所能应用的最大扭矩。

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Resti.documentation: 在 HingeConstraint.LimitsEnabled 的值为 true 的前提下，由 HingeConstraint 所连接的 Attachment 抵达最大距离时的灵活程度。限制在 0 和 1 之间。

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Servo.documentation: HingeConstraint 的 HingeConstraint.ActuatorType 设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它为了达到所需的 HingeConstraint.TargetAngle 所能应用的最大扭矩。

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Targe.documentation: HingeConstraint 的 HingeConstraint.ActuatorType 被设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它将会尝试旋转到的目标角度。单位为度。

@roblox/globaltype/HingeConstraint.Upper.documentation: 如果 HingeConstraint.LimitsEnabled 为 true，HingeConstraint 将会允许的最大旋转角度。

@roblox/globaltype/Hint.documentation: Hint 为可在屏幕顶端显示带文字小型黑条的对象，其外观无法用任何方式进行自定义。在引入了 Roblox 的 GUI 相关功能后，Hint 已被弃用，它的替代品是TextLabel。请勿在新作品中使用此对象。

@roblox/globaltype/HttpService.documentation: Allows sending HTTP requests and provides various web-related functions, including JSON functions
@roblox/globaltype/HttpService.code_sample:
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

local URL_ASTROS = "http://api.open-notify.org/astros.json"

-- 向端点 URL 发送请求
local response = HttpService:GetAsync(URL_ASTROS)

-- 解析 JSON 响应
local data = HttpService:JSONDecode(response)

-- 数据表中的信息取决于响应 JSON
if data.message == "success" then
	print("There are currently " .. data.number .. " astronauts in space:")
	for i, person in pairs(data.people) do
		print(i .. ": " .. person.name .. " is on " .. person.craft)
	end
end

用于指定一些 HTTP 请求 Header

@roblox/globaltype/HttpService.GetAsync.documentation: 发送 HTTP GET 请求
@roblox/globaltype/HttpService.GetAsync.code_sample:
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

local URL_ASTROS = "http://api.open-notify.org/astros.json"

-- 向端点 URL 发送请求
local response = HttpService:GetAsync(URL_ASTROS)

-- 解析 JSON 响应
local data = HttpService:JSONDecode(response)

-- 数据表中的信息取决于响应 JSON
if data.message == "success" then
	print("There are currently " .. data.number .. " astronauts in space:")
	for i, person in pairs(data.people) do
		print(i .. ": " .. person.name .. " is on " .. person.craft)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/HttpService.PostAsync.documentation: Allows sending HTTP requests and provides various web-related functions, including JSON functions
修改与请求一起发送的 Content-Type 头中的值
决定数据在发送时是否被压缩（gzipped）
用于指定一些 HTTP 请求 Header
发回的 HTTP 响应显示请求结果
执行 HTTP POST 请求

@roblox/globaltype/HttpService.RequestAs.documentation: Allows sending HTTP requests and provides various web-related functions, including JSON functions
包含要从指定服务器请求的信息的字典。
包含指定服务器的响应信息的字典。
使用任何 HTTP 方法给定一个信息字典并发送 HTTP 请求。
@roblox/globaltype/HttpService.RequestAs.code_sample:
-- 记住要在游戏设置中启用 HTTP 请求！
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

local function request()
	local response = HttpService:RequestAsync(
		{
			Url = "http://httpbin.org/post",  -- 此网站可用来调试 HTTP 请求
			Method = "POST",
			Headers = {
				["Content-Type"] = "application/json"  -- 发送 JSON 时请对此进行设置！
			},
			Body = HttpService:JSONEncode({hello = "world"})
		}
	)

	-- 检查响应表
	if response.Success then
		print("Status code:", response.StatusCode, response.StatusMessage)
		print("Response body:\n", response.Body)
	else
		print("The request failed:", response.StatusCode, response.StatusMessage)
	end
end

-- 记住要用 'pcall' 封装函数，以防止请求失败时脚本报错
local success, message = pcall(request)
if not success then
	print("Http Request failed:", message)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.documentation: A special object that gives models the functionality of a character.

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.AutoJumpEnab.documentation: 设置使用移动设备的玩家角色是否会在碰到障碍物时自动跳跃。
@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.AutoJumpEnab.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local button = script.Parent

local function update()
	-- 更新按键文本
	if player.AutoJumpEnabled then
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is ON"
	else
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is OFF"
	end
	-- 映射属性至玩家的角色（如果有的话）
	if player.Character then
		local human = player.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if human then
			human.AutoJumpEnabled = player.AutoJumpEnabled
		end
	end
end

local function onActivated()
	-- 切换自动跳跃
	player.AutoJumpEnabled = not player.AutoJumpEnabled
	-- 更新其余内容
	update()
end
button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
update()

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.AddAccessory.code_sample:
local playerModel = script.Parent
local humanoid = playerModel:WaitForChild("Humanoid")

-- 创建一个 Accessory。
local clockworksShades = Instance.new("Accessory")
clockworksShades.Name = "ClockworksShades"

local handle = Instance.new("Part")
handle.Name = "Handle"
handle.Size = Vector3.new(1,1.6,1)
handle.Parent = clockworksShades

local faceFrontAttachment = Instance.new("Attachment")
faceFrontAttachment.Name = "FaceFrontAttachment"
faceFrontAttachment.Position = Vector3.new(0,-0.24,-0.45)
faceFrontAttachment.Parent = handle

local mesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh")
mesh.Name = "Mesh"
mesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1,1.3,1)
mesh.MeshId = "rbxassetid://1577360"
mesh.TextureId = "rbxassetid://1577349"
mesh.Parent = handle

-- 将 Accessory 附加到人形角色。
humanoid:AddAccessory(clockworksShades)

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.Move.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

RunService:BindToRenderStep("move",
    -- 跟随角色
    Enum.RenderPriority.Character.Value + 1,
    function()
   	 if localPlayer.Character then
   		 local humanoid = localPlayer.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
   		 if humanoid then
   			 humanoid:Move(Vector3.new(0, 0, -1), true)
   		 end
   	 end
    end
)

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.MoveTo/param.documentation: A special object that gives models the functionality of a character.

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.MoveTo.documentation: 通过设置 Humanoid.WalkToPoint 及 Humanoid.WalkToPart 属性，使得 Humanoid 尝试走向一个指定的地点

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.ReplaceBodyP.documentation: A special object that gives models the functionality of a character.

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.SetStateEnab.documentation: A special object that gives models the functionality of a character.
启用此状态时为 true，禁用时为 false
设置给定 Enum.HumanoidStateType 是否对 Humanoid 启用
@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.SetStateEnab.code_sample:
local character = script.Parent

local JUMP_DEBOUNCE = 1

local humanoid = character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")

local isJumping = false
humanoid.StateChanged:Connect(function(oldState, newState)
	if newState == Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping then
		if not isJumping then
			isJumping = true
			humanoid:SetStateEnabled(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping, false)
		end
	elseif newState == Enum.HumanoidStateType.Landed then
		if isJumping then
			isJumping = false
			wait(JUMP_DEBOUNCE)
			humanoid:SetStateEnabled(Enum.HumanoidStateType.Jumping, true)
		end
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.TakeDamage/p.documentation: A special object that gives models the functionality of a character.
要从 Humanoid.Health （生命值）减去的伤害或量

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.TakeDamage.documentation: 在 Humanoid（人形生物）没有 ForceField（力场）的保护情况下，将其 Humanoid.Health（生命值）降低至给定的数值

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.UnequipTools.documentation: A special object that gives models the functionality of a character.

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.UnequipTools.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

ContextActionService:BindAction("unequipTools", 
	function(_, userInputState)
		if userInputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then 
			if localPlayer.Character then 
				local humanoid = localPlayer.Character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
				if humanoid then 
					humanoid:UnequipTools()
				end
			end
		end
	end,
	false,
	Enum.KeyCode.U
)

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.GetPlayingAn.documentation: A special object that gives models the functionality of a character.
一个当前正在播放的 AnimationTrack 的数组。
返回一个包含当前所有在该 Humanoid 上播放的 AnimationTrack 的数组。
@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.GetPlayingAn.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local localPlayer = Players.LocalPlayer

if not localPlayer.Character then
	localPlayer.CharacterAdded:Wait()
end

local humanoid = localPlayer.Character:WaitForChild("Humanoid")

-- 获取所有正在播放的动画
local AnimationTracks = humanoid:GetPlayingAnimationTracks()

-- 停止所有正在播放的动画
for i, track in pairs (AnimationTracks) do
	track:Stop()
end

@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.AnimationPla.documentation: 当 AnimationTrack 开始在 Humanoid 上播放时触发
@roblox/globaltype/Humanoid.AnimationPla.code_sample:
humanoid.AnimationPlayed:Connect(function(animationTrack)
	-- 确定轨迹存在
	if not animationTrack then
		return
	end
	local connection
	-- 连接 KeyframeReached 事件
	connection = animationTrack.KeyframeReached:Connect(function(keyframeName)
		if keyframeName == "PausePlayback" then
			-- 速度调整为 0，暂停动画
			animationTrack:AdjustSpeed(0)
		end
	end)
	-- 动画完成时断连 KeyframeReached 事件
	animationTrack.Stopped:Wait()
	connection:Disconnect()
end)

@roblox/globaltype/ImageButton.documentation: A 2D user interface element that displays an interactive image

@roblox/globaltype/ImageButton.Image.documentation: UI 元素所显示的图像内容。
@roblox/globaltype/ImageButton.Image.code_sample:
local imageLabel = script.Parent

-- 此示例中的图像是 64x64
imageLabel.Size = UDim2.new(0, 64, 0, 64)

local function unlock()
	imageLabel.Image = "rbxassetid://284402785" -- 已解锁的挂锁 (64x64)
	imageLabel.ImageColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0.5, 0) -- 深绿色
end

local function lock()
	imageLabel.Image = "rbxassetid://284402752" -- 锁住的挂锁 (64x64)
	imageLabel.ImageColor3 = Color3.new(0.5, 0, 0) -- 深红色
end

-- 连接事件；我们的默认状态被锁住
imageLabel.MouseEnter:Connect(unlock)
imageLabel.MouseLeave:Connect(lock)
lock()

@roblox/globaltype/ImageButton.ImageRect.documentation: 待显示的图片子区域的偏移量（以像素为单位）。
@roblox/globaltype/ImageButton.ImageRect.code_sample:
-- 将这个放入一个大小为 256x256 的 ImageLabel/ImageButton 中 
local imageLabel = script.Parent

-- 下列图像是有 12 个帧（256x256）且大小为 1024x1024 的图像
-- 这些帧播放出一个人出拳的动画
imageLabel.Image = "rbxassetid://848623155"
imageLabel.ImageRectSize = Vector2.new(256, 256)

-- 帧的播放顺序（从左到右，然后从上到下）
local frames = {
	Vector2.new(0, 0); Vector2.new(1, 0); Vector2.new(2, 0); Vector2.new(3, 0);
	Vector2.new(0, 1); Vector2.new(1, 1); Vector2.new(2, 1); Vector2.new(3, 1);
	Vector2.new(0, 2); Vector2.new(1, 2); Vector2.new(2, 2); Vector2.new(3, 2);
}

-- 在循环里每次播放一帧，形成动画
while true do
	for i = 1, #frames do
		imageLabel.ImageRectOffset = frames[i] * imageLabel.ImageRectSize
		wait(.1)
	end
end

local imageLabel = script.Parent

local startTime = workspace.DistributedGameTime

-- 等待图像加载
while not imageLabel.IsLoaded do wait() end

-- 测量并显示加载图像的时间
local deltaTime = workspace.DistributedGameTime - startTime

imageLabel.ImageRectSize = Vector2.new(256, 256)

-- 帧的播放顺序（从左到右，然后从上到下）
local frames = {
	Vector2.new(0, 0); Vector2.new(1, 0); Vector2.new(2, 0); Vector2.new(3, 0);
	Vector2.new(0, 1); Vector2.new(1, 1); Vector2.new(2, 1); Vector2.new(3, 1);
	Vector2.new(0, 2); Vector2.new(1, 2); Vector2.new(2, 2); Vector2.new(3, 2);
}

-- 在循环里每次播放一帧，形成动画
while true do
	for i = 1, #frames do
		imageLabel.ImageRectOffset = frames[i] * imageLabel.ImageRectSize
		wait(.1)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/ImageLabel.Image.documentation: UI 元素所显示的图像内容。

local imageLabel = script.Parent

	imageLabel.Image = "rbxassetid://284402785" -- 已解锁的挂锁 (64x64)
	imageLabel.ImageColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0.5, 0) -- 深绿色
end

local function lock()
	imageLabel.Image = "rbxassetid://284402752" -- 锁住的挂锁 (64x64)

end

-- 连接事件；我们的默认状态被锁住
imageLabel.MouseEnter:Connect(unlock)
imageLabel.MouseLeave:Connect(lock)
lock()

@roblox/globaltype/InputObject.documentation: An object created when an input begins that describes a particular user input
@roblox/globaltype/InputObject.code_sample:
-- 要想使用 InputBegan 事件，必须使用 UserInputService 服务
local UserInputService = game:GetService("UserInputService")

-- 为各类型用户输入提供多个用例的示例函数
UserInputService.InputBegan:Connect(function(input, gameProcessed)
	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		local keyPressed = input.KeyCode
		print("A key is being pushed down! Key:",input.KeyCode)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		print("The left mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2 then
		print("The right mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("A touchscreen input has started at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		print("A button is being pressed on a gamepad! Button:",input.KeyCode)
	end

	if gameProcessed then
		print("\tThe game engine internally observed this input!")
	else
		print("\tThe game engine did not internally observe this input!")
	end
end)

	if input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Keyboard then
		local keyPressed = input.KeyCode
		print("A key is being pushed down! Key:",input.KeyCode)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton1 then
		print("The left mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.MouseButton2 then
		print("The right mouse button has been pressed down at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Touch then
		print("A touchscreen input has started at",input.Position)
	elseif input.UserInputType == Enum.UserInputType.Gamepad1 then
		print("A button is being pressed on a gamepad! Button:",input.KeyCode)
	end

	if gameProcessed then

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Archivable.documentation: Determines if an Instance can be cloned using Instance:Clone or saved to file.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ClassName.documentation: 表示此 Instance （实例） 所属类的只读字符串

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Parent.documentation: 决定 Instance 的分层式父项

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.RobloxLocked.documentation: 当为 true 时，Instance 及其子项将无法被 Script 或 LocalScript 进行索引或者编辑，并在尝试对其进行上述操作时报错

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.DataCost.documentation: 使用数据持久化来保存实例的成本。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ClearAllChil.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
此函数将摧毁 Instance 的所有子项。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ClearAllChil.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part")

-- 添加闪烁效果
for i = 1, 3 do
  Instance.new("Sparkles", part)
end

print("Part has " .. #part:GetChildren() .. " children")
--> 部件有 3 个子项

part:ClearAllChildren()

print("Part has " .. #part:GetChildren() .. " children")
--> 部件有 0 个子项

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Clone/param/.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Clone.documentation: 创建一个对象及其所有子项的副本，忽略无法 Instance.Archivable （归档）的对象
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Clone.code_sample:
-- Get a reference to an existing object
    local original = workspace.Model
    -- Create the model copy
    local copy = original:Clone()
    -- Parent the copy to the same parent as the original
    copy.Parent = original.Parent
    -- Move the copy so it's not overlapping the original
    copy:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(CFrame.new(0, 50, 0))

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Destroy/para.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Destroy.documentation: Sets the Instance.Parent property to nil, locks the Instance.Parent property, disconnects all connections and calls Destroy on all children.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Destroy.code_sample:
local Part = Workspace.Part
Part:Destroy()
Part.Parent = Workspace --> The Parent property of Part is locked

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstAnc.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
返回 Instance 的第一父项，其 Instance.Name 与给定名称一致。
Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
返回 Instance.ClassName 等于给定 className 的 Instance 的第一个父项。
Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
返回 Instance 的第一个父项，此父项的 Instance:IsA 对于给定 className 会返回 true。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
搜寻是否要采用递归方式。
返回与给定名称一致的 Instance （实例） 的第一个子项。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.code_sample:
local found = workspace:FindFirstChild("Brick")
if found then 
  found.Name = "Foo"
end

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
返回 Instance.ClassName 等于给定 className 的第一个 Instance 子项。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.code_sample:
local player = game:GetService("Players").LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character or player.CharacterAdded:wait()
local humanoid
while not humanoid do
    humanoid = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Humanoid")
    if not humanoid then
        character.ChildAdded:wait()
    end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.FindFirstChi.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
搜寻是否要采用递归方式。
返回 Instance 的第一个子项，此子项的 Instance:IsA 对于给定 className 会返回 true。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetAttribute.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
分配至给定名称的特性。如果未分配任何特性则返回 nil
返回被分配至给定名称的特性
Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
要返回变更信号的特定特性的名称
当给定的特性发生变更时触发的事件
返回一个当给定的特性发生变更时触发的事件
Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
每个特性的字符串 → 变体对的字典，其中字符串为特性的名称，变体是非 nil 的值
返回 Instance （实例）的每个特性的字符串 → 变体对的字典

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetChildren/.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
一个含有 Instance（实例）所有子项的数组。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetChildren.documentation: 返回一个含有 Instance（实例）所有子项的数组。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetChildren.code_sample:
local children = workspace:GetChildren()
for i = 1, #children do
    print(i, children[i].Name)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetDebugId/p.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetDebugId.documentation: 返回供 Roblox 内部使用的 Instance DebugId 的编码字符串。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetDescendan.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
一个含有 Instance 所有子项的数组。
返回含有实例所有子项的数组
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetDescendan.code_sample:
local descendants = game.Workspace:GetDescendants()

-- 循环 Workspace 中所有的子项，若找到一个
-- BasePart，代码就将该部件变为绿色
for index, descendant in pairs(descendants) do
	if descendant:IsA("BasePart") then
		descendant.BrickColor = BrickColor.Green()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetFullName/.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetFullName.documentation: 返回一个描述 Instance 父项的字符串。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetFullName.code_sample:
-- 创建一个简单的层次结构
local model = Instance.new("Model")
local part = Instance.new("Part", model)
local fire = Instance.new("Fire", part)
print(fire:GetFullName()) --> Model.Part.Fire
model.Parent = workspace
print(fire:GetFullName()) --> Workspace.Model.Part.Fire
part.Name = "Hello, world"
print(fire:GetFullName()) --> Workspace.Model.Hello, world.Fire

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetPropertyC.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
获取一个在对象给定属性更改时触发的事件。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.GetPropertyC.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part")

-- 保存当前状态
local currentColor = part.BrickColor

local function onBrickColorChanged()
	local newColor = part.BrickColor
	print("Color changed from " .. currentColor.Name .. " to " .. newColor.Name)
	currentColor = newColor
end 
part:GetPropertyChangedSignal("BrickColor"):Connect(onBrickColorChanged)

-- 进行一些改变
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really red")
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Really blue")

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA/param/0.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA/param/1.documentation: The class against which the Instance's class will be checked. Case-sensitive.

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA/return/0.documentation: Describes whether the Instance's class matched or is a subclass of the given class

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA.documentation: Returns true if an Instance's class matches or inherits from a given class
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsA.code_sample:
print(Workspace:IsA("Instance" )) --> true
print(Workspace:IsA("Workspace")) --> true
print(game:IsA("Workspace")) --> false
print(game:IsA("DataModel")) --> true

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsAncestorOf.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
如果 Instance 是给定子项的父项，则返回 true。
当 Instance 为给定子项的父项时返回 true。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsDescendant.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
如果 Instance （实例） 是给定父项的子项，则返回 true。
如果 Instance （实例） 是给定父项的子项，则返回 true。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.IsDescendant.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part")
print(part:IsDescendantOf(game))
--> false

part.Parent = game.Workspace
print(part:IsDescendantOf(game))
--> true

part.Parent = game
print(part:IsDescendantOf(game))
--> true

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.SetAttribute.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
指定的特性要设为的值
将给定名称的特性设为给定值

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.WaitForChild.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。
非必填的 Timeout 参数。
返回拥有给定名称的 Instance 子项。若无满足条件的子项存在，则函数将会暂停当前线程，直到子项出现为止。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.WaitForChild.code_sample:
local part = Workspace:WaitForChild("Part")
print(part.Name .. " 已经被添加到 Workspace")

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Remove/param.documentation: Instance 是 Roblox 类层次结构中所有类的基类。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Remove.documentation: Sets the object's Parent to nil, and does the same for all its descendants.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Remove.code_sample:
local part = Instance.new("Part", Workspace)
print(part.Parent)
--> Workspace

part:Remove()
print(part.Parent)
--> nil

part.Parent = Workspace
print(part.Parent)
--> Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.AncestryChan.documentation: 当对象或其父项之一的 Instance.Parent 属性发生改变时即会触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.AncestryChan.code_sample:
local p = Instance.new("Part")
p.Parent = game.Workspace
p.AncestryChanged:Connect(function(child, parent)
    print(child.Name.." is now a child of "..parent.Name)
end)
p.Parent = Workspace.Model

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.AttributeCha.documentation: 在实例的任何特性变更时触发

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Changed.documentation: 在对象的属性发生更改后立即触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.Changed.code_sample:
-- 创建一个 Part 来展示 Changed 事件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Transparency” 来触发 Changed 事件
part.Transparency = .5
-- 用 “Number” 来触发 Changed 事件
part.Name = "SomePart"
-- 更改 BrickColor 也会同时更改其他属性
-- 因此此行用“BrickColor”、“Color3” 和 “Color3uint16”
-- 来触发 Changed 事件。
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Red()

-- 一个存有双精度浮点数值的 NumberValue 
local vNumber = Instance.new("NumberValue")
vNumber.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 123.456 来触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vNumber.Value = 123456
-- 并不会触发 Changed 事件
vNumber.Name = "SomeNumber"

-- 存储着字符串的 StringValue
local vString = Instance.new("StringValue")
vString.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Hello” 触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vString.Value = "Hello"

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ChildAdded.documentation: Fires when an object is parented to this Instance.
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ChildAdded.code_sample:
workspace.ChildAdded:Connect(function(instance)
    print(instance.Name .. " added to the workspace")
end)
Instance.new("Part", workspace)
--> Part added to the Workspace

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ChildRemoved.documentation: 从该 Instance 中移除某一子项时触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Instance.ChildRemoved.code_sample:
Workspace.ChildRemoved:Connect(function(instance)
    print(instance.Name .. " removed from the Workspace")
end)
local part = Instance.new("Part", Workspace)
wait(2)
part:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.DescendantAd.documentation: 向 Instance 中添加子项时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Instance.DescendantRe.documentation: 在 Instance 的子项即将被移除前触发。

@roblox/globaltype/InstancePacketCache.documentation: An internal service whose functionality is not available to developers.

@roblox/globaltype/IntConstrainedValue.documentation: IntConstrainedValue 能用来存储一个不能小于 MinValue 且不能大于 MaxValue 的值。

@roblox/globaltype/IntConstrainedValue.C.documentation: 储存一个大小在 IntConstrainedValue.MinValue 和 IntConstrainedValue.MaxValue 之间的 Integer（整数）。已被 IntConstrainedValue.Value 取代，但仍然可用。

@roblox/globaltype/IntConstrainedValue.V.documentation: 用来存储一个大小位于 IntConstrainedValue.MinValue 和 IntConstrainedValue.MaxValue 之间的整数

@roblox/globaltype/IntConstrainedValue.C.documentation: .每当 IntConstrainedValue 的 Value 变更时即触发。

@roblox/globaltype/IntValue.documentation: A container object for a single integer.
@roblox/globaltype/IntValue.code_sample:
-- 以下是已签名的 32 位整数的范围
local INT_MAX = 2 ^ 31 - 1
local INT_MIN = -(2 ^ 31)

local vInteger = Instance.new("IntValue")
vInteger.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 一些小值
vInteger.Value = 5
vInteger.Value = 0
vInteger.Value = -0 -- No change - same as 0
-- 最小值
vInteger.Value = INT_MIN
-- 最大值
vInteger.Value = INT_MAX
-- 最大值加一，造成了整数溢出！
-- IntValue 变为 INT_MIN！
vInteger.Value = INT_MAX + 1

@roblox/globaltype/IntValue.Value.documentation: 用来储存一个整数。

@roblox/globaltype/IntValue.Changed.documentation: Fired whenever the IntValue.Value of the IntValue is changed.
@roblox/globaltype/IntValue.Changed.code_sample:
local value = Instance.new("IntValue")
value.Parent = game.Workspace

value.Changed:Connect(function(NewValue)
    print(NewValue)
end)

value.Value = 20

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.C1.documentation: 从 JointInstance.C0 属性中减除，以创建 JointInstance.Part1 的偏移点。

@roblox/globaltype/JointInstance.Part1.documentation: The second BasePart that the joint connects.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.Time.documentation: 此属性给出了 Keyframe 在动画中的时间位置 (以秒计) 。它决定关键帧中的 Pose 会在何时被显示。
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.Time.code_sample:
local function getSequenceLength(keyframeSequence)
	local length = 0
	for _, keyframe in pairs(keyframeSequence:GetKeyframes()) do 
		if keyframe.Time > length then 
			length = keyframe.Time 
		end
	end
	return length
end

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddMarker/pa.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.
将被设为 Keyframe 的子项的 KeyframeMarker

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddMarker.documentation: 通过将一个 KeyframeMarker 设置为关键帧的子项，来将此 KeyframeMarker 添加至 Keyframe
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddMarker.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)
local marker = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker.Name = "FootStep"
marker.Value = 100

keyframe:AddMarker(marker) --marker.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemoveMarker(marker) --marker.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddPose/para.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.AddPose.documentation: 此函数通过将一个 Pose 设置为关键帧的父项，来将该 Pose 添加至 Keyframe。

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetMarkers/p.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetMarkers/r.documentation: 一个包含所有添加至 Keyframe 的 KeyframeMarker 的数组

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetMarkers.documentation: 返回一个数组，其中包含所有添加至 Keyframe 的 KeyframeMarkers 的数组
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetMarkers.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local marker1 = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker1.Name = "FootStep"
marker1.Value = 100

local marker2 = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker2.Name = "Wave"
marker3.Value = 100

keyframe:AddMarker(marker1) --marker.Parent = keyframe
keyframe:AddMarker(marker2) --marker.Parent = keyframe

local markers = keyframe:GetMarkers()
for _, marker in pairs (markers) do
	print(marker.Name)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetPoses/par.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetPoses.documentation: 此函数会返回一个数组，其中包含所有添加至 Keyframe 的 Pose
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.GetPoses.code_sample:
local function resetPoses(parent)
    	-- 两个函数都等于 GetChildren
    	local poses = parent:IsA("Keyframe") and parent:GetPoses() 
    		or parent:IsA("Pose") and parent:GetSubPoses()
    
    	for _, pose in pairs(poses) do 
    		if pose:IsA("Pose") then
    			pose.CFrame = CFrame.new()
    			-- 递归
    			resetPoses(pose)
    		end
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemoveMarker.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.
通过将一个 KeyframeMarker 的 Instance.Parent 设置为 nil，来将其从 Keyframe 中移除
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemoveMarker.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)
local marker = Instance.new("KeyframeMarker")
marker.Name = "FootStep"
marker.Value = 100

keyframe:AddMarker(marker) --marker.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemoveMarker(marker) --marker.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemovePose/p.documentation: A Keyframe holds the Pose applied to joints in a Model at a given point of time in an animation. Keyframes are interpolated between during animation playback.

@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemovePose.documentation: 此函数通过将 Keyframe 的 Instance.Parent 设置为 nil 来移除它的 Pose 。
@roblox/globaltype/Keyframe.RemovePose.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local pose = Instance.new("Pose")
pose.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out
local pose2 = Instance.new("Pose")
pose2.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose2.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemovePose(pose) -- pose.Parent = nil 

wait(2)

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

pose:AddSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = pose

wait(2)

pose:RemoveSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.documentation: This object stores all of the Keyframes for an animation and other data about the animation. It is the object that is created by the Roblox Animation Editor and uploaded to Roblox.

local function getSequenceLength(keyframeSequence)
	local length = 0
	for _, keyframe in pairs(keyframeSequence:GetKeyframes()) do 
		if keyframe.Time > length then 
			length = keyframe.Time 
		end
	end
	return length
end

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.Auth.documentation: 包含了用于执行 KeyframeSequence 的 Humanoid 人型生物模型的臀部高度

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.Loop.documentation: 确定从 KeyframeSequence 中创建的动画是否会被默认为循环。若设置为 true ，则动画结束时将会不断重复。
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.Loop.code_sample:
-- 创建 keyframesequence
local keyframeSequence = Instance.new("KeyframeSequence")
keyframeSequence.Loop = false
keyframeSequence.Priority = Enum.AnimationPriority.Action

--  创建一个关键帧
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe")
keyframe.Time = 0

-- 创建示例姿势
local rootPose = Instance.new("Pose")
rootPose.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
rootPose.Weight = 0

local lowerTorsoPose = Instance.new("Pose")
lowerTorsoPose.Name = "LowerTorso"
lowerTorsoPose.Weight = 1

-- 设置序列层级
rootPose:AddSubPose(lowerTorsoPose) -- lowerTorsoPose.Parent = rootPose
keyframe:AddPose(rootPose) -- rootPose.Parent = keyframe
keyframeSequence:AddKeyframe(keyframe) -- keyframe.Parent = keyframeSequence

-- 设置序列父项
keyframeSequence.Parent = workspace

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.Prio.documentation: 决定从 KeyframeSequence 创建的动画的默认优先级。
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequence.Prio.code_sample:
-- 创建 keyframesequence
local keyframeSequence = Instance.new("KeyframeSequence")
keyframeSequence.Loop = false
keyframeSequence.Priority = Enum.AnimationPriority.Action

-- 创建示例姿势

rootPose.Name = "HumanoidRootPart"
rootPose.Weight = 0

local lowerTorsoPose = Instance.new("Pose")

-- 设置序列层级
rootPose:AddSubPose(lowerTorsoPose) -- lowerTorsoPose.Parent = rootPose
keyframe:AddPose(rootPose) -- rootPose.Parent = keyframe
keyframeSequence:AddKeyframe(keyframe) -- keyframe.Parent = keyframeSequence

-- 设置序列父项
keyframeSequence.Parent = workspace

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.documentation: KeyframeSequenceProvider 是用于加载和预览 KeyframeSequence 的服务。它包括一些在对 Animation 进行创作时非常有用的函数。
KeyframeSequenceProvider 是用于加载和预览 KeyframeSequence 的服务。它包括一些在对 Animation 进行创作时非常有用的函数。
要使用的 KeyframeSequence 。
一个临时资产 ID，用于本地动画回放。
从一个 KeyframeSequence 生成临时资产 ID，可用于动画的本地测试。会生成一个 active:// URL
KeyframeSequenceProvider 是用于加载和预览 KeyframeSequence 的服务。它包括一些在对 Animation 进行创作时非常有用的函数。
要使用的 KeyframeSequence 。
一个临时资产 ID，用于本地动画回放。
从一个 KeyframeSequence 生成临时资产 ID，可用于动画的本地测试。会生成一个 hash 。
KeyframeSequenceProvider 是用于加载和预览 KeyframeSequence 的服务。它包括一些在对 Animation 进行创作时非常有用的函数。
用户的用户 ID。
动画的 InventoryPages。
此函数返回一个 InventoryPages 对象，可用于迭代特定用户拥有的动画。
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.code_sample:
local KeyframeSequenceProvider = game:GetService("KeyframeSequenceProvider")

local USER_ID = 0 -- 在此处插入你的 UserId 

local function extractPages(pagesObject)
    local array = {}
    while true do 
        local thisPage = pagesObject:GetCurrentPage()
        for _, v in pairs(thisPage) do 
            table.insert(array, v)
        end
        if pagesObject.IsFinished then
            break 
        end 
        pagesObject:AdvanceToNextPageAsync()
    end
    return array
end

local inventoryPages = KeyframeSequenceProvider:GetAnimations(USER_ID)

local animationIds = extractPages(inventoryPages)

for _, id in pairs(animationIds) do 
    print(id)
end
print("total: ", #animationIds)

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.documentation: KeyframeSequenceProvider 是用于加载和预览 KeyframeSequence 的服务。它包括一些在对 Animation 进行创作时非常有用的函数。
动画的内容 ID
找到的 KeyframeSequence 。
根据指定的 assetId 异步返回一个 KeyframeSequence 。
@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.code_sample:
local KeyframeSequence = game:GetService("KeyframeSequenceProvider")
local animation = "rbxassetid://507771019"
local keyframes = {}
local success = pcall(function()
	keyframes = KeyframeSequence:GetKeyframeSequenceAsync(animation)
end)
if success then
	local keyframeTable = keyframes:GetKeyframes()
	for key,value in ipairs(keyframeTable) do
		print("The time of keyframe number",key,"is",value.Time)
	end
else
	print("error getting KeyframeSequence")
end

@roblox/globaltype/KeyframeSequenceProvi.documentation: KeyframeSequenceProvider 是用于加载和预览 KeyframeSequence 的服务。它包括一些在对 Animation 进行创作时非常有用的函数。
动画的内容 ID。
找到的 KeyframeSequence 。
从给定的资源 URL 返回一个 KeyframeSequence 。
KeyframeSequenceProvider 是用于加载和预览 KeyframeSequence 的服务。它包括一些在对 Animation 进行创作时非常有用的函数。
动画的内容 ID。
如果可以返回缓存的版本则为 True。
找到的 KeyframeSequence 。
根据提供的 assetId 返回一个 KeyframeSequence。可选择缓存来减少不必要的加载卡顿。

@roblox/globaltype/LayerCollector.documentation: LayerCollector 是由 2D GUI 对象继承的抽象类，用于分层渲染 GuiObjects。

@roblox/globaltype/LayerCollector.Enable.documentation: Toggles the visibility of the LayerCollector.

@roblox/globaltype/LayerCollector.ResetO.documentation: Controls how this LayerCollector behaves when its associated Player respawns.

@roblox/globaltype/LayerCollector.ZIndex.documentation: Changes how ZIndex behaves on all descendants of the LayerCollector.

@roblox/globaltype/LayerCollector.GetLay.documentation: LayerCollector 是由 2D GUI 对象继承的抽象类，用于分层渲染 GuiObjects。

@roblox/globaltype/Light.documentation: Light 是动态照明相关对象的一种根类别。

@roblox/globaltype/Light.Brightness.documentation: 设置发射光的明亮程度，默认值是 1。

@roblox/globaltype/Light.Enabled.documentation: 如果设置为 true，光就会从源对象中发散出来。

@roblox/globaltype/Light.Shadows.documentation: 如果设置为 true，当光被某障碍物阻挡时，就会投射阴影。

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.documentation: The Lighting service controls the environmental lighting in a game. It includes a range of adjustable properties that can be used to change how lighting appears and interacts with other objects.
@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.code_sample:
local Lighting = game:GetService("Lighting")

-- 常数
local TIME_SPEED = 60 -- 1 分钟 = 1 小时
local START_TIME = 9 -- 早上 9 点
--

local minutesAfterMidnight = START_TIME * 60
local waitTime = 60 / TIME_SPEED

while true do
	minutesAfterMidnight = minutesAfterMidnight + 1

	Lighting:SetMinutesAfterMidnight(minutesAfterMidnight)

	wait(waitTime)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.Ambient.documentation: 适用于室内等天空被遮挡区域的照明色调。

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.ClockTime.documentation: 由 Lighting 使用的当前时间的数值化表示（单位：小时）。

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.ColorShift_B.documentation: 当反光平面处于太阳或月亮的背光面时，其反射光所使用的色调。

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.ColorShift_T.documentation: The hue represented in light reflected from surfaces facing the sun or moon.

@roblox/globaltype/Lighting.FogColor.documentation: DataType.Color3 值用来赋予 Lighting 的雾气色调。

@roblox/globaltype/LocalizationService.G.documentation: Roblox 支持的语言代码。当前支持的语言代码有 “en” （英语）、 “fr” （法语）、 “de” （德语）、 “ko” （韩语）、 “pt” （葡萄牙语）以及 “es” （西班牙语）

直到参数区域设置的云本地化资源（如有）被加载为止都会暂停。会使用加载的区域设置数据返回可以用于翻译的 Translator
@roblox/globaltype/LocalizationService.G.code_sample:
local LS = game:GetService('LocalizationService')

local res,trans = pcall(function()
	return LS:GetTranslatorForLocaleAsync("fr")
end)
	
if res then
	local ctx = game.Workspace.Sign.SurfaceGui.Frame.TextLabel
	local res = trans:Translate(ctx, "Hello World!")
	print('你好的法语翻译：' .. res)
else
	print('GetTranslatorForLocaleAsync 失败：' .. trans)
end

@roblox/globaltype/LocalizationTable.documentation: A LocalizationTable is a database of translations. It contains source strings and translations for various languages.
@roblox/globaltype/LocalizationTable.code_sample:
local LocalizationService = game:GetService("LocalizationService")
local HttpService = game:GetService("HttpService")

local function createLocalizationTable(contents)
	local localTable = Instance.new("LocalizationTable")
	localTable.DevelopmentLanguage = LocalizationService.SystemLocaleId
	localTable.Contents = HttpService:JSONEncode(contents)
	return localTable
end

local helloWorldTable = createLocalizationTable({
	[1] =
	{
		key = "Hello_World"; -- 要配合 GetString 使用的 'expressionKey'
		values = 
		{	-- 对应 IETF 语言标签的键字典，及其翻译。
			["ru"] = " !";			-- 俄语
			["fr"] = "Bonjour le monde!";	-- 法语
			["de"] = "Hallo Welt!";			-- 德语
			["en-US"] = "Hello world!";		-- 英语
			["it"] = "Ciao mondo!";			-- 意大利语
			["pt-BR"] = "Ol Mundo!";		-- 葡萄牙语
			["ja"] = ""; 		-- 日语
			["es"] = "Hola Mundo!";			-- 西班牙语
		}
	}
})

print(helloWorldTable:GetString("en-US","Hello_World"))

一个枚举，代表着开发者产品收据的处理方式。
  • PurchaseGranted用来表明游戏产品已成功将应有的福利内容赠予到玩家手中，比如游戏中的奖励、货币的提升、附加道具等等，同时也通知 Roblox 这次销售已成功完成。 如果产品无法赠予，请不要返回 PurchaseGranted 。

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.AddA.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.
The value of the item to add to the queue.
Item expiration time, in seconds, after which the item will be automatically removed from the queue.
Item priority. Items with higher priority are retrieved from the queue before items with lower priority.
Adds an item to the queue.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Read.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.
Number of items to read. The maximum allowed value of this parameter is 100.

Controls the behavior of the method in the case the queue has fewer than count items: if set to false the method returns all available items; if set to true, it returns no items. The default value is false.

The duration, in seconds, for which the method will wait if the required number of items is not immediately available in the queue. This parameter can be set to zero to indicate no wait. If this parameter is not provided or set to -1, the method will wait indefinitely.

A tuple of two elements. The first element is an array of item values read from the queue. The second element is a string identifier that should be passed to MemoryStoreQueue:RemoveAsync to permanently remove these items from the queue.
Reads one or more items from the queue.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Read.code_sample:
-- obtain necessary services and instances
local UMS = game:GetService("MemoryStoreService")
local DSS = game:GetService(“DataStoreService”)
local queue = UMS:GetQueue("PlayerQueue")
local ds = DSS:GetDataStore(“PlayerStore”)

-- main processing loop
while true do
    pcall(function()
        -- wait for an item to process
        local items, id = queue:ReadAsync(1, false, 30)

        -- check if an item was retrieved
        if #items > 0 then
            -- mark the item as processed
            ds:UpdateAsync(items[0], function(data)
                data = data or {}
                data.processed = 1
                return data
            end)

            -- remove the item from the queue
            queue:RemoveAsync(id)
        end
    end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Remo.documentation: Provides access to a queue within MemoryStore.
Identifies the items to delete. Use the value returned by MemoryStoreQueue:ReadAsync.
Removes an item or items previously read from the queue.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreQueue.Remo.code_sample:
-- obtain necessary services and instances
local UMS = game:GetService("MemoryStoreService")
local DSS = game:GetService(“DataStoreService”)
local queue = UMS:GetQueue("PlayerQueue")
local ds = DSS:GetDataStore(“PlayerStore”)

-- main processing loop
while true do
    pcall(function()
        -- wait for an item to process
        local items, id = queue:ReadAsync(1, false, 30)

        -- check if an item was retrieved
        if #items > 0 then
            -- mark the item as processed
            ds:UpdateAsync(items[0], function(data)
                data = data or {}
                data.processed = 1
                return data
            end)

            -- remove the item from the queue
            queue:RemoveAsync(id)
        end
    end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreService.Ge.documentation: Exposes methods to access specific primitives within MemoryStore.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap.documentation: Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.

@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap..documentation: Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.
Key whose value to retrieve.
Key value, or nil -- if there’s no item with the specified key.
Retrieves the value of a key in the sorted map.
Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.
Sort direction, ascending or descending.
The number of items to retrieve; the maximum allowed value for this parameter is 200.
(Optional) Lower bound, exclusive, for the returned keys.
(Optional) Upper bound, exclusive, for the returned keys.
Item keys and values in the requested range.
Retrieves items within a sorted range of keys.
Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.
Key to remove.
Removes the provided key from the sorted map.
Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.
Key whose value to set.
Key value to set.
Item expiration, in seconds. The item is automatically removed from the sorted map once the expiration duration is reached. The maximum expiration time is 30 days (2,592,000 seconds).
True if a new item was added, false -- if an existing item was updated.
Sets the value of a key.
Provides access to a sorted map within MemoryStore.
Key whose value to update.
A function which you need to provide. The function takes the key’s old value as input and returns the new value.
Item expiration time, in seconds, after which the item will be automatically removed from the sorted map. The maximum expiration time is 30 days (2,592,000 seconds).
The return value is the last value returned by the transform function.
Retrieves the value of a key from a sorted map and updates it with a new value.
@roblox/globaltype/MemoryStoreSortedMap..code_sample:
local UMS = game:GetService(“MemoryStoreService”)
local map = UMS:GetSortedMap(“AuctionItems”)

function PlaceBid(itemKey, bidAmount)
    map:UpdateAsync(itemKey, function (item)
        item = item or { highestBid = 0 }
        if item.highestBid < bidAmount then
            item.highestBid = bidAmount
            return item
        end
        return nil
    end)
end

@roblox/globaltype/MeshContentProvider.documentation: 负责获取、解析和缓存网格的 Roblox 内部服务。开发人员无法使用此服务。

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.documentation: 一种包含物理模拟的自定义网格的 BasePart 形式。

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.DoubleSided.documentation: 在网格上渲染面或多边形的两面

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.MeshId.documentation: The MeshId is the content ID of the mesh that is to be displayed on the MeshPart

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.RenderFideli.documentation: 决定实体建模及网格部件显示的细节水平

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.MeshID.documentation: The MeshId is the content ID of the mesh that is to be displayed on the MeshPart

@roblox/globaltype/MeshPart.ApplyMesh/pa.documentation: 一种包含物理模拟的自定义网格的 BasePart 形式。

@roblox/globaltype/Message.documentation: 用半透明的灰色背景覆盖整个屏幕。在 Roblox 的 GUI 功能发布后已被弃用，以后的新建作品中应使用 TextLabel 进行替代。

@roblox/globaltype/Message.Text.documentation: 设置 Message 或 Hint 的文本。

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.documentation: MessagingService 允许同一个游戏中不同的游戏服务器进行相互通信

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Publ.documentation: MessagingService 允许同一个游戏中不同的游戏服务器进行相互通信
决定将消息发送到何处
要包括在消息中的数据
当有消息被推送到主题时，调用提供的回调

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Subs.documentation: MessagingService 允许同一个游戏中不同的游戏服务器进行相互通信
每次接收消息后调用的函数
可以用来取消订阅主题的连接

@roblox/globaltype/MessagingService.Subs.code_sample:
local messagingService = game:getService("MessagingService")
local players = game:GetService("Players")
 
players.PlayerAdded:connect(function(player)
    -- 对主题进行订阅
    local topic = "player-" .. player.UserId
    local connection = messagingService:SubscribeAsync(topic, function(message)
        print("接收到消息，收件人为 " .. player.Name)
    end)
 
    player.AncestryChanged:connect(function()
        -- 取消主题订阅
        connection:Disconnect()
    end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Model.documentation: Models are container objects, meaning they group objects together. They are best used to hold collections of BasePart and have a number of functions that extend their functionality.
@roblox/globaltype/Model.code_sample:
local function groupObjects(objectTable)
	local model = Instance.new("Model")
	for _, object in pairs(objectTable) do
		object.Parent = model
	end
	return model
end

@roblox/globaltype/Model.World 锚点方向.documentation: 设定锚点方向的仅限编辑者属性。脚本中则必须使用 Model.WorldPivot （模型/世界锚点）。

@roblox/globaltype/Model.WorldPivot.documentation: 决定了一个没有 Model.PrimaryPart （主要部件）的 Model （模型）的锚点所在位置。

@roblox/globaltype/Model.BreakJoints/par.documentation: Models are container objects, meaning they group objects together. They are best used to hold collections of BasePart and have a number of functions that extend their functionality.

@roblox/globaltype/Model.BreakJoints.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(newPlayer)

		wait(3)
		characterModel:BreakJoints()
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetBoundingBox/.documentation: Models are container objects, meaning they group objects together. They are best used to hold collections of BasePart and have a number of functions that extend their functionality.
DataType.CFrame 代表体积的朝向，后面紧跟的 DataType.Vector3 代表的是体积的大小

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetBoundingBox.documentation: 返回包含某一 Model 所有部件的体积的描述

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetExtentsSize/.documentation: Models are container objects, meaning they group objects together. They are best used to hold collections of BasePart and have a number of functions that extend their functionality.

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetExtentsSize.documentation: 返回包含 Model 中所有 BasePart 的最小边界框的大小，与 Model.PrimaryPart 对齐（如已设置）。
@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetExtentsSize.code_sample:
local model = Instance.new('Model', Workspace) -- 创建模型。
 
for i = 1, 5 do
	-- 在模型中放置随机位置的部件。
	local part = Instance.new('Part', model)
	part.Anchored = true
	part.Size = Vector3.new(math.random(5), math.random(5), math.random(5))
end
 
print(model:GetExtentsSize())

@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetPrimaryPartC.documentation: Models are container objects, meaning they group objects together. They are best used to hold collections of BasePart and have a number of functions that extend their functionality.
返回 Model 的 Model.PrimaryPart 的 CFrame。如果该 Model 不存在主要部件，该函数将会报告错误。
@roblox/globaltype/Model.GetPrimaryPartC.code_sample:
local startPosition = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)

-- 在 startPosition 中创建一个简单的旋转模型
local model = Instance.new("Model", game.Workspace)

local part1 = Instance.new("Part")
part1.Size = Vector3.new(4, 4, 4)
part1.CFrame = CFrame.new(startPosition)
part1.Anchored = true
part1.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright yellow")
part1.Parent = model

local part2 = Instance.new("Part")
part2.Size = Vector3.new(2, 2, 2)
part2.CFrame = part1.CFrame * CFrame.new(0, 3, 0)
part2.Anchored = true
part2.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright blue")
part2.Parent = model

-- 设置主要部分
model.PrimaryPart = part1
model.Parent = game.Workspace

while true do
	local primaryPartCFrame = model:GetPrimaryPartCFrame()
	local newCFrame = primaryPartCFrame * CFrame.Angles(0, math.rad(10), 0)
	model:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(newCFrame)
	wait(.2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Model.SetPrimaryPartC.documentation: Models are container objects, meaning they group objects together. They are best used to hold collections of BasePart and have a number of functions that extend their functionality.

@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.documentation: A type of script object that runs once when require is called with it. Returns exactly one value, usually a table of functions, to used by other scripts. Useful for compartmentalizing code.
@roblox/globaltype/ModuleScript.code_sample:
-- 表中的一个变量可以存储多个值
    local my_functions = {}
    
    -- 向表中添加少许函数
    function my_functions.foo()
    	print("Foo!")
    end
    
    function functions.bar()
    	print("Bar!")
    end
    
    -- ModuleScripts 必定返回相同的一个值
    return my_functions

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.ViewSizeX.documentation: 以像素为单位描述了游戏窗口的宽度
@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.ViewSizeX.code_sample:
-- 注意：开发者应该使用 ContextActionService 或者 UserInputService，而不要使用 
-- Mouse 对象来完成此工作。
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = player:GetMouse()

local function onMouseMove()
	-- 构建 Vector2 对象，用其来表示鼠标的位置和屏幕的尺寸
	local position = Vector2.new(mouse.X, mouse.Y)
	local size = Vector2.new(mouse.ViewSizeX, mouse.ViewSizeY)
	-- 一个标准化的位置是将左上角对应为（顶栏的下方）
	-- (0, 0)，将右下角对应为(1, 1)，将中心对应为(0.5, 0.5)。
	-- 用位置除以总大小来得出结果。
	local normalizedPosition = position / size
	print(normalizedPosition)
end
mouse.Move:Connect(onMouseMove)

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Idle.documentation: 每个鼠标未传递至另一鼠标事件的 Heartbeat（心跳单位）都会进行触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Mouse.Move.code_sample:
local player= game.Players.LocalPlayer
local mouse = player:GetMouse()

local point 
local down

local function selectPart()
 	if mouse.Target and not mouse.Target.Locked then 
		point = mouse.Target
  		mouse.TargetFilter = point
  		down = true
 	end
end

local function movePart()
	if down and point then
  		local posX, posY, posZ = mouse.Hit.X,mouse.Hit.Y,mouse.Hit.Z
  		point.Position = Vector3.new(posX,posY,posZ)
 	end
end

local function deselectPart()
 	down = false
	point = nil
 	mouse.TargetFilter = nil
end

mouse.Button1Down:Connect(selectPart)
mouse.Button1Up:Connect(deselectPart)
mouse.Move:Connect(movePart)

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkClient.Ticket.documentation: 客户端的授权票据。仅在连接到非本地 Roblox 服务器时使用。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkClient.Connect.documentation: 当客户端成功连接到服务器时触发。返回包含服务器的 IP、Port 和客户端 ClientReplicator 的字符串。
客户端连接服务器失败时触发。

当客户端尝试连接服务器，但加入的请求被拒绝时触发。 
这种情况通常在客户端使用的 Roblox 版本不正确时发生。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkMarker.documentation: NetworkMarker 用于告诉客户端服务器何时完成加载世界。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkMarker.Receive.documentation: 服务器完成复制世界到客户端时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkPeer.documentation: NetworkPeer 对象是网络对象最基本的类别。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkPeer.SetOutgoi.documentation: NetworkPeer 对象是网络对象最基本的类别。
设置 Roblox 可以使用的最大传出带宽。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkReplicator.documentation: 处理其他对象从服务器复制到客户端或从客户端复制到服务器的对象。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkReplicator.Clo.documentation: 处理其他对象从服务器复制到客户端或从客户端复制到服务器的对象。
断开复制器，结束服务器/客户端之间的连接。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkReplicator.Get.documentation: 处理其他对象从服务器复制到客户端或从客户端复制到服务器的对象。
返回连接到 NetworkReplicator 的玩家。
处理其他对象从服务器复制到客户端或从客户端复制到服务器的对象。
返回包含复制器正在发送/接收的字节数以及当前丢包率的字符串。信息内容由详细级别所决定（0 = 基本、1 = 详细、2 = 完整）。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.Extra.documentation: 一个未使用的调试属性，原用于串流。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.FreeM.documentation: 描述有多少可用的空余内存，单位为 MB 。

@roblox/globaltype/NetworkSettings.Print.documentation: 当设置为 true 时，与物理复制错误相关的 debug 信息将被显示在输出中。

-- 创建一个 Part 来展示 Changed 事件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Transparency” 来触发 Changed 事件

-- 用 “Number” 来触发 Changed 事件

-- 更改 BrickColor 也会同时更改其他属性
-- 因此此行用“BrickColor”、“Color3” 和 “Color3uint16”
-- 来触发 Changed 事件。
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Red()

-- 一个存有双精度浮点数值的 NumberValue 
local vNumber = Instance.new("NumberValue")
vNumber.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 123.456 来触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vNumber.Value = 123456
-- 并不会触发 Changed 事件
vNumber.Name = "SomeNumber"

-- 存储着字符串的 StringValue
local vString = Instance.new("StringValue")
vString.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Hello” 触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vString.Value = "Hello"

@roblox/globaltype/Pants.documentation: Displays a Pants texture from the Roblox website to display on a Humanoid rig
@roblox/globaltype/Pants.code_sample:
local function replaceClothes(player)
    	local character = player.Character
    	if character then 
    		-- 寻找衬衫和裤子
    		local shirt = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt")
    		local pants = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants")
    		-- 如果衬衫和裤子不存在就进行创建
    		if not shirt then 
    			shirt = Instance.new("Shirt", character)
    		end 
    		if not pants then 
    			pants = Instance.new("Pants", character)
     		end
    		-- 重设衬衫和裤子的内容 id
    		shirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83326831"
    		pants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=10045638"
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.documentation: A special effects object that emits customizable 2D billboard particles into the world

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Accel.documentation: 确定所有当前活跃粒子的全局轴加速度，单位为格的平方/秒

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Color.documentation: 决定所有发射的粒子在其各自的持续时间周期内的颜色

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Drag.documentation: 确定粒子在指数式衰减中失去一半速度的速率。

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Emiss.documentation: 决定粒子发射时的朝向

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Lifet.documentation: 决定新生成粒子的持续时间随机范围

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Light.documentation: 决定了粒子的颜色与其后面的颜色相混合的程度

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Locke.documentation: 判断粒子是否会随着它们被发射出的部件来做刚性移动。

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Orien.documentation: 指定如何设置粒子的方向

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Rate.documentation: 决定每秒发射的粒子数量

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.RotSp.documentation: 决定发射粒子的角速度范围，单位为度/秒

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Rotat.documentation: 决定新生成粒子旋转的范围，单位为度

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Size.documentation: 决定各粒子在其持续时间内在世界中的尺寸大小

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Speed.documentation: 决定一个新粒子发射时的速度随机范围，单位为格/秒。

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Sprea.documentation: 决定一个粒子可能的随机发射角度，单位为度

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Trans.documentation: 决定各粒子在其持续时间周期内的透明度

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Veloc.documentation: 决定粒子在发射时会继承来自父项速度的多少

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.ZOffs.documentation: 决定粒子的前 - 后渲染位置；用于控制渲染在顶部 / 底部的粒子。

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Clear.code_sample:
local emitter = script.Parent
while true do
	emitter:Clear()
	emitter:Emit(10)
	wait(2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Emit/.documentation: A special effects object that emits customizable 2D billboard particles into the world

@roblox/globaltype/ParticleEmitter.Emit.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")
local emitter = script.Parent
local part = emitter.Parent

local PARTICLES_PER_STUD = 3

local lastPosition = part.Position
local distance = 0
local function onStep()
	local displacement = part.Position - lastPosition
	distance = distance + displacement.magnitude
	
	local n = math.floor(distance * PARTICLES_PER_STUD)
	emitter:Emit(n)
	distance = distance - n / PARTICLES_PER_STUD
	lastPosition = part.Position
end

RunService.Stepped:Connect(onStep)
emitter.Enabled = false

@roblox/globaltype/Path.GetWaypoints.code_sample:
local PathfindingService = game:GetService("PathfindingService")

-- 创建路径对象
local path = PathfindingService:CreatePath()

local pathStart = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)
local pathEnd = Vector3.new(100, 1, 25)

-- 计算并检查路径
path:ComputeAsync(pathStart, pathEnd)

if path.Status == Enum.PathStatus.Success then
	-- 获取路径点
	local waypoints = path:GetWaypoints()
	-- 循环路径点
	for _, waypoint in pairs(waypoints) do
		-- 输出路径点的位置
		print(waypoint.Position)
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.Allow.documentation: 设为 true 时，如果物理模拟对象在特定的一段时间内没有或几乎没有运动，模拟将会停止。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreAn.documentation: 若设为 true，则 BasePart.Anchored 的部件会在当前面向地面的部件边界框的表面上显示灰色的表面轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreAw.documentation: 设为 true 时，当前被物理模拟的部件会有红色轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreBo.documentation: 当设为 true 时，根据 Part 的根模拟体状态，其轮廓将为指定颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreCo.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个接触岛都会被分配一个随机的颜色，然后在其部件上渲染 SelectionBox 装饰。
当设为 true 时，将在每个部件出现物理交互的接触点处绘制球体装饰物。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreJo.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个部件的 BasePart.CFrame 处会渲染 XYZ 轴。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreMe.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个单独的部件机制都会被赋予唯一的颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreMo.documentation: 一个自 2007 年末以来就没有正常工作过的陈旧属性。 原用于在 Model 的根部件渲染 XYZ 轴，但轴渲染组件无法正常工作。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreOw.documentation: 设为 true 时，每个 Player 的角色会有唯一颜色的轮廓，且玩家拥有网络所有权的每个部件也会有相同颜色的轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreRe.documentation: 当设置为 true 时，会在每个 Player 的角色周围绘制圆柱体，代表其 Player.SimulationRadius。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreUn.documentation: 设为 true 时，没有对齐到 1x1x1 网格的部件会有黄色的轮廓。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.AreWo.documentation:
一个自 2007 年末以来就没有正常工作过的陈旧属性。
原用于在世界的中心渲染 XYZ 轴，但轴渲染组件无法正常工作。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.IsRec.documentation: 该属性本用于显示部件的 BasePart.ReceiveAge，但目前不能正常工作。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.IsTre.documentation: 当设为 true 时，每个部件的关节连接及其底层基元组件的状态将显现为生成树视觉效果。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.ShowD.documentation: 设为 true 时，PartOperation 和 MeshPart 的底层碰撞几何体会被渲染出。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.Throt.documentation: 如果 PhysicsSettings.PhysicsEnvironmentalThrottle 设为 DefaultAuto，将会指定物理环境限流可以进行自动改变之前所需等待的最大时间长度。

@roblox/globaltype/PhysicsSettings.UseCS.documentation: 若设为 true，则使用第 2 版的 Roblox CSG 解算器而不是第 1 版。

@roblox/globaltype/PitchShiftSoundEffect.documentation: 要改变原始音频的百分比。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
@roblox/globaltype/Player.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players") -- game.Players is OK here, too

-- 最终所有 Player 对象都会调用一次此函数
local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 为排行榜数据创建容器
	local leaderstats = Instance.new("Folder")
	leaderstats.Name = "leaderstats"
	
	-- 创建一个排行榜数据值
	local vScore = Instance.new("IntValue")
	vScore.Name = "Score"
	vScore.Value = 0
	vScore.Parent = leaderstats
	
	-- 添加到玩家（显示它）
	leaderstats.Parent = player
end

-- 处理已经加入到游戏的 Player 对象
for _, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
-- 处理即将添加到游戏的 Player 对象
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded) -- 注意这里是 PlayerAdded 不是 ChildAdded 哦！

@roblox/globaltype/Player.AccountAge.documentation: 描述玩家的账户注册时长（以天为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.AutoJumpEnable.documentation: 决定使用移动设备的玩家角色是否会在遇到障碍物时自动跳跃。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.AutoJumpEnable.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local button = script.Parent

local function update()
	-- 更新按键文本
	if player.AutoJumpEnabled then
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is ON"
	else
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is OFF"
	end
	-- 映射属性至玩家的角色（如果有的话）
	if player.Character then
		local human = player.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if human then
			human.AutoJumpEnabled = player.AutoJumpEnabled
		end
	end
end

local function onActivated()
	-- 切换自动跳跃
	player.AutoJumpEnabled = not player.AutoJumpEnabled
	-- 更新其余内容
	update()
end
button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
update()

@roblox/globaltype/Player.DevEnableMouse.documentation: 决定玩家是否可以切换鼠标锁定
@roblox/globaltype/Player.DevEnableMouse.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function toggleMouseLock(player)
	-- 对属性进行切换
	player.DevEnableMouseLock = not player.DevEnableMouseLock
	-- 显示属性是否为 true
	if player.DevEnableMouseLock then
		print("鼠标锁定可用")
	else
		print("鼠标锁定不可用")
	end
end

local function onPlayerChatted(player, message, recipient) 
	if message == "mouselock" then
		toggleMouseLock(player)
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.Chatted:Connect(function (...) onPlayerChatted(player, ...) end)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

local Debris = game:GetService("Debris")
local player = Players.LocalPlayer

local function onPlayerAdded(newPlayer)
	if newPlayer.FollowUserId == player.UserId then
		local hint = Instance.new("Hint")
		hint.Parent = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
		hint.Text = "有玩家跟随你进入游戏：" .. newPlayer.Name .. "！"

@roblox/globaltype/Player.GetJoinData.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")

local approvedPlaceIds = {1} -- 在此处插入有效的 PlaceIds

local function isPlaceIdApproved(placeId)
    for _, id in pairs(approvedPlaceIds) do
        if id == placeId then
            return true
        end
    end
    return false
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    local joinData = player:GetJoinData()

    -- 验证此数据是来自一个有效的位置
    if isPlaceIdApproved(joinData.SourcePlaceId) then

        local teleportData = joinData.TeleportData
        if teleportData then
            local currentLevel = teleportData.currentLevel
            print(player.Name.." is on level "..currentLevel)
        end
    end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacter/.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacter.documentation: 为玩家创建新的角色，并将旧角色移除。同时会清除玩家 Backpack 和 PlayerGui 中的所有内容。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacter.code_sample:
local respawnDelay = 5

game.Players.CharacterAutoLoads = false

game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(character)
		-- 找到人形，并检测它的死亡
		local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Died:Connect(function()
				wait(respawnDelay)
				player:LoadCharacter()
			end)
		end
	end)
	player:LoadCharacter() -- 首次加载角色
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterB.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
与 Player:LoadCharacter 功能相似，但其请求将会同步处理，而非异步处理。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterW.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
HumanoidDescription 包含的特征有：身体部位或颜色、身体比例、饰品、服装和动画。这些特征将装备到加载的角色上
生成一个虚拟角色并装备 HumanoidDescription 中传递的一切
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterW.code_sample:
-- 停止自动刷新，使其可以在 “PlayerAdded” 回调中完成
game.Players.CharacterAutoLoads = false
 
local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 创建一个 HumanoidDescription
	local humanoidDescription = Instance.new("HumanoidDescription")
	humanoidDescription.HatAccessory = "2551510151,2535600138"
	humanoidDescription.BodyTypeScale = 0.1
	humanoidDescription.ClimbAnimation = 619521311
	humanoidDescription.Face = 86487700
	humanoidDescription.GraphicTShirt = 1711661
	humanoidDescription.HeadColor = Color3.new(0, 1, 0)
	-- 以 HumanoidDescription 生成角色
	player:LoadCharacterWithHumanoidDescription(humanoidDescription)
end
 
-- 连接 “PlayerAdded” 事件至 “onPlayerAdded()” 函数
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.RequestStreamA.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
请求服务器向指定地点附近的玩家串流
@roblox/globaltype/Player.RequestStreamA.code_sample:
-- Localscript
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local teleportEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("TeleportEvent")
local teleportTarget = CFrame.new(50, 2, 120)
 
-- 触发远程事件
teleportEvent:FireServer(teleportTarget)


-- 服务器脚本
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local teleportEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("TeleportEvent")
 
-- 传送玩家
local function teleportPlayer(player, teleportTarget)
	-- 请求目标位置附近的串流
	player:RequestStreamAroundAsync(teleportTarget.Position)
	-- 传送角色
	player.Character:SetPrimaryPartCFrame(teleportTarget)
end
 
-- 当客户端触发远程事件时调用 “teleportPlayer()”
teleportEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(teleportPlayer)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterA.documentation: An object that represents a presently connected client to the game.
将被加载的资源实例，可以通过 InsertService 的 InsertService:LoadAsset 函数进行获取
将给定实例放入玩家角色或头部，或者根据实例类别将其放入 StarterGear。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.LoadCharacterA.code_sample:
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
    player.Chatted:Connect(function(message)
        local assetId = message:match("id=(%d+)")
        if assetId then
            local model = game:GetService("InsertService"):LoadAsset(assetId)
            for _, child in pairs(model:GetChildren()) do
                player:LoadCharacterAppearance(child)
            end
        end
    end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterAdded.documentation: 当玩家角色生成或重生时触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.CharacterAdded.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	print(character.Name .. "已生成")
end

local function onCharacterRemoving(character)
	print(character.Name .. "即将消失")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.Chatted.documentation: 当玩家使用 Roblox 提供的聊天栏进行游戏内聊天时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.Idled.documentation: 通常在游戏引擎将玩家定类为闲置状态的两分钟后进行触发。Time（时间）为此时点后所经历的秒数。

@roblox/globaltype/Player.OnTeleport.documentation: 当玩家的 TeleportState 更改后触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.OnTeleport.code_sample:
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	local playerOnTeleport = player
	player.OnTeleport:Connect(function(teleportState, placeId, spawnName)
		if teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.Started then
			print("传送开始 ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.WaitingForServer then
			print("传送正在等候服务器 ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.InProgress then
			print("传送进行中 ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		elseif teleportState == Enum.TeleportState.Failed then
			print("传送失败！ ("..playerOnTeleport.Name..")")
		end
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Player.SimulationRadi.documentation: 当 Player 的 Player.SimulationRadius 更改后触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Player.SimulationRadi.code_sample:
-- 获得本地玩家
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

-- 设置最大模拟范围（默认值是 1000）
player.MaximumSimulationsRadius = 800

-- 更改模拟范围
local change = -20
while true do
	change = change * -1
	player.SimulationRadius = player.SimulationRadius + change
	wait(5)
end

-- 输出更新后的模拟范围
player.SimulationRadiusChanged:Connect(function(radius)
	print("The new simulation radius is: "..radius.."studs")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Players.documentation: A game service that contains presently connected Player objects.
@roblox/globaltype/Players.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local function onCharacterAdded(character)
	-- 如果头顶还没闪光，则添加
	if not character:FindFirstChild("Sparkles") then
		local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles")
		sparkles.Parent = character:WaitForChild("Head")
	end
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	-- 检查他们是否已经生成进入了
	if player.Character then
		onCharacterAdded(player.Character)
	end
	-- 监听玩家的 (重新)生成 
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterAdded)
end

-- 遍历所有已经连入的玩家
-- 使用一般的 for-loop
for i, player in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	onPlayerAdded(player)
end
-- 监听新连入的玩家
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/Players.BubbleChat.documentation: 指示气泡聊天是否启用。可用 Players:SetChatStyle 方法设置。
@roblox/globaltype/Players.BubbleChat.code_sample:
local Players = game.Players

if (Players.ClassicChat and Players.BubbleChat) then
	print("Classic and Bubble chat are enabled!")
elseif (Players.ClassicChat) then
	print("Classic chat is enabled!")
elseif (Players.BubbleChat) then
	print("Bubble chat is enabled!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Players.CharacterAuto.documentation: 指示 Character 是否自动重生。
@roblox/globaltype/Players.CharacterAuto.code_sample:
-- 将 CharacterAutoLoads 设为 false
game.Players.CharacterAutoLoads = false

-- 死亡时从工作区移除玩家的角色
game.Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	while true do
		local char = player.CharacterAdded:wait()
		char.Humanoid.Died:Connect(function()
			char:Remove()
		end)
	end
end)

-- 每隔 10 秒重生所有死亡的玩家
while true do
	local players = game.Players:GetChildren()
	
	-- 检查每个玩家是否没有角色，即是否死亡，如果已死亡则加载该玩家的角色
	for i, player in pairs (players) do		
		if (not game.Workspace:FindFirstChild(player.Name)) then
			player:LoadCharacter()
		end
	end

	-- 等待 10 秒再进行下一次重生检查
	wait(10)
end

@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetUserIdFrom.documentation: A game service that contains presently connected Player objects.
使用指定 name 的用户的 Player.UserId
向 Roblox 网站发送一个具有给定用户名的账户 Player.UserId 的查询。
@roblox/globaltype/Players.GetUserIdFrom.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

-- Memoization: 因为这些结果几乎从不变化（甚至根本不变）
-- 因此我们只需要查找缓存表里的 name
-- 如果我们找到了 name, 那么就大功告成了！返回用户 id 即可 (很快)
-- 如果我们没能找到 name (缓存缺失)，就需要查找它 (需要时间)
local cache = {}
function getUserIdFromUsername(name)
	-- 首先检查缓存是否包括 name
	if cache[name] then return cache[name] end
	-- 然后检查该用户是否已经连接到了服务器
	local player = Players:FindFirstChild(name)
	if player then
		cache[name] = player.UserId
		return player.UserId
	end 
	-- 如果其他都失败了，发送一个请求
	local id
	pcall(function ()
		id = Players:GetUserIdFromNameAsync(name)
	end)
	cache[name] = id
	return id
end

print(getUserIdFromUsername("Ozzypig")) --> 269323
print(getUserIdFromUsername("Ozzypig")) --> 269323, 这一个返回要快得多
print(getUserIdFromUsername("Shedletsky")) --> 261

@roblox/globaltype/Plugin.CreateDockWidg.code_sample:
-- 创建新的 'DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo' 对象
local widgetInfo = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(
	Enum.InitialDockState.Float,  -- 控件将在浮动面板中初始化
	true,   -- 控件在初始时将启用
	false,  -- 不要覆盖之前的启用状态
	200,    -- 浮窗的默认宽度
	300,    -- 浮窗的默认高度
	150,    -- 浮窗的最小宽度 （ 可选 ）
	150     -- 浮窗的最小高度（ 可选 ）
)

--创建新的控件 GUI
local testWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("TestWidget", widgetInfo)

local testButton = Instance.new("TextButton")
testButton.BorderSizePixel = 0
testButton.TextSize = 20
testButton.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1,0.2,0.4)
testButton.AnchorPoint = Vector2.new(0.5,0.5)
testButton.Size = UDim2.new(1,0,1,0)
testButton.Position = UDim2.new(0.5,0,0.5,0)
testButton.SizeConstraint = Enum.SizeConstraint.RelativeYY
testButton.Text = "Click Me"
testButton.Parent = testWidget

@roblox/globaltype/PluginGui.GetRelative.documentation: 鼠标相对于 PluginGui 的屏幕位置（单位是像素）

@roblox/globaltype/PluginGui.GetRelative.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local widgetInfo = DockWidgetPluginGuiInfo.new(
	Enum.InitialDockState.Float,
	true, false, -- 启用状态，覆盖
	200, 300,    -- 尺寸
	150, 150     -- 最小尺寸
)

local testWidget = plugin:CreateDockWidgetPluginGui("TestWidget", widgetInfo)

function update()
	local v2 = testWidget:GetRelativeMousePosition()
	testWidget.Title = ("(%d, %d)"):format(v2.x, v2.y)
end
RunService.Stepped:connect(update)
update()

  • 这个函数创建一个临时动作，该动作不会在 Studio 的自定义快捷窗口中显示。

相关信息还可查阅

  • articles/Intro to Plugins，介绍插件使用和开发的文章

@roblox/globaltype/PolicyService.GetPoli.documentation: 帮助你构建符合国际惯例的游戏组件。
开发者获取到的政策信息所针对的玩家对象
一个字典，里面含有针对某个给定玩家的政策信息
针对玩家所在的地理位置、玩家的年龄和玩家所在平台来获取关于某玩家的相关政策信息并将这些信息返回
@roblox/globaltype/PolicyService.GetPoli.code_sample:
local PolicyService = game:GetService("PolicyService")
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

local result, policyInfo = pcall(function()
	return PolicyService:GetPolicyInfoForPlayerAsync(player)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.documentation: A Pose holds the CFrame applied to the Motor6D connected to its associated BasePart. The part which is controlled depends on the name of the Pose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.CFrame.documentation: 将要应用于 Pose 对应的 Motor6D 的 CFrame。此 CFrame 通过更改电机的 Motor6D\Transform 属性来应用。

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.AddSubPose/param.documentation: A Pose holds the CFrame applied to the Motor6D connected to its associated BasePart. The part which is controlled depends on the name of the Pose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.AddSubPose.documentation: 此函数将一个 Pose 设置为另一个 Pose 的子项，作为它的子 Pose。
@roblox/globaltype/Pose.AddSubPose.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local pose = Instance.new("Pose")
pose.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out
local pose2 = Instance.new("Pose")
pose2.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose2.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemovePose(pose) -- pose.Parent = nil 

wait(2)

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

pose:AddSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = pose

wait(2)

pose:RemoveSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses/para.documentation: A Pose holds the CFrame applied to the Motor6D connected to its associated BasePart. The part which is controlled depends on the name of the Pose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses.documentation: 此函数会返回一个数组，其中包含所有添加至 Pose 的子 Pose。
@roblox/globaltype/Pose.GetSubPoses.code_sample:
local function resetPoses(parent)
    	-- 两个函数都等于 GetChildren
    	local poses = parent:IsA("Keyframe") and parent:GetPoses() 
    		or parent:IsA("Pose") and parent:GetSubPoses()
    
    	for _, pose in pairs(poses) do 
    		if pose:IsA("Pose") then
    			pose.CFrame = CFrame.new()
    			-- 递归
    			resetPoses(pose)
    		end
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose/pa.documentation: A Pose holds the CFrame applied to the Motor6D connected to its associated BasePart. The part which is controlled depends on the name of the Pose.

@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose.documentation: 此函数通过将子 Pose 的父项设置为 nil 来将其从 Pose 中移除。
@roblox/globaltype/Pose.RemoveSubPose.code_sample:
local keyframe = Instance.new("Keyframe", workspace)

local pose = Instance.new("Pose")
pose.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out
local pose2 = Instance.new("Pose")
pose2.EasingStyle = Enum.PoseEasingStyle.Cubic
pose2.EasingDirection = Enum.PoseEasingDirection.Out

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

keyframe:RemovePose(pose) -- pose.Parent = nil 

wait(2)

keyframe:AddPose(pose) -- pose.Parent = keyframe

wait(2)

pose:AddSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = pose

wait(2)

pose:RemoveSubPose(pose2) -- pose2.Parent = nil

@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.documentation: An object that allows developers to prompt users to interact with an object in the 3D world
@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.code_sample:
local proximityPrompt = script.Parent
local seat = proximityPrompt.Parent.Seat

seat:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Occupant"):Connect(function()
    if seat.Occupant then
        proximityPrompt.Enabled = false
    else
        proximityPrompt.Enabled = true
    end
end)

proximityPrompt.Triggered:Connect(function(player)
    seat:Sit(player.Character.Humanoid)
end)

An object that allows developers to prompt users to interact with an object in the 3D world

@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.Promp.documentation: 在玩家开始按住一个提示长按（ProximityPrompt.HoldDuration 非零）的 ProximityPrompt.KeyboardKeyCode 或按钮时触发
在玩家释放一个提示长按（ProximityPrompt.HoldDuration 非零）的按钮时触发

@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.Trigg.documentation: 在 ProximityPrompt.KeyboardKeyCode 或按钮被释放时触发，用于需要玩家长按按钮的事件
@roblox/globaltype/ProximityPrompt.Trigg.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local playersHealing = {}

RunService.Stepped:Connect(function(currentTime, deltaTime)
	for player, v in pairs(playersHealing) do
		local humanoid = player.Character:FindFirstChildWhichIsA("Humanoid")
		if humanoid then
			humanoid.Health = humanoid.Health + 30*deltaTime
		end
	end
end)


script.Parent.Triggered:connect(function(player)
	playersHealing[player] = true
end)

script.Parent.TriggerEnded:connect(function(player)
	playersHealing[player] = nil
end)

local proximityPrompt = script.Parent
local seat = proximityPrompt.Parent.Seat

seat:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Occupant"):Connect(function()

        proximityPrompt.Enabled = false

@roblox/globaltype/PVAdornment.documentation: PVAdornment 类是一个抽象类，其继承者可以装饰到 PVInstance 类对象。
