@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.documentation: Abstract class for all objects that have a physical location in the world, specifically BasePart and Model.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.Origin 方向.documentation: 用于围绕其锚点旋转对象的仅限编辑者属性。脚本中则必须使用 PVInstance:PivotTo （锚点于）。

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.Origin 位置.documentation: 用于移动对象的仅限编辑者属性。脚本中则必须使用 PVInstance:PivotTo （锚点于）。

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.Pivot Offs.documentation: Editor-only property to set the orientation of the pivot relative to a part. Scripts must use BasePart.PivotOffset instead.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.Pivot 偏移位置.documentation: 设定锚点相对于某部件位置的仅限编辑者属性。脚本中则必须使用 BasePart.PivotOffset （基本部件/锚点偏移）。

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.GetPivot/p.documentation: Abstract class for all objects that have a physical location in the world, specifically BasePart and Model.

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.GetPivot.code_sample:
-- This code should be placed in a LocalScript under StarterPlayerScripts
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local function doTeleport()
	local player = Players.LocalPlayer
	local character = player.Character
	if character and character.Parent then
		-- Move the character 10 studs forwards in the direction they're facing
		local currentPivot = character:GetPivot()
		character:PivotTo(currentPivot * CFrame.new(0, 0, -10))
	end
end

ContextActionService:BindAction("Teleport", doTeleport, true, Enum.KeyCode.F)

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.PivotTo/pa.documentation: Abstract class for all objects that have a physical location in the world, specifically BasePart and Model.
在将其移动后， PVInstance 锚点应该等于 datatype.CFrame 。

@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.PivotTo.documentation: Transforms the PVInstance along with all of its descendant PVInstance such that the pivot is now located at the specified datatype.CFrame.
@roblox/globaltype/PVInstance.PivotTo.code_sample:
-- This code should be placed in a LocalScript under StarterPlayerScripts
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")

local function doTeleport()
	local player = Players.LocalPlayer
	local character = player.Character
	if character and character.Parent then
		-- Move the character 10 studs forwards in the direction they're facing
		local currentPivot = character:GetPivot()
		character:PivotTo(currentPivot * CFrame.new(0, 0, -10))
	end
end

ContextActionService:BindAction("Teleport", doTeleport, true, Enum.KeyCode.F)

@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.documentation: A container object for a single Ray.
@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.code_sample:
local partA = workspace.PartA
local partB = workspace.PartB

-- 构建 Ray 对象
local origin = partA.Position
local direction = partB.Position - partA.Position
local ray = Ray.new(origin, direction)

-- 构建 RayValue 来存储新建的 Ray
local rayValue = Instance.new("RayValue")
rayValue.Value = ray
rayValue.Name = "PartA-to-PartB Ray"
rayValue.Parent = workspace

-- 通过 Raycast（射线投射）寻找 PartA 和 PartB 之间的部件
local part = workspace:FindPartOnRay(ray)
if part then
	print("Hit part: " .. part:GetFullName())
else
	-- 这正常情况下不应该发生，因为我们的射线开始于 PartA
	-- 并指向 PartB ，所以我们本应肯定会命中 PartB
	-- 或者路径上的某些其他部件。
	print("No part hit!")
end

@roblox/globaltype/RayValue.Changed.code_sample:
local value = Instance.new("RayValue")
value.Parent = game.Workspace

value.Changed:Connect(function(NewValue)
    print(NewValue)
end)

local start = Vector3.new(0,0,0)
local lookAt = Vector3.new(10,10,10)
local ray = Ray.new(start, (lookAt - start).unit)
value.Value = ray

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.documentation: Similar to BindableEvent, but allows crossing the client/server boundary.
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.code_sample:
-- LocalScript
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("CreatePartEvent")
 
createPartEvent:FireServer(BrickColor.Green(), Vector3.new(10, 20, 0))


-- ========================================


-- Script
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = Instance.new("RemoteEvent", ReplicatedStorage)
createPartEvent.Name = "CreatePartEvent"
 
local function onCreatePartFired(player, color, position)
	print(player.Name, "wants to create a part")
	local newPart = Instance.new("Part")
	newPart.BrickColor = color
	newPart.Position = position
	newPart.Parent = game.Workspace
end
 
createPartEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(onCreatePartFired)

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.FireAllCl.documentation: Similar to BindableEvent, but allows crossing the client/server boundary.
将传入所有 RemoteEvent.OnClientEvent 方法的参数。
在每个客户端触发 RemoteEvent.OnClientEvent 事件。

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.FireClien.documentation: Similar to BindableEvent, but allows crossing the client/server boundary.
远程事件触发所影响的 Player。

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.FireServe.documentation: Similar to BindableEvent, but allows crossing the client/server boundary.
在服务器端用同样的参数触发 RemoteEvent.OnServerEvent 事件，前面外加一个玩家参数。
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.FireServe.code_sample:
-- LocalScript
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("CreatePartEvent")
 
createPartEvent:FireServer(BrickColor.Green(), Vector3.new(10, 20, 0))


-- ========================================


-- Script
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = Instance.new("RemoteEvent", ReplicatedStorage)
createPartEvent.Name = "CreatePartEvent"
 
local function onCreatePartFired(player, color, position)
	print(player.Name, "wants to create a part")
	local newPart = Instance.new("Part")
	newPart.BrickColor = color
	newPart.Position = position
	newPart.Parent = game.Workspace
end
 
createPartEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(onCreatePartFired)

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.OnClientE.documentation: 当 RemoteEvent:FireClient 或 RemoteEvent:FireAllClients 从 Script 调用时触发 LocalScript 内的监听函数。

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.OnServerE.documentation: RemoteEvent:FireServer 从一个 LocalScript 中调用时触发 Script 中的监听函数。
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteEvent.OnServerE.code_sample:
-- LocalScript
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("CreatePartEvent")
 
createPartEvent:FireServer(BrickColor.Green(), Vector3.new(10, 20, 0))


-- ========================================


-- Script
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local createPartEvent = Instance.new("RemoteEvent", ReplicatedStorage)
createPartEvent.Name = "CreatePartEvent"
 
local function onCreatePartFired(player, color, position)
	print(player.Name, "wants to create a part")
	local newPart = Instance.new("Part")
	newPart.BrickColor = color
	newPart.Position = position
	newPart.Parent = game.Workspace
end
 
createPartEvent.OnServerEvent:Connect(onCreatePartFired)

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.documentation: 用于创建客户端和服务器用来彼此通信的游戏内 API。
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.code_sample:
-- 在服务器脚本中
function RemoteFunction.OnServerInvoke(player, name)
	print("你好，我名叫", name, "，这次调用的发起者是", player.Name)
	return player.Name
end

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.Invoke.documentation: 用于创建客户端和服务器用来彼此通信的游戏内 API。
远程函数触发所影响的 Player。
通过 RemoteFunction.OnClientInvoke 为指定 Player 调用绑定至 RemoteFunction 的方法。请将其放入 Script 使用。
用于创建客户端和服务器用来彼此通信的游戏内 API。
通过 RemoteFunction.OnServerInvoke 调用绑定至 RemoteFunction 的方法。请将其放入 LocalScript 使用。将返回 RemoteFunction.OnServerInvoke 的返回内容。
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.Invoke.code_sample:
-- LocalScript
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local createPartRequest = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("CreatePartRequest")
 
local newPart = createPartRequest:InvokeServer()
print("The server created this part for me:", newPart)


-- ==================================================


-- Script
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local createPartRequest = Instance.new("RemoteFunction")
createPartRequest.Parent = ReplicatedStorage
createPartRequest.Name = "CreatePartRequest"
 
local function onCreatePartRequested(player)
	print(player.Name, "wants to create a new part")
	local newPart = Instance.new("Part")
	newPart.Parent = game.Workspace
	return newPart
end
 
createPartRequest.OnServerInvoke = onCreatePartRequested

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.OnClie.documentation: 与 RemoteFunction:InvokeClient 传递的参数相对应。
函数所返回的值将由 RemoteFunction:InvokeClient 返回（至服务器端）。
当客户端被 RemoteFunction:InvokeClient 调用时将对其进行调用。

@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.OnServ.documentation: 对应发起 RemoteFunction:InvokeServer 函数调用客户端的 Player。
传递给 RemoteFunction:InvokeServer 的参数将被传递给函数。
函数所返回的值将由 RemoteFunction:InvokeServer 返回（至客户端）。
当服务器被 RemoteFunction:InvokeServer 调用时将对其进行调用。
@roblox/globaltype/RemoteFunction.OnServ.code_sample:
-- LocalScript
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local createPartRequest = ReplicatedStorage:WaitForChild("CreatePartRequest")
 
local newPart = createPartRequest:InvokeServer()
print("The server created this part for me:", newPart)


-- ==================================================


-- Script
 
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
 
local createPartRequest = Instance.new("RemoteFunction")
createPartRequest.Parent = ReplicatedStorage
createPartRequest.Name = "CreatePartRequest"
 
local function onCreatePartRequested(player)
	print(player.Name, "wants to create a new part")
	local newPart = Instance.new("Part")
	newPart.Parent = game.Workspace
	return newPart
end
 
createPartRequest.OnServerInvoke = onCreatePartRequested

@roblox/globaltype/RenderingTest.CFrame.documentation: 当 RenderingTest 被执行时 Camera 将使用的 CFrame。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderingTest.Compari.documentation: 该 RenderingTest 的捕获图像与其初始图像间可达到的最大区别。
当该 RenderingTest 的图像捕获与其初始图像进行对比时预期使用的对比方法。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.AutoFR.documentation: 当 RenderSettings.EnableFRM 设为 true 时，设置帧率管理器的初始品质等级。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.EagerB.documentation: 当设为 true 时，无论性能消耗多大，所有场景更新都将获取无限预算。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.EditQu.documentation: 当 RenderSettings.EnableFRM 设为 false 时，用来设置 Roblox Studio 的图像质量等级。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.Enable.documentation: 切换帧率管理器的启用状态。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.Export.documentation: 设置材质在 Roblox 的 OBJ 导出器中按部件生成或按独特外观生成。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.FrameR.documentation: 指定帧率管理器的行为。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.Graphi.documentation: Roblox 启动时将会使用的图像 API。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.MeshCa.documentation: 网格缓存的大小（以字节为单位）。 默认为 32 MB。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.Qualit.documentation: 如果 RenderSettings.EnableFRM 设为 true，则该属性将会控制 Roblox Studio 中的质量等级。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.Reload.documentation: 当设为 true 时，Roblox Studio 将会自动重新加载 Roblox 的 content 文件夹中文件的更改。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.Render.documentation: 当设为 true 时，所有 PartOperation 对象上都会显示多边形构成的线框。

@roblox/globaltype/RenderSettings.ShowBo.documentation: 当设为 true 时，将会渲染场景中每个渲染过的个体实体的边界框。

@roblox/globaltype/ReplicatedFirst.documentation: 此容器内的所有内容会优先复制给所有客户端（但不会复制回服务器端）。
@roblox/globaltype/ReplicatedFirst.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local player = Players.LocalPlayer 
local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

-- 创建一个基本加载屏幕
local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
screenGui.IgnoreGuiInset = true
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
textLabel.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0, 20, 40)
textLabel.Font = Enum.Font.GothamSemibold
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
textLabel.Text = "Loading"
textLabel.TextSize = 28
textLabel.Parent = screenGui
-- 将整个屏幕 GUI 设为玩家 GUI 的子项
screenGui.Parent = playerGui

-- 移除默认的加载屏幕
ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()

--wait(3)  -- 可选择强制此屏幕最少显示几秒
if not game:IsLoaded() then
	game.Loaded:Wait()
end
screenGui:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/ReplicatedFirst.Remov.documentation: 此容器内的所有内容会优先复制给所有客户端（但不会复制回服务器端）。
立即移除默认的 Roblox 加载界面。请注意，如果任何对象被置于 ReplicatedFirst 内，则默认加载界面会在 5 秒后移除，无论此函数是否被调用。
@roblox/globaltype/ReplicatedFirst.Remov.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local player = Players.LocalPlayer 
local playerGui = player:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

-- 创建一个基本加载屏幕
local screenGui = Instance.new("ScreenGui")
screenGui.IgnoreGuiInset = true
local textLabel = Instance.new("TextLabel")
textLabel.Size = UDim2.new(1, 0, 1, 0)
textLabel.BackgroundColor3 = Color3.fromRGB(0, 20, 40)
textLabel.Font = Enum.Font.GothamSemibold
textLabel.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0.8, 0.8, 0.8)
textLabel.Text = "Loading"
textLabel.TextSize = 28
textLabel.Parent = screenGui
-- 将整个屏幕 GUI 设为玩家 GUI 的子项
screenGui.Parent = playerGui

-- 移除默认的加载屏幕
ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()

--wait(3)  -- 可选择强制此屏幕最少显示几秒
if not game:IsLoaded() then
	game.Loaded:Wait()
end
screenGui:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/RocketPropulsion.Fire.documentation: Applies a force so that a part follows and faces another part

@roblox/globaltype/RodConstraint.Current.documentation: RodConstraint 的两个 Attachment 之间的当前距离。

@roblox/globaltype/RodConstraint.Length.documentation: RodConstraint 试图在其两个 Attachment 间维持的距离。以格为单位。

@roblox/globaltype/RootInstance.documentation: An internal class that contains utility APIs for the Workspace. None of these members are publicly available to Roblox's Lua API.

@roblox/globaltype/RopeConstraint.Curren.documentation: RopeConstraint 的两个 Attachment 之间的当前距离。

@roblox/globaltype/RopeConstraint.Length.documentation: 连接至同一个 RopeConstraint 时两个 Attachment 之间的最大距离。以格为单位。

@roblox/globaltype/RopeConstraint.Restit.documentation: Restitution（恢复系数）控制由 RopeConstraint 连接的 Attachment 在达到绳子的最大 RopeConstraint.Length 时会多么有弹性。此属性的值限制在 0 和 1 之间。

@roblox/globaltype/RotationCurve.Length.documentation: Number of rotation keys in this curve

@roblox/globaltype/RotationCurve.GetKeyA.documentation: Returns a copy of a key at a given index.

@roblox/globaltype/RotationCurve.GetKeyI.documentation: Returns the index of the last and first key of a period of time.

@roblox/globaltype/RotationCurve.GetKeys.documentation: Returns a copy of all the keys in the RotationCurve as a Lua array of RotationCurveKey.

@roblox/globaltype/RotationCurve.GetValu.documentation: Samples the RotationCurve at a given time and returns the corresponding rotation. Empty RotationCurves are interpreted as zero.

@roblox/globaltype/RotationCurve.InsertK.documentation: Adds the key passed as argument to this curve. If a key at the same time is found it will be replaced.

@roblox/globaltype/RotationCurve.RemoveK.documentation: Removes a given number of Keys starting from a given index. Returns the number of keys that were removed.

@roblox/globaltype/RotationCurve.SetKeys.documentation: Resets this curve keys using the RotationCurveKey array passed as argument.

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.documentation: Game service responsible for all run-time activity and progression of time
@roblox/globaltype/RunService.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local PART_START_POS = Vector3.new(0, 10, 0)
local PART_SPEED = Vector3.new(10, 0, 0)

-- 使用 BodyPosition 创建一个部件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.CFrame = CFrame.new(PART_START_POS)
local bp = Instance.new("BodyPosition")
bp.Parent = part
bp.Position = PART_START_POS
part.Parent = workspace

local function onStep(currentTime, deltaTime)
	-- 在 `deltaTime` 秒里将部件
	-- 按预定距离进行移动
	bp.Position = bp.Position + PART_SPEED * deltaTime
	
	-- 数学逻辑如下:
	-- 速度 = 位移 / 时间
	-- 位移 = 速度 * 时间
end

RunService.Stepped:Connect(onStep)

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.BindToRend.documentation: Game service responsible for all run-time activity and progression of time
name 参数为绑定所需的标签，如果不再需要绑定，可以与 RunService.Unbind 一起使用。

绑定的 priority 是一个整型，它决定了在渲染步骤中何时调用自定义函数。这个数字越低，自定义函数被调用的时间就越早。如果两个绑定的优先级相同， Roblox 引擎会随机选择一个先运行。默认的 Roblox 控制脚本是按照下面的优先级来运行的： - Player Input（玩家输入）：100 - Camera Controls（镜头控制）：200 为了方便起见，可以使用 '''RenderPriority''' 枚举来确定设置绑定的整型值。例如，要在默认镜头更新之前进行绑定，只需比镜头优先级减 1 即可。
给出一个函数的字符串名称和优先级，该方法将函数绑定到 RunService.RenderStepped

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.IsClient/p.documentation: Game service responsible for all run-time activity and progression of time

@roblox/globaltype/RunService.IsClient.documentation: 返回当前的环境是否运行在客户端上
@roblox/globaltype/RunService.IsClient.code_sample:
local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

if RunService:IsStudio() then
	print("I am in Roblox Studio")
else
	print("I am in an online Roblox Server")
end

if RunService:IsRunMode() then
	print("Running in Studio")
end

if RunService:IsClient() then
	print("I am a client")
else
	print("I am not a client")
end

if RunService:IsServer() then
	print("I am a server")
else
	print("I am not a server")
end

if RunService:IsRunning() then
	print("The game is running")
else
	print("The game is stopped or paused")
end

local RunService = game:GetService("RunService")

local guiObject = script.Parent

local degreesPerSecond = 180

local function onRenderStep(deltaTime)
	local deltaRotation = deltaTime * degreesPerSecond
	guiObject.Rotation = guiObject.Rotation + deltaRotation 
end
RunService.RenderStepped:Connect(onRenderStep)

@roblox/globaltype/Seat.documentation: 这是一种角色可“坐”于其中的 BasePart。当角色触摸启用的 Seat 对象时，它将由 Weld 连接到该部件，并且默认角色脚本将播放就坐动画。
@roblox/globaltype/Seat.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
    
    local seat = Instance.new("Seat")
    seat.Anchored = true 
    seat.Position = Vector3.new(0, 1, 0)
    seat.Parent = workspace 
    
    local currentPlayer = nil
    
    seat:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Occupant"):Connect(function()
    	local humanoid = seat.Occupant 
    	if humanoid then 
    		local character = humanoid.Parent
    		local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(character)
    		if player then 
    			print(player.Name.."坐下了")
    			currentPlayer = player
    			return
    		end	
    	end
    	if currentPlayer then 
    		print(currentPlayer.Name.."起立了")
    		currentPlayer = nil
    	end
    end)

@roblox/globaltype/Shirt.documentation: Displays a Shirt texture from the Roblox website to display on a Humanoid rig
@roblox/globaltype/Shirt.code_sample:
local function replaceClothes(player)
    	local character = player.Character
    	if character then 
    		-- 寻找衬衫和裤子
    		local shirt = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt")
    		local pants = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants")
    		-- 如果衬衫和裤子不存在就进行创建
    		if not shirt then 
    			shirt = Instance.new("Shirt", character)
    		end 
    		if not pants then 
    			pants = Instance.new("Pants", character)
     		end
    		-- 重设衬衫和裤子的内容 id
    		shirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83326831"
    		pants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=10045638"
    	end
    end

@roblox/globaltype/Shirt.ShirtTemplate.documentation: 决定 Shirt 的纹理。内容 ID 链接指向存储在 Roblox 网页上的衬衫模板。
@roblox/globaltype/Shirt.ShirtTemplate.code_sample:
local function replaceClothes(player)
    	local character = player.Character
    	if character then 
    		-- 寻找衬衫和裤子
    		local shirt = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Shirt")
    		local pants = character:FindFirstChildOfClass("Pants")
    		-- 如果衬衫和裤子不存在就进行创建
    		if not shirt then 
    			shirt = Instance.new("Shirt", character)
    		end 
    		if not pants then 
    			pants = Instance.new("Pants", character)
     		end
    		-- 重设衬衫和裤子的内容 id
    		shirt.ShirtTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=83326831"
    		pants.PantsTemplate = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=10045638"
    	end
    end

SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 设为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，SlidingBallConstraint 为达到所需 SlidingBallConstraint.Velocity 所能应用加速的最大值。
SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 设为 Enum.ActuatorType时，SlidingBallConstraint 为达到所需 SlidingBallConstraint.Velocity 所能应用力的最大值。
当 SlidingBallConstraint.LimitsEnabled 设为 true 时，SlidingBallConstraint 所连接的 Attachment 在到达 SlidingBallConstraint.UpperLimit 与 SlidingBallConstraint.LowerLimit 所指定范围限度时的弹性程度。限制在 0 和 1 之间。
SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 设为 Enum.ActuatorType时，SlidingBallConstraint 为达到所需 SlidingBallConstraint.Speed 所能应用力的最大值。
SlidingBallConstraint 的 SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 被设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它在朝其目标 SlidingBallConstraint.TargetPosition 平移时会尝试保持何种速度。单位为 studs/second（格/秒）。
当 SlidingBallConstraint 的 SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 设为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，其所将会尝试平移至的目标位置。单位为格。
当 SlidingBallConstraint.LimitsEnabled 设为 true 时，SlidingBallConstraint 的 Constraint.Attachment0 沿 x 轴的最高上限。
SlidingBallConstraint 的 SlidingBallConstraint.ActuatorType 被设置为 Enum.ActuatorType 时，它所尝试达到的速度。单位为 studs/second（格/秒）。

@roblox/globaltype/Smoke.documentation: A particle emitter with the visual aesthetic of smoke
@roblox/globaltype/Smoke.code_sample:
local function recurseForFire(object)
	-- 检查是否找到一个没有 Smoke 的 Fire 对象
	if object:IsA("Fire") and not object.Parent:FindFirstChildOfClass("Smoke") then
		-- 为这个火焰创造烟雾效果
		local smoke = Instance.new("Smoke")
		smoke.Color = Color3.new(0, 0, 0)
		smoke.Opacity = 0.15
		smoke.RiseVelocity = 4
		smoke.Size = object.Size / 4
		smoke.Parent = object.Parent
	end
	-- 继续搜索 Fire 对象
	for _, child in pairs(object:GetChildren()) do
		recurseForFire(child)
	end
end
recurseForFire(workspace)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.code_sample:
-- 创建一个部件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
part.Name = "MusicBox"
part.Parent = game.Workspace

-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", part)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.EmitterSize = 5 -- decrease the emitter size (for earlier volume drop off)
sound.Looped = true

-- 创建一个点击检测器
local clickDetector = Instance.new("ClickDetector", part)
clickDetector.MouseClick:Connect(function()
	-- 切换声音正在播放 / 未播放
	if not sound.IsPlaying then
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")	
		sound:Play()
	else
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")	
		sound:Stop()
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsLoaded.documentation: 当 Sound 已从 Roblox 服务器加载并准备播放时，此属性将为 true。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsLoaded.code_sample:
local function loadSound(sound)
	-- 声音是否已加载？
	if not sound.IsLoaded then 
		-- 如果未加载，则等待其加载完成
		sound.Loaded:Wait()
	end
end
loadSound(Workspace.Sound)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPaused.documentation: 此只读属性将在 Sound 未播放时返回 true。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPaused.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.Looped = true

if not sound.isLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Pause()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

wait(2)
sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Stop()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPlaying.documentation: This read-only property will return true when the Sound is playing.
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.IsPlaying.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.Looped = true

if not sound.isLoaded then
	sound.Loaded:wait()
end

sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Pause()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

wait(2)
sound:Play()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- true, false

wait(2)
sound:Stop()
print(sound.IsPlaying, sound.IsPaused) -- false, true

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Looped.documentation: 设置 Sound 在播放完毕时是否重复播放。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Looped.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)

	-- 监听新角色
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(function(character)
		-- 等待头部被添加
		local head = character:WaitForChild("Head")

		-- 创建一个声音
		local sound = Instance.new("Sound", head)
		sound.Name = "TestSound"
		sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/uuhhh.mp3" -- oof
	
		-- 循环声音
		sound.Looped = true
		
		-- 监听循环
		sound.DidLoop:Connect(function(soundId, numOfTimesLooped)
			print("oof! "..tostring(numOfTimesLooped))
		end)

		-- 播放声音
		sound:Play()
	end)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlayOnRemove.documentation: 当为 true 时，通过将 Sound 或其父项之一设为 nil 的子项，使 Sound 在从游戏中移除时播放。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlayOnRemove.code_sample:
-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.Name = "TestSound"
sound.SoundId = "rbxasset://sounds/uuhhh.mp3" -- oof

-- 将 PlayOnRemove 设为 true
sound.PlayOnRemove = true

wait(3)
-- 销毁声音
sound:Destroy()

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackLoudnes.documentation: 一个介于 0 和 1000 之间的数字，表示 Sound 目前的播放音量。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackSpeed.documentation: 决定一个 Sound 的播放速度，值越高播放的音调和速度就越快。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.PlaybackSpeed.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true

sound:Play()
wait(10)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 3 -- 三倍速度
wait(5)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 0.5 -- 二分之一速度
wait(5)
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 1 -- 默认

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Playing.documentation: 指示 Sound 是否正在播放。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Playing.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true

print("playing sound")
sound.Playing = true

wait(10)

print("stopping sound")
sound.Playing = false

wait(5)

sound.Playing = true
local timePosition = sound.TimePosition
print("resumed at time position: "..tostring(timePosition)) -- c. 10 秒

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMaxDista.documentation: 客户端的侦听器与 Sound 的来源之间仍能听到声音的最大距离。只适用于设为 Part 或 Attachment 的子项（3D 声音）

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMinDista.documentation: 一个 3D Sound（一个 BasePart 或 Attachment 的直接子项）将开始衰减（音量减小）的最小距离，以格为单位。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.RollOffMode.documentation: 当侦听器和声音的父项之间的距离变化时，控制 3D Sound（为 BasePart 或 Attachment 的子项）的音量如何变化。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundGroup.documentation: 连接至此 Sound 的 SoundGroup。应用到此声音组的 Volume（音量）和 SoundEffects 将传递至其声音。一个声音无法同时属于多个组。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundGroup.code_sample:
local SoundService = game:GetService("SoundService")

-- 创建新的声音组
local soundGroup = Instance.new("SoundGroup", SoundService)

-- 创建声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2
sound.SoundGroup = soundGroup

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(10)

-- 改变音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.1 

wait(3)

-- 返回音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.5
 
wait(4)

-- 添加音效
Instance.new("ReverbSoundEffect", soundGroup)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundId.documentation: 此属性是一个 Sound 对象关联的声音文件的内容 ID。在声音上传至 Roblox 后，其内容 ID 可以在声音的 URL 中找到。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.SoundId.code_sample:
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound:Play()

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimeLength.documentation: 以秒为单位的 Sound 长度。如果 Sound 未加载，此值将为 0。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimeLength.code_sample:
local function playForDuration(sound, duration)
	if not sound.IsLoaded then
		sound.Loaded:wait()
	end
	local speed = sound.TimeLength / duration
	sound.PlaybackSpeed = speed 
	sound:Play()
end

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimePosition.documentation: 以秒为单位显示 Sound 的播放进度。播放前和播放中都可变更来移动 Sound 的播放进度。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.TimePosition.code_sample:
-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"

-- 设置声音从 30 秒处开始
sound.TimePosition = 30

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(5)

-- 跳到 100 秒处
sound.TimePosition = 100

wait(5)

-- 跳回开头
sound.TimePosition = 0

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Volume.documentation: Sound 的音量。可设为 0 至 10 之间的值。默认为 0.5。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Volume.code_sample:
-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2

-- 加大音量
sound.Volume = 2

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(7)

-- 减小音量
sound.Volume = 0.2

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.EmitterSize.documentation: 一个 3D Sound（一个 BasePart 或 Attachment 的直接子项）将开始衰减（音量减小）的最小距离。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.EmitterSize.code_sample:
-- 创建一个部件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0, 3, 0)
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")
part.Name = "MusicBox"
part.Parent = game.Workspace

-- 创建一个声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", part)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312" 
sound.EmitterSize = 5 -- decrease the emitter size (for earlier volume drop off)
sound.Looped = true

-- 创建一个点击检测器
local clickDetector = Instance.new("ClickDetector", part)
clickDetector.MouseClick:Connect(function()
	-- 切换声音正在播放 / 未播放
	if not sound.IsPlaying then
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright green")	
		sound:Play()
	else
		part.BrickColor = BrickColor.new("Bright red")	
		sound:Stop()
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.MaxDistance.documentation: 客户端的侦听器与 Sound 的来源之间仍能听到声音的最大距离。只适用于设为 Part 或 Attachment 的子项（3D 声音）

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.MinDistance.documentation: 一个 3D Sound（一个 BasePart 或 Attachment 的直接子项）将开始衰减的最小距离。实际上相当于发射器的尺寸。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pitch.documentation: 已弃用。设置 Sound 在播放时的音调和速度。整数越大，Sound 的音调就越高，速度也越快。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pause/param/0.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Pause.documentation: Sets Sound.Playing to false. This pauses the playback of the Sound if the sound is playing. As Sound.TimePosition is not reset ,when the Sound is resumed it will continue from its previous position.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Play/param/0.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Play.documentation: Plays the Sound. Sets Sound.TimePosition to the last value set by a Script (or 0 if it has not been set), and then sets Sound.Playing to true.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Resume/param/0.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Resume.documentation: 继续播放 Sound。将 Sound.Playing 设为 true。不会变更 Sound.TimePosition，因此无法继续播放被 Sound:Pause 暂停的声音。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Stop/param/0.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Stop.documentation: 停止 Sound （声音）。将 Sound.Playing 设置为 false，然后将 Sound.TimePosition 设置为 0。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.pause/param/0.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.play/param/0.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.stop/param/0.documentation: A Sound is an object that emits sound. Sounds can be placed within a BasePart or Attachment to emit a sound from a particular position within a place or world, or it can be attached elsewhere to play the sound at a constant volume throughout the entire place.

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.DidLoop.documentation: 当 Sound 循环时触发。返回 soundId 和 numOfTimesLooped，分别表示声音的 contentID 和已循环的次数。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.DidLoop.code_sample:
local function loopNTimes(sound, numberOfLoops)
	if not sound.IsPlaying then
		sound.Looped = true
		local connection = nil
		connection = sound.DidLoop:Connect(function(soundId, numOfTimesLooped)
			print(numOfTimesLooped)
			if numOfTimesLooped >= numberOfLoops then
				-- 断开连接
				connection:Disconnect()
				-- 停止声音
				sound:Stop()
			end
		end)
		sound:Play()
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Ended.documentation: 当 Sound 已播放完毕并停止时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Loaded.documentation: 当 Sound 加载完毕时触发。
@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Loaded.code_sample:
local function loadSound(sound)
	-- 声音是否已加载？
	if not sound.IsLoaded then 
		-- 如果未加载，则等待其加载完成
		sound.Loaded:Wait()
	end
end
loadSound(Workspace.Sound)

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Paused.documentation: 用 Sound:Pause 暂停播放 Sound 时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Played.documentation: 用 Sound:Play 函数播放 Sound 时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Resumed.documentation: 用 Sound:Resume 继续播放 Sound 时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/Sound.Stopped.documentation: 当 Sound 被 Sound:Stop 函数停止时触发。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundEffect.documentation: SoundEffect 是派生所有其他音效的基础类。SoundEffect 可通过设为子项来应用至 Sound 或 SoundGroup。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundEffect.Enabled.documentation: 切换效果的开启与关闭。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundEffect.Priority.documentation: 决定效果相对于其他效果的应用顺序。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundGroup.documentation: A SoundGroup is used to manage the volume and sound effects on multiple Sounds at once. Sounds in the SoundGroup will have their volume and effects adjusted by the SoundGroup.
@roblox/globaltype/SoundGroup.code_sample:
local SoundService = game:GetService("SoundService")

-- 创建新的声音组
local soundGroup = Instance.new("SoundGroup", SoundService)

-- 创建声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2
sound.SoundGroup = soundGroup

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(10)

-- 改变音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.1 

wait(3)

-- 返回音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.5
 
wait(4)

-- 添加音效
Instance.new("ReverbSoundEffect", soundGroup)

@roblox/globaltype/SoundGroup.Volume.documentation: SoundGroup（声音组）中 Sound 音量的倍数因子值，范围为从 0 到 10。
@roblox/globaltype/SoundGroup.Volume.code_sample:
local SoundService = game:GetService("SoundService")

-- 创建新的声音组
local soundGroup = Instance.new("SoundGroup", SoundService)

-- 创建声音
local sound = Instance.new("Sound", game.Workspace)
sound.SoundId = "rbxassetid://301964312"
sound.Looped = true
sound.PlaybackSpeed = 2
sound.SoundGroup = soundGroup

-- 播放声音
sound:Play()

wait(10)

-- 改变音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.1 

wait(3)

-- 返回音量
soundGroup.Volume = 0.5
 
wait(4)

-- 添加音效
Instance.new("ReverbSoundEffect", soundGroup)

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.documentation: A service that determines various aspects of how Sounds play in the game.

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.AmbientR.documentation: SoundService 所使用的环境音效预设。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.Distance.documentation: 当进行 3D Sound 音量衰减计算时被 SoundService 设为 1 米距离的格数。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.DopplerS.documentation: 该属性决定了 3D Sound 的声调因多普勒效应而发生改变的程度。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.RespectF.documentation: 设置客户端的 Sound 播放是否复制至服务器。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.RolloffS.documentation: 设置 3D Sound 的音量衰减速度，也可以称为其 “roll off”（滚落）速度。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.GetListe.documentation: A service that determines various aspects of how Sounds play in the game.
当前 Enum.ListenerType 及侦听器的设置对象。根据 Enum.ListenerType 的不同，侦听器可能是 BasePart、DataType.CFrame 或 nil。
GetListener 将会返回 SoundService 当前的侦听器类型及被设为侦听器的对象。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.PlayLoca.documentation: A service that determines various aspects of how Sounds play in the game.
在本地播放一个 Sound，也就是说声音只会被调用此函数的客户端听到，无论其子项为何。

@roblox/globaltype/SoundService.SetListe.documentation: A service that determines various aspects of how Sounds play in the game.
取决于 Enum.ListenerType。'ObjectPosition' 或 'ObjectCFrame' 时为 BasePart，'CFrame' 时为 DataType.CFrame，'Camera' 时为 nil。

@roblox/globaltype/Sparkles.documentation: A particle emitter with the visual aesthetic of sparkles
@roblox/globaltype/Sparkles.code_sample:
local Players = game.Players

local function onCharacterSpawned(character)
	local hrp = character:WaitForChild("HumanoidRootPart")
	-- 添加与玩家躯干颜色相同的闪光
	local sparkles = Instance.new("Sparkles")
	sparkles.Parent = hrp
	sparkles.SparkleColor = character:WaitForChild("Body Colors").TorsoColor.Color
	sparkles.Enabled = true
end

local function onPlayerAdded(player)
	player.CharacterAdded:Connect(onCharacterSpawned)
end

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(onPlayerAdded)

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnerService.documentation: 负责行为或 SpawnLocation 的内部服务。其功能无法由开发者使用。

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.documentation: SpawnLocation, or "spawns" determine where a Player respawns when they die. They can be configured to allow only certain players to use each spawn, using Team. They also control how ForceField are set up for newly-spawned players.

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.AllowTe.documentation: 允许 Player（玩家）通过触摸 SpawnLocation 加入小队。当设置为 true 时，如果Player 角色接触到 SpawnLocation，则玩家的 Player.TeamColor 会被设置为 SpawnLocation.TeamColor。

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Duratio.documentation: ForceField 应用于在此 SpawnLocation 生成的 Player 角色的时间长度，以秒为单位。如果 Duration 为零，则不会创建 ForceField，也不会触发 Instance.DescendantAdded 或 Instance.ChildAdded 事件。
@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Duratio.code_sample:
local spawnLocation = Instance.new("SpawnLocation", game.Workspace)
spawnLocation.Anchored = true
spawnLocation.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
spawnLocation.Neutral = true -- 无论阵营的玩家都可以在此重生
spawnLocation.Duration = 20 -- ForceField 时长为20秒

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Enabled.documentation: 设置 SpawnLocation 是否被启用。禁用时，玩家不能在此 SpawnLocation 重生，AllowTeamChangeOnTouch 功能也会被禁用。
@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Enabled.code_sample:
local spawnLocation = Instance.new("SpawnLocation", game.Workspace)
spawnLocation.Anchored = true
spawnLocation.Size = Vector3.new(5, 1, 5)
spawnLocation.Neutral = true -- 任何人都可以在此重生
spawnLocation.Enabled = true

spawnLocation:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Enabled"):Connect(function()
	spawnLocation.Transparency = spawnLocation.Enabled and 0 or 0.5
end)

wait(5)
spawnLocation.Enabled = false -- 透明度 = 0.5

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.Neutral.documentation: SpawnLocation 是否隶属于特定队伍。这意味着如果该属性设置为 true，则任意 Team（队伍）中的任意 Player（玩家）都可以在其上重生。

@roblox/globaltype/SpawnLocation.TeamCol.documentation: 设置 SpawnLocation 属于哪支队伍. 如果 SpawnLocation.Neutral 属性为 false，只有 Player.TeamColor 与重生点的 TeamColor 相同的 Player 才能在那里重生。

@roblox/globaltype/SpecialMesh.documentation: The SpecialMesh is an object that allows developers to provide a standard template or user uploaded mesh to a BasePart.

@roblox/globaltype/SpecialMesh.MeshType.documentation: 确定将应用于作为 SpecialMesh 子对象的 BasePart 网格类型。

@roblox/globaltype/SphereHandleAdornment.documentation: The SphereHandleAdornment is a sphere that can be adorned to a BasePart.

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.documentation: 一个发射指定颜色和亮度的照明的光源，该照明从一个指定的面以圆锥形发射。

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.Angle.documentation: 光从 SpotLight 照射的角度。

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.Face.documentation: 设置 SpotLight 来自父项的哪一侧。

@roblox/globaltype/SpotLight.Range.documentation: SpotLight 可以照亮的区域大小。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Coil.documentation: 在 SpringConstraint 上可视的线圈数。该值只能设置为 0 到 8 之间。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Damp.documentation: SpringConstraint 的阻尼常数。乘以约束 Attachment（附件）的速度来减少施加的弹簧力。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Limi.documentation: 设置 SpringConstraint 是否限制最小和最大长度。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MaxF.documentation: SpringConstraint 可对其 Attachment（附件）施加的最大的力。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MaxL.documentation: 如果 SpringConstraint.LimitsEnabled 为 true，SpringConstraint 可以允许的最大分离距离。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.MinL.documentation: 如果 SpringConstraint.LimitsEnabled 为 true，SpringConstraint 可以允许的最小分离距离。

@roblox/globaltype/SpringConstraint.Stif.documentation: 弹簧的强度。该值越大，当附件的分离距离与 SpringConstraint.FreeLength 不同时，施加的力越大。

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGear.documentation: 如果游戏中允许装备，则 StarterGear 中将会包含适合玩家的所有初始装备。当 Player 的角色生成时，该玩家 StarterGear 中的所有内容将被复制至玩家的 Backpack 中。

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.documentation: A container for LayerCollector to be copied into the PlayerGui of Player. Also provides a range of functions for interacting with the CoreGui

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.ProcessUse.documentation: Allows the StarterGui service to process input like PlayerGui and CoreGui do

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.ScreenOrie.documentation: Sets the default Enum.ScreenOrientation for users with mobile devices

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.ShowDevelo.documentation: 决定 StarterGui 的内容是否在 studio 中可见

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.ResetPlaye.documentation: 决定 StarterGui 的每个子项是否会在玩家角色重生时被克隆至该玩家的 PlayerGui 内。

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.GetCoreGui.documentation: A container for LayerCollector to be copied into the PlayerGui of Player. Also provides a range of functions for interacting with the CoreGui
Returns whether the given Enum.CoreGuiTypeis enabled or if it has been disabled using StarterGui:SetCoreGuiEnabled

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.SetCore/pa.documentation: A container for LayerCollector to be copied into the PlayerGui of Player. Also provides a range of functions for interacting with the CoreGui
Selects the functionality with which the call will interact: a CoreScript must have registered such a string already (if one hasn't, an error is raised)

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.SetCore.documentation: Allows you to perform certain interactions with Roblox's CoreScript
@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.SetCore.code_sample:
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")

StarterGui:SetCore("AvatarContextMenuTheme", { 
	BackgroundImage = "", 
	BackgroundTransparency = 0.5, 
	BackgroundColor = Color3.fromRGB(111, 145, 242),
	NameTagColor = Color3.fromRGB(0, 0, 200),
	NameUnderlineColor = Color3.fromRGB(213, 233, 255),
	ButtonFrameColor = Color3.fromRGB(15, 24, 65), 
	ButtonFrameTransparency = 0.2, 
	ButtonUnderlineColor = Color3.fromRGB(213, 233, 255), 
	Font = Enum.Font.SciFi
})

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.SetCoreGui.documentation: A container for LayerCollector to be copied into the PlayerGui of Player. Also provides a range of functions for interacting with the CoreGui
Whether to enable or disable the given Enum.CoreGuiType
Sets whether the CoreGui element associated with the given Enum.CoreGuiType is enabled or disabled

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.GetCore/pa.documentation: A container for LayerCollector to be copied into the PlayerGui of Player. Also provides a range of functions for interacting with the CoreGui

@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.GetCore.documentation: Returns a variable that has been specified by a Roblox CoreScript
@roblox/globaltype/StarterGui.GetCore.code_sample:
local StarterGui = game:GetService("StarterGui")

if StarterGui:GetCore("ChatActive") then
	print("Chat is active")
else
	print("Chat is not active")
end

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPack.documentation: 服务层容器，当玩家生成时其内容将会被复制至每个 Player 的 Backpack。通常用于存放 Tools，但有时也会用于存放 LocalScript，以保证每个玩家都获取一份副本。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPack.code_sample:
local StarterPack = game:GetService("StarterPack")

local function emptyStarterPack()
	for _, child in pairs(StarterPack:GetChildren()) do
		if child:IsA("Tool") then
			child:Destroy()
		end
	end
end

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.documentation: A service which allows the defaults of properties in the Player object to be set.
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local playername = "polarpanda16"
local player = Players:WaitForChild(playername)

local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Parent = game.Workspace
part.Name = "ReplicationFocusPart"
part.Anchored = true

player.ReplicationFocus = part

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AllowCu.documentation: 描述当前游戏关于从网站获取的自定义虚拟角色动画的权限级别。

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AutoJum.documentation: 设置使用移动设备的玩家角色是否会在碰到障碍物时自动跳跃。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.AutoJum.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local button = script.Parent

local function update()
	-- 更新按键文本
	if player.AutoJumpEnabled then
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is ON"
	else
		button.Text = "Auto-Jump is OFF"
	end
	-- 映射属性至玩家的角色（如果有的话）
	if player.Character then
		local human = player.Character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
		if human then
			human.AutoJumpEnabled = player.AutoJumpEnabled
		end
	end
end

local function onActivated()
	-- 切换自动跳跃
	player.AutoJumpEnabled = not player.AutoJumpEnabled
	-- 更新其余内容
	update()
end
button.Activated:Connect(onActivated)
update()

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.CameraM.documentation: 玩家默认镜头的最大拉远距离（以格为单位）。
玩家镜头的默认最大拉近距离（以格为单位）。
将默认镜头模式改变至第一人称或第三人称视角。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.CameraM.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local part = script.Parent
local function onTouched(part)
	local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(part.Parent)
	if not player then return end
	print(player.Name .. " pressed me!")
end
part.Touched:Connect(onTouched)

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.Charact.documentation: 决定 Player.Character 的 Humanoid.JumpHeight 的初始值
Determines the starting value of Humanoid.JumpPower for Player.Character

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevCame.documentation: 设置默认镜头如何处理镜头与玩家之间的对象。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevCame.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

-- 将玩家的镜头遮蔽模式设为 Invisicam
player.DevCameraOcclusionMode = Enum.DevCameraOcclusionMode.Invisicam

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevComp.documentation: 当玩家使用电脑进行游戏时，允许开发者为每个玩家覆盖默认镜头模式。

-- 将电脑玩家的镜头移动模式设为经典模式

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevComp.documentation: 允许开发者覆盖电脑端玩家的移动模式。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevComp.code_sample:

-- 将电脑玩家的移动模式设为键鼠模式
player.DevComputerMovementMode = Enum.DevComputerMovementMode.KeyboardMouse

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevTouc.documentation: 当玩家使用移动设备进行游戏时，允许开发者为每个玩家覆盖默认镜头移动模式。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevTouc.code_sample:

-- 将移动设备玩家的镜头移动模式设为经典模式
player.DevTouchCameraMovementMode = Enum.DevTouchCameraMovementMode.Classic

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevTouc.documentation: 允许开发者覆盖触控设备玩家的移动模式。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.DevTouc.code_sample:

-- 将移动设备玩家的移动模式设为虚拟摇杆
player.DevTouchMovementMode = Enum.DevTouchMovementMode.Thumbstick

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.EnableM.documentation: 决定默认设置玩家是否可以切换鼠标锁定。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.EnableM.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

while true do
	player.DevEnableMouseLock = not player.DevEnableMouseLock
	wait(5)
end

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.HealthD.documentation: 设置玩家可以在多远的距离看到其他 Humanoid 的生命条。若距离被设置为 0，则不会显示生命条。

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.LoadCha.documentation: 是否应当加载玩家的角色外观。
@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.LoadCha.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer

player. CanLoadCharacterAppearance = false

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.NameDis.documentation: 设置此名玩家可以在多远的距离看到其他 Humanoid 的名字，如果设置为 0 ，则名字会被隐藏。

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayer.UserEmo.documentation: 决定在加载虚拟角色时是否加载用户已拥有的表情

@roblox/globaltype/StarterPlayerScripts.documentation: 容器对象，用来放置当玩家加入游戏时复制至 Player 的 PlayerScripts 的对象

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.ContactsCount.documentation: 有多少个部件目前互相接触的计数。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.DataReceiveKbps.documentation: 在联网游戏中，它用于粗略地描述当前实例在每秒钟内所收到的字节数据量。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.DataSendKbps.documentation: 在联网游戏中，它用于粗略地描述当前实例在每秒钟内所发送的字节数据量。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.HeartbeatTimeMs.documentation: 用来衡量 Roblox 更新自己所有 Task Scheduler 任务所耗费的总时间，单位是毫秒。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.InstanceCount.documentation: 当前内存中有多少个 Instance 的计数。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.MovingPrimitive.documentation: 游戏世界中目前存在多少移动中的物理模拟组件计数。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.PhysicsReceiveK.documentation: 在联网游戏中，它用来粗略地描述当前实例在每秒钟内所收到的物理数据字节数。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.PhysicsSendKbps.documentation: 在联网游戏中用来粗略描述当前实例在每秒钟内所发送的物理数据字节数。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.PhysicsStepTime.documentation:
用来测量物理引擎更新自己当前状态所需要的时间，单位为毫秒。
如果这个值过大，就意味着游戏实例因为正在进行的物理模拟而承受了过大的压力。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.PrimitivesCount.documentation: 游戏世界中目前存在多少物理模拟组件的计数。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.GetMemoryUsageM.documentation: 返回指定 DeveloperMemoryTag 类别占用的兆字节数。

@roblox/globaltype/Stats.GetTotalMemoryU.documentation: 返回当前游戏进程占用的总内存，以兆字节为单位。

@roblox/globaltype/StatsItem.GetValueStr.documentation: 以格式化字符串返回 StatsItem 的值。

@roblox/globaltype/Status.documentation: 一个未完成的对象，没有可供开发人员使用的功能。

@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.documentation: A container object for a single string.
@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.code_sample:
-- 创建一个 Part 来展示 Changed 事件
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Transparency” 来触发 Changed 事件
part.Transparency = .5
-- 用 “Number” 来触发 Changed 事件
part.Name = "SomePart"
-- 更改 BrickColor 也会同时更改其他属性
-- 因此此行用“BrickColor”、“Color3” 和 “Color3uint16”
-- 来触发 Changed 事件。
part.BrickColor = BrickColor.Red()

-- 一个存有双精度浮点数值的 NumberValue 
local vNumber = Instance.new("NumberValue")
vNumber.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 123.456 来触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vNumber.Value = 123456
-- 并不会触发 Changed 事件
vNumber.Name = "SomeNumber"

-- 存储着字符串的 StringValue
local vString = Instance.new("StringValue")
vString.Changed:Connect(print)
-- 用 “Hello” 触发 Changed 事件（非 “Value”）
vString.Value = "Hello"

@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.Value.documentation: 存储的字符串。

@roblox/globaltype/StringValue.Changed.code_sample:
local value = Instance.new("StringValue")
value.Parent = game.Workspace

value.Changed:Connect(function(NewValue)
    print(NewValue)
end)

value.Value = "Hello world!"

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Always Save Sc.documentation: 如果设置为 true，Roblox Studio 会将在单人游戏会话期间所做的脚本更改传输到打开的场景。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Animate Hover.documentation: 如果设置为 true，则将鼠标悬停在 Workspace 中可选择的对象上时，显示的悬停选择框会根据 Studio/Hover Animate Speed 在 Studio/Hover Color 和 Studio/Select Color 之间闪烁。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Background Col.documentation: 指定 Roblox Studio 脚本编辑器的背景颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Basic Objects.documentation: 设置 Roblox Studio 中 Advanced Objects（高级对象）选项卡的滚动模式。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Built-in Funct.documentation: 设置脚本编辑器中内置函数和关键词的颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Camera Mouse W.documentation: 设置使用鼠标滚轮时镜头将向前或向后移动的格数。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Camera Shift S.documentation: 设置镜头在按住 Shift 键用方向键移动时的速度（以格/秒为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Camera Speed.documentation: 设置镜头用方向键移动时的速度（以格/秒为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Clear Output O.documentation: 如果设置为 true，则在切换游戏会话时将自动清除输出。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Comment Color.documentation: 指定 Roblox Studio 脚本编辑器的备注颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.DefaultScriptF.documentation: 指定当用户在 Roblox Studio 中激活 Execute Script（执行脚本）按钮时打开的默认提示目录。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.DeprecatedObje.documentation: 如果设置为 true，则已弃用的对象会显示在 Advanced Objects（高级对象）窗口和 Object Browser（对象浏览器）中。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Drag Multiple.documentation:
如果设置为 true，则拖动时选择的边界框将用于碰撞检测，而不是检测每个单独的部件。
这会使拖动器执行得更流畅，但精确度明显降低。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Enable Autocom.documentation: 当设置为 true 时，脚本编辑器和命令栏将在写入时显示自动完成菜单。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Error Color.documentation: 指定脚本编辑器中发现错误代码时的波浪下划线的颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Find Selection.documentation: 设置脚本编辑器的查找选中操作（Ctrl+F）中匹配结果的高亮颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Font.documentation: 指定在脚本编辑器中使用的字体。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Hover Animate.documentation: 指定当鼠标光标悬停于 Workspace 中某个被选中的对象时悬停动画的闪烁频率。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Hover Over Col.documentation: 指定悬停选择框使用的颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Keyword Color.documentation: 设置内置 Lua 关键词的文本颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Line Thickness.documentation: 设置 Model.PrimaryPart selection adornee 的厚度。 值的限制区间在 0 到 0.05 之间

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.LuaDebuggerEna.documentation: 明确 Lua 调试器的功能是否已被启用。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Matching Word.documentation: 设置在脚本编辑器中双击的变量的高亮颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Maximum Output.documentation: 输出中可以显示的最大行数。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Number Color.documentation: 指定 Roblox Studio 脚本编辑器中的数字颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Only Play Audi.documentation: 若设置为 true，那就只有在游戏窗口处于焦点时才能听到播放的音频。
@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Only Play Audi.learn_more_link: https://developer.roblox.com/api-reference/property/Studio/Only Play Audio from Window in Focus

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Operator Color.documentation: 设置脚本编辑器中运算符的颜色。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.OverrideCoreSc.documentation: 如果设置为 true，那么将会为 Roblox Studio 中的 CoreScripts 使用 Studio.OverrideCoreScriptsDir ，而不是默认的 rbxasset://scripts 目录。
覆盖核心脚本时所使用的目录。 这应该指向Roblox 中 CoreScript GitHub 仓库的一个克隆。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.PermissionLeve.documentation: 将 API 设置为必须拥有最高的权限级别以便让其在对象浏览器中显示。 更多信息请查阅 Enum.PermissionLevelShown 。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.PluginsDir.documentation: 保存本地插件的目录位置。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Render Throttl.documentation:
设置当游戏窗口未获得焦点时的渲染节流比例。
实际上此属性并未完全被理解，很可能仅限内部使用。

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Respect Studio.documentation: 当被设置为 true 时，Roblox Studio 快捷方式会最优先处理在游戏窗口中捕获到的输入。
@roblox/globaltype/Studio.Respect Studio.learn_more_link: https://developer.roblox.com/api-reference/property/Studio/Respect Studio shortcuts when game has focus

@roblox/globaltype/Studio.ScriptTimeoutL.documentation: 脚本在超时前可以等待继续运行的时间（以秒为单位）。

A list of file types that the user is allowed to select. File types are formatted without a period. For example, {"jpg", "png"} would allow only a JPG or PNG file to be selected. If no filter is provided, the filter is nil and allows the user to select any file type
The imported File. Returns nil if no files were selected, or if the selected file was too large (FileSize greater than 100 megabytes)
Prompts the current Studio user to select one file to add as a File
允许对 Roblox Studio 配置的访问并让用户可以从其文件系统中导入文件

A list of file types that the user is allowed to select. File types are formatted without a period. For example, {"jpg", "png"} would allow only JPG and PNG files to be selected. If no filter is provided, the filter is nil and allows the user to select any file type.

@roblox/globaltype/SurfaceGui.ZOffset.documentation: 相对其附加的表面偏移 SurfaceGui。

@roblox/globaltype/SurfaceLight.documentation: A light source that emits illumination of a specified color and brightness from a face for a specified range.
@roblox/globaltype/SurfaceLight.code_sample:
-- 创建一个新的 BasePart
local part = Instance.new("Part")
part.Parent = game.Workspace
part.Anchored = true
part.Position = Vector3.new(0,0,0)

-- 创建一个新的 SurfaceLight
local light = Instance.new("SurfaceLight")
light.Color = Color3.new(255/255, 255/255, 255/255)
light.Brightness = 1
light.Range = 16
light.Parent = part

@roblox/globaltype/TaskScheduler.ThreadP.documentation: 任务计划程序的特定线程池设置。

@roblox/globaltype/Team.documentation: The Team class represents a faction in a Roblox place. The only valid parent for a Team is in the Teams service.

@roblox/globaltype/Team.AutoAssignable.documentation: 此属性用来决定加入游戏的 Player（玩家）是否会被自动放置到 Team（队伍）中。如果有多个队伍的此属性都设为 true，那么在 Player 被添加进来时 Roblox 会尝试对这些队伍进行平衡。

@roblox/globaltype/Team.TeamColor.documentation: 此属性设置 Team 的颜色、决定团队成员的 Player.TeamColor 属性，还决定了玩家列表和玩家头顶上方显示的颜色。
@roblox/globaltype/Team.TeamColor.code_sample:
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local door = Instance.new("Part")
door.Anchored = true 
door.Size = Vector3.new(7, 10, 1)
door.Position = Vector3.new(0, 5, 0)
door.Parent = game.Workspace

local debounce = false 

door.Touched:Connect(function(hit)
	if not debounce then
		debounce = true
		if hit then
			local player = Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(hit.Parent)
			if player and player.TeamColor == BrickColor.new("Bright red") then
				door.Transparency = 0.5
				door.CanCollide = false 
				wait(3)
				door.Transparency = 0
				door.CanCollide = true
			end
		end
		wait(0.5)
		debounce = false
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Team.AutoColorCharact.documentation: 已被弃用且无法发挥功能，过去主要用于确定队伍中的 Player 角色模型颜色是否被设置为 Team.TeamColor。

@roblox/globaltype/Team.Score.documentation: 已弃用。此属性可以用来存储一个与队伍相关联的整数值。此属性没有任何额外的功能、任何游戏服务都不会使用此属性。

@roblox/globaltype/Team.GetPlayers/param.documentation: The Team class represents a faction in a Roblox place. The only valid parent for a Team is in the Teams service.

@roblox/globaltype/Team.GetPlayers/retur.documentation: 一个包含 Team 中所有 Player 的数组。

@roblox/globaltype/Team.GetPlayers.documentation: 返回分配到 Team 的 Player 列表。要分配一个 Player，其 Player.Team 属性需要等于 Team 且 Player.Neutral 应为 false。
@roblox/globaltype/Team.GetPlayers.code_sample:
-- 计算每个队伍中的玩家数目
local teams = game:GetService("Teams"):GetTeams()
for _, team in pairs(teams) do
    local players = team:GetPlayers()
    print("Team " .. team.Name .. " has " .. #players .. " players")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Team.PlayerAdded.documentation: 当一个 Player 分配到 Team 时触发。要分配一个玩家，其 Player.Team 属性需要等于 Team 且 Player.Neutral 应为 false。

@roblox/globaltype/Team.PlayerRemoved.documentation: 当一名 Player 从一个 Team 中被移除时就会启动，移除原因可能是 Player 离开了游戏、Player.Neutral 被设置为 true 或者 Player 加入了另一个队伍。

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.documentation: Service responsible for transporting Player between places and servers

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.GetAr.documentation: Service responsible for transporting Player between places and servers
返回 Players.LocalPlayer 抵达场景后所携带的 customLoadingScreen
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.GetAr.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local ReplicatedFirst = game:GetService("ReplicatedFirst")

local customLoadingScreen = TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui()
if customLoadingScreen then
    local playerGui = Players.LocalPlayer:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")
    ReplicatedFirst:RemoveDefaultLoadingScreen()
    customLoadingScreen.Parent = playerGui
    -- 在这里添加界面动画效果
    wait(5)
    -- 销毁界面
    customLoadingScreen:Destroy()
end

在给定的键中存储的值

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.SetTe.documentation: Service responsible for transporting Player between places and servers
传送过程中所显示的加载 ScreenGui
在传送开始之前设置好在传送过程中会显示给本地用户的自定义 ScreenGui（传送 GUI）
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.SetTe.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local ReplicatedStorage = game:GetService("ReplicatedStorage")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local playerGui = Players.LocalPlayer:WaitForChild("PlayerGui")

local placeId = 0 -- replace here
local loadingGui = ReplicatedStorage:FindFirstChild("LoadingGui") -- 替换此处

-- 为这个场景设置该加载 gui 的父项
loadingGui.Parent = playerGui

-- 为目的地场景设置此加载 gui
TeleportService:SetTeleportGui(loadingGui)

-- 传送用户
TeleportService:Teleport(placeId)

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.SetTe.documentation: Service responsible for transporting Player between places and servers

传递到目的地场景的可选数据。可用 TeleportService:GetLocalPlayerTeleportData 取回
准备放置到目的地场景 CoreGui 中的可选自定义加载界面，可以使用 TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui 来将其取回
将 Player 传送到与给定 placeId 和 instanceId 相关联的服务器实例中
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	-- 这名玩家是否在跟随其他玩家？
	local followId = player.FollowUserId
	-- 如果是，则找出其位置
	if followId and followId ~= 0 then
		local success, errorMessage, placeId, jobId = pcall(function()
			return TeleportService:GetPlayerPlaceInstanceAsync(followId)
		end)
		if success then
			-- 传送玩家
			TeleportService:TeleportToPlaceInstance(placeId, jobId, player)
		end
	else
		warn("Player " .. player.UserId .. " is not following another player!")
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.documentation: Service responsible for transporting Player between places and servers
传送目的地的场景 ID
由 TeleportService:ReserveServer 返回的预留服务器访问码
一个里面存有待传送 Player（玩家）的数组
生成点 SpawnLocation 的名称（可选）
传递到目的地场景的数据（可选），可以用 TeleportService:GetLocalPlayerTeleportData 取回
准备放置到目的地场景 CoreGui 中的自定义加载界面（可选），可以使用 TeleportService:GetArrivingTeleportGui 来将其取回
将多名 Player（玩家）传送到通过 TeleportService:ReserveServer 创建的预留服务器中
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Telep.code_sample:
local TS = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")
local DSS = game:GetService("DataStoreService")
local DS = DSS:GetGlobalDataStore()
 
-- 获得保存码
local code = DS:GetAsync("ReservedServer")
if type(code) ~= "string" then -- 无保存码时，进行创建
	code = TS:ReserveServer(game.PlaceId)
	DS:SetAsync("ReservedServer",code)
end
 
local function Joined(plr)
	-- 每次他们进行聊天时，我们都要检查
	plr.Chatted:Connect(function(msg)
		if msg == "reserved" then -- 这就是我们需要的信号了
			TS:TeleportToPrivateServer(game.PlaceId,code,{plr})
		end
	end)
end
 
-- 连接至所有当前与未来的玩家
Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(Joined)
for k,v in pairs(Players:GetPlayers()) do
	Joined(v)
end

返回拥有给定 Player.UserId（用户 ID）的用户所在服务器的 DataModel.PlaceId 和 DataMode.lJobId，前提是该服务器必须和当前场景处在同一个游戏之中
@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.GetPl.code_sample:
local TeleportService = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

Players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(player)
	-- 这名玩家是否在跟随其他玩家？
	local followId = player.FollowUserId
	-- 如果是，则找出其位置
	if followId and followId ~= 0 then
		local success, errorMessage, placeId, jobId = pcall(function()
			return TeleportService:GetPlayerPlaceInstanceAsync(followId)
		end)
		if success then
			-- 传送玩家
			TeleportService:TeleportToPlaceInstance(placeId, jobId, player)
		end
	else
		warn("Player " .. player.UserId .. " is not following another player!")
	end
end)

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Reser.documentation: Service responsible for transporting Player between places and servers

@roblox/globaltype/TeleportService.Reser.code_sample:
local TS = game:GetService("TeleportService")
local Players = game:GetService("Players")

local code = TS:ReserveServer(game.PlaceId) -- 返回一个码值
local players = Players:GetPlayers() -- 获得一个含有所有玩家的列表

TS:TeleportToPrivateServer(game.PlaceId,code,players) -- 实际传送玩家

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.documentation: A 2D user interface element that displays player-editable text

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.ClearTextOnFo.documentation: 决定单击 TextBox 时是否会清空其 TextBox.Text 属性

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.CursorPositio.documentation: 决定文本光标的偏移值（以字节为单位），当无光标时显示 -1。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.CursorPositio.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function showSelection()
	if textBox.CursorPosition == -1 or textBox.SelectionStart == -1 then
		print("无选中内容")
	else
		local selectedText = string.sub(
			textBox.Text,
			math.min(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart),
			math.max(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart)
		)
		print("选中内容为： \"" .. selectedText .. "\"")
	end
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("CursorPosition"):connect(showSelection)
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("SelectionStart"):connect(showSelection)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.Font.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

while true do
	-- 迭代所有的不同字体
	for i, font in pairs(Enum.Font:GetEnumItems()) do
		textLabel.Font = font
		textLabel.Text = font.Name
		wait(1)
	end
end

	if textBox.CursorPosition == -1 or textBox.SelectionStart == -1 then
		print("无选中内容")
	else
		local selectedText = string.sub(
			textBox.Text,
			math.min(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart),
			math.max(textBox.CursorPosition, textBox.SelectionStart)
		)
		print("选中内容为： \"" .. selectedText .. "\"")
	end
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("CursorPosition"):connect(showSelection)
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("SelectionStart"):connect(showSelection)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.ShowNativeInp.documentation: 设为 true 时，将会使用平台的自带输入方式，而非 Roblox 的内置键盘。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.Text.documentation: 决定由 UI 元素渲染的字符串。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextBounds.documentation: UI 元素文本的像素大小。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextBounds.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

-- TextBox 的最小尺寸
local minWidth, minHeight = 10, 10

-- 设置对齐方式，以确保输入时文本不会歪曲
textBox.TextXAlignment = Enum.TextXAlignment.Left
textBox.TextYAlignment = Enum.TextYAlignment.Top

local function updateSize()
	textBox.Size = UDim2.new(
		0, math.max(minWidth, textBox.TextBounds.X),
		0, math.max(minHeight, textBox.TextBounds.Y)
	)
end

textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("TextBounds"):Connect(updateSize)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextColor3.documentation: 决定被渲染文本的颜色
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextColor3.code_sample:
local textBox = script.Parent

local function hasVowels(str)
	return str:lower():find("[aeiou]")
end

local function onTextChanged()
	local text = textBox.Text
	-- 查找元音
	if hasVowels(text) then
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
	else
		textBox.TextColor3 = Color3.new(1, 0, 0) -- 红色
	end
end
textBox:GetPropertyChangedSignal("Text"):Connect(onTextChanged)

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextEditable.documentation: 决定用户是否能够更改 TextBox.Text。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextScaled.documentation: 更改文本是否会按照对其进行渲染的 GUI 对象尺寸调整大小。

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextSize.documentation: 确定文本行的高度，以像素为单位。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextSize.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

textLabel.Text = "Kaboom!"

while true do
	for size = 5, 100, 5 do
		textLabel.TextSize = size
		textLabel.TextTransparency = size / 100

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextStrokeCol.documentation: 确定文本描边（轮廓）的颜色。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextStrokeCol.code_sample:
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 高亮部分的闪烁频率
local freq = 2

-- 设置为黄色高亮颜色
textLabel.TextStrokeColor3 = Color3.new(1, 1, 0)

while true do
	-- math.sin 震荡的范围是 -1 到 1 ，所以我们将范围改为 0 到 1：
	local transparency = math.sin(workspace.DistributedGameTime*math.pi*freq)*.5+.5
	textLabel.TextStrokeTransparency = transparency
	wait()
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextXAlignmen.documentation: 确定渲染文本的水平对齐方式。
@roblox/globaltype/TextBox.TextXAlignmen.code_sample:
-- 将此代码粘贴至 TextLabel/TextButton/TextBox 的 LocalScript 中
local textLabel = script.Parent

local function setAlignment(xAlign, yAlign)
	textLabel.TextXAlignment = xAlign
	textLabel.TextYAlignment = yAlign
	textLabel.Text = xAlign.Name .. " + " .. yAlign.Name
end

while true do
	-- 对 TextXAlignment 和 TextYAlignment 枚举项进行迭代
	for j, yAlign in pairs(Enum.TextYAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
		for i, xAlign in pairs(Enum.TextXAlignment:GetEnumItems()) do
			setAlignment(xAlign, yAlign)
			wait(1)
		end
	end
end

-- 将这段代码放置在 TextButton 中的 LocalScript 内运行
local textButton = script.Parent

-- 对按钮状态进行初始化
local counter = 0
textButton.Text = "点我！"

-- 我们在这里定义一个用于累加计数器的函数
-- 并在累加后更新按钮
local function onActivated()
	counter = counter + 1
	textButton.Text = "点击数：" .. counter
end

-- 将 “Activated” 事件与我们的函数相连
textButton.Activated:Connect(onActivated)

@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.documentation: A 2D user interface element that displays non-interactive text
@roblox/globaltype/TextLabel.code_sample:
-- 将此代码放入 TextLabel 或 TextButton 的 LocalScript 中
local textLabel = script.Parent

-- 通过 TextColor3 使用的一些颜色
local colorNormal = Color3.new(0, 0, 0) -- 黑色
local colorSoon = Color3.new(1, .5, .5) -- 红色
local colorDone = Color3.new(.5, 1, .5) -- 绿色

-- 无限循环
while true do
	-- 从 10 至 1 进行倒数
	for i = 10, 1, -1 do
		-- 设置文本
		textLabel.Text = "倒计时： " .. i
		-- 根据倒数剩余时间设置颜色
		if i > 3 then
			textLabel.TextColor3 = colorNormal
		else
			textLabel.TextColor3 = colorSoon
		end
		wait(1)
	end
	textLabel.Text = "出发！"
	textLabel.TextColor3 = colorDone
	wait(2)
end

@roblox/globaltype/TextService.documentation: TextService 是内部负责处理游戏中文本显示的服务。

@roblox/globaltype/TextService.GetTextSi.documentation: TextService 是内部负责处理游戏中文本显示的服务。
要计算文字大小的字符串。
要使用的文字对象的 TextLabel.AbsoluteSize。计算文本换行时为必须。
具有指定格式的字符串所需的空间大小，以像素为单位。
计算使用指定的格式参数和大小约束时将与文本一起占用的 DataType.Vector2 维度（以像素为单位）。
@roblox/globaltype/TextService.GetTextSi.code_sample:
local TextService = game:GetService("TextService")

local function getTextBounds(...)
	local message = "Hello World"
	local size = Vector2.new(1,1)
    local bounds = TextService:GetTextSize(message, 12, "SourceSans", size)
    return bounds + Vector2.new(1, 1)
end

print(getTextBounds())

@roblox/globaltype/TextService.FilterStr.documentation: TextService 是内部负责处理游戏中文本显示的服务。
要过滤文字的玩家的 userId。
过滤后消息的使用场合。默认值为 PrivateChat（私聊）。
可用于相应地分发正确过滤的文本。
过滤从用户接收的字符串，然后返回 TextFilterResult。该 TextFilterResult 可用于相应地分发正确过滤的文本。

@roblox/globaltype/Texture.OffsetStudsV.documentation: 决定渲染纹理的垂直坐标偏移（以格为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Texture.StudsPerTileU.documentation: 设置 Texture 所应用平铺图像的水平尺寸（以格为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/Texture.StudsPerTileV.documentation: 设置 Texture 所应用平铺图像的垂直尺寸（以格为单位）。

@roblox/globaltype/ThirdPartyUserService.documentation: 一种用于处理第三方相关用户的内部服务。

@roblox/globaltype/TimerService.documentation: 负责调度定时事件的内部服务。由 Debris 类使用，开发人员无法访问其功能。

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.documentation: An object, such as a weapon, that can be equipped by a Humanoid
@roblox/globaltype/Tool.code_sample:
local tool = script.Parent
    
    local function explode(point)
    	local e = Instance.new("Explosion")
    	e.DestroyJointRadiusPercent = 0 -- 使爆炸无伤害 
    	e.Position = point
    	e.Parent = workspace
    end
    
    local function onActivated()
    	-- 获取激活工具的 Humanoid
    	local human = tool.Parent.Humanoid
    	-- 在 Humanoid 当前对准的位置调用爆炸
    	explode(human.TargetPoint) 
    end
    
    tool.Activated:Connect(onActivated)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.CanBeDropped.documentation: 控制玩家可否丢弃工具
@roblox/globaltype/Tool.CanBeDropped.code_sample:
local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "我是猫"
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.CanBeDropped = false
tool.Parent = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Backpack

tool.Activated:Connect(function()
	print("喵")
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Enabled.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character
local humanoid = character.Humanoid

local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "SuperJump"
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.Parent = player.Backpack

local invisible = false

function toolActivated()
	humanoid.JumpPower = 150
	tool.Enabled = false
	wait(5)
	tool.Enabled = true
	humanoid.JumpPower = 50
end

tool.Activated:Connect(toolActivated)
tool.Unequipped:Connect(function() humanoid.JumpPower = 50 end)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Grip.documentation: 将 Tool 的 Grip 属性存储为单个的 CFrame
@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Grip.code_sample:
local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "Stick"
tool.Parent = game.Players.LocalPlayer.Backpack

local handle = Instance.new("Part")
handle.Name = "Handle"
handle.Parent = tool
handle.Size = Vector3.new(.1,3,.1)
handle.Color = Color3.new(108, 88, 75) -- 褐色

tool.Activated:Connect(function()
	print(tool.Grip)
	print(tool.GripUp)
	print(tool.GripRight)
	print(tool.GripForward)
	print(tool.GripPos)
end)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.ManualActivation.documentation: ManualActivationOnly 属性控制 Tool（工具）能否在未执行 Tool:Activate 的情况下被激活
@roblox/globaltype/Tool.ManualActivation.code_sample:
local player = game.Players.LocalPlayer
local character = player.Character
local humanoid = character.Humanoid

local tool = Instance.new("Tool")
tool.Name = "Sprint"
tool.RequiresHandle = false
tool.Parent = player.Backpack

local invisible = false

function toolActivated()
	humanoid.WalkSpeed = 30
	tool.ManualActivationOnly = true
	wait(5)
	tool.ManualActivationOnly = false
	humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16
end

tool.Activated:Connect(toolActivated)
tool.Unequipped:Connect(function() humanoid.WalkSpeed = 16 end)

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.RequiresHandle.documentation: 决定工具能否在没有握柄的情况下使用
@roblox/globaltype/Tool.RequiresHandle.code_sample:
local tool = ...

if tool.RequiresHandle then
	print("此工具需要握柄！")
else
	print("此工具无需握柄！")
end

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.ToolTip.documentation: 控制玩家鼠标悬停在背包中的工具上时显示的信息

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Activate/param/0.documentation: An object, such as a weapon, that can be equipped by a Humanoid

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Deactivate/param.documentation: An object, such as a weapon, that can be equipped by a Humanoid

@roblox/globaltype/Tool.Deactivate.code_sample:
local ContextActionService = game:GetService("ContextActionService")
local tool = script.Parent
 
-- 给 Tool 中的 Handle 一个随机 BrickColor
local function toolDeactivated()
	tool.Handle.BrickColor = BrickColor.Random()
end
 
-- 按下任意键时停用工具
local function keyPressed(actionName, actionInputState, actionInputObject)	
	if actionInputState == Enum.UserInputState.Begin then
		tool:Deactivate()
	end
end
 
tool.Deactivated:Connect(toolDeactivated)
ContextActionService:BindAction("deactivateTool", keyPressed, true, "x")

@roblox/globaltype/Torque.RelativeTo.documentation: Torque 所基于施力的 CFrame。
